old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

03.04.2022 20:05:00 - Trinity: Hey Glenda, you got the stuff?
03.04.2022 20:06:29 - Glenda: Yeah, I have it. When and where?
03.04.2022 20:07:20 - Trinity: Let's meet at the usual spot. Tomorrow at 9.
03.04.2022 20:08:58 - Glenda: Alright. But this is the last time, Trinity.
03.04.2022 20:10:23 - Trinity: What? Why's that?
03.04.2022 20:11:09 - Glenda: I'm getting out of the business. Too risky.
03.04.2022 20:12:07 - Trinity: What about the team?
03.04.2022 20:14:02 - Glenda: They'll manage. This isn't a game anymore, Trinity.
03.04.2022 20:15:02 - Trinity: You're right. Maybe it's time for a change.
03.04.2022 20:16:18 - Glenda: Exactly. See you tomorrow, Trinity.
03.04.2022 20:18:14 - Trinity: See you, Glenda.
04.04.2022 00:59:16 - Trinity: Hey Glenda, have you seen the latest video on the SuperVlog channel?
04.04.2022 01:00:48 - Glenda: Hi Trinity, no I haven't. I've been quite busy. Is it good?
04.04.2022 01:01:43 - Trinity: Yes, it's really interesting. They're discussing the impact of viral videos on social media platforms.
04.04.2022 01:03:40 - Glenda: Sounds intriguing! I'll check it out when I get some free time.
04.04.2022 01:05:35 - Trinity: Cool! Let me know what you think once you've watched it.
04.04.2022 01:06:51 - Glenda: Definitely, I'll get back to you after watching.
04.04.2022 02:53:24 - Trinity: Hey Glenda, have you ever been to Japan?
04.04.2022 02:54:23 - Glenda: Hi Trinity, yes, I have. It was an amazing experience.
04.04.2022 02:55:51 - Trinity: That's cool! I'm planning a trip there. Do you have any recommendations?
04.04.2022 02:56:44 - Glenda: Definitely. Tokyo is a must visit. The city's mix of modern and traditional is fascinating.
04.04.2022 02:57:19 - Trinity: Tokyo is definitely on my list. How about food? Any specific dish I should try?
04.04.2022 02:59:15 - Glenda: You should definitely try sushi from a sushi bar, and Ramen from a Ramen shop.
04.04.2022 03:00:47 - Trinity: Sounds delicious! Did you visit any other cities?
04.04.2022 03:01:35 - Glenda: Yes, I also visited Kyoto and Hiroshima. Both were stunning in their own ways.
04.04.2022 03:03:04 - Trinity: Great! I'll add them to my itinerary. Any tips on local customs?
04.04.2022 03:05:04 - Glenda: Just be respectful and follow the crowd. Japanese people are very polite and well-mannered.
04.04.2022 03:06:27 - Trinity: Got it, thanks for the tips Glenda!
04.04.2022 03:08:25 - Glenda: You're welcome Trinity, have a wonderful trip!
04.04.2022 07:28:21 - Trinity: Hey Glenda, have you played the new release from Rockstar Games?
04.04.2022 07:29:16 - Glenda: Yes Trinity, I've started playing it. The graphics are amazing!
04.04.2022 07:29:48 - Trinity: I know right! I love the level of detail. How far are you in the game?
04.04.2022 07:31:26 - Glenda: Well, I just completed the third mission. The storyline is really engaging.
04.04.2022 07:32:55 - Trinity: Agreed! I love how they've incorporated different elements. Have you tried the multiplayer mode yet?
04.04.2022 07:33:52 - Glenda: No, not yet. But I've heard it's a lot of fun.
04.04.2022 07:35:31 - Trinity: It is! You should definitely give it a try. Maybe we can play together sometime?
04.04.2022 07:36:23 - Glenda: Sure, that sounds like fun! I'll let you know once I'm ready for multiplayer.
04.04.2022 07:38:22 - Trinity: Great! Looking forward to it. Let's conquer the virtual world together!
04.04.2022 07:40:22 - Glenda: Indeed! It's going to be a blast!
04.04.2022 11:41:07 - Trinity: Hi Glenda, how have you been feeling lately?
04.04.2022 11:41:50 - Glenda: Hi Trinity, not so great. I've been feeling really tired and I've had a headache for a few days.
04.04.2022 11:42:52 - Trinity: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. Have you seen a doctor?
04.04.2022 11:43:42 - Glenda: No, I haven't. I thought it was just a regular headache.
04.04.2022 11:44:48 - Trinity: It might be, but if it's been going on for a few days, it's better to get it checked. You might be dehydrated or it could be a symptom of something else.
04.04.2022 11:45:29 - Glenda: You're right. I'll make an appointment with my doctor.
04.04.2022 11:45:59 - Trinity: Great. And make sure you're drinking enough water and eating healthy. That can also make a difference.
04.04.2022 11:47:09 - Glenda: Definitely. I'll try to improve my diet and water intake.
04.04.2022 11:47:41 - Trinity: That's good to hear. Let me know what the doctor says, okay?
04.04.2022 11:49:32 - Glenda: Sure, I will. Thanks for your concern, Trinity.
04.04.2022 13:15:29 - Trinity: Good morning, Glenda. Hope you're doing well.
04.04.2022 13:16:31 - Glenda: Good morning, Trinity! I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?
04.04.2022 13:17:38 - Trinity: I'm good, thanks for asking. I wanted to discuss the new project we've been assigned.
04.04.2022 13:19:14 - Glenda: Sure, Trinity. What's up?
04.04.2022 13:20:54 - Trinity: I was going through the project brief and I think we need to schedule a meeting with the team to discuss the execution plan.
04.04.2022 13:21:39 - Glenda: I agree. We need to have a clear understanding and plan before we start. How about tomorrow at 10 AM?
04.04.2022 13:22:33 - Trinity: Sounds perfect. I'll send out the calendar invite.
04.04.2022 13:23:40 - Glenda: Great! In the meantime, I'll go through the project brief again. If I have any questions or suggestions, I'll email you.
04.04.2022 13:24:58 - Trinity: That sounds like a plan. Thank you, Glenda.

Please, provide a short summary of each topic discussed in this conversation. Also, mention the datetime of the first and last messages sending for each topic! Use the following format for each topic: "From {datetime first message} to {datetime last message}: \n\t {short summary of the topic discussed}". No introduction is required, just directly provide the short summaries.

04.04.2022 07:40:22 - Glenda: Indeed! It's going to be a blast!
04.04.2022 11:41:07 - Trinity: Hi Glenda, how have you been feeling lately?
04.04.2022 11:41:50 - Glenda: Hi Trinity, not so great. I've been feeling really tired and I've had a headache for a few days.
04.04.2022 11:42:52 - Trinity: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. Have you seen a doctor?
04.04.2022 11:43:42 - Glenda: No, I haven't. I thought it was just a regular headache.
04.04.2022 11:44:48 - Trinity: It might be, but if it's been going on for a few days, it's better to get it checked. You might be dehydrated or it could be a symptom of something else.
04.04.2022 11:45:29 - Glenda: You're right. I'll make an appointment with my doctor.
04.04.2022 11:45:59 - Trinity: Great. And make sure you're drinking enough water and eating healthy. That can also make a difference.
04.04.2022 11:47:09 - Glenda: Definitely. I'll try to improve my diet and water intake.
04.04.2022 11:47:41 - Trinity: That's good to hear. Let me know what the doctor says, okay?
04.04.2022 11:49:32 - Glenda: Sure, I will. Thanks for your concern, Trinity.
04.04.2022 13:15:29 - Trinity: Good morning, Glenda. Hope you're doing well.
04.04.2022 13:16:31 - Glenda: Good morning, Trinity! I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?
04.04.2022 13:17:38 - Trinity: I'm good, thanks for asking. I wanted to discuss the new project we've been assigned.
04.04.2022 13:19:14 - Glenda: Sure, Trinity. What's up?
04.04.2022 13:20:54 - Trinity: I was going through the project brief and I think we need to schedule a meeting with the team to discuss the execution plan.
04.04.2022 13:21:39 - Glenda: I agree. We need to have a clear understanding and plan before we start. How about tomorrow at 10 AM?
04.04.2022 13:22:33 - Trinity: Sounds perfect. I'll send out the calendar invite.
04.04.2022 13:23:40 - Glenda: Great! In the meantime, I'll go through the project brief again. If I have any questions or suggestions, I'll email you.
04.04.2022 13:24:58 - Trinity: That sounds like a plan. Thank you, Glenda.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

01.09.2021 09:24:33 - John: Hey guys, have you seen the latest Marvel movie?
01.09.2021 09:25:40 - Peter: No, I haven't. Is it good?
01.09.2021 09:26:58 - Richard: I saw it, it's amazing! They have introduced a new superhero.
01.09.2021 09:28:26 - Karen: I love Marvel movies! I'm planning to see it this weekend.
01.09.2021 09:29:42 - Ashley: Same here, Karen. Maybe we can go together.
01.09.2021 09:31:14 - John: Sounds like a plan. It's definitely worth watching.
01.09.2021 09:33:00 - Peter: Great, I'll watch it too then.
01.09.2021 09:34:05 - Richard: You won't regret it, Peter.
01.09.2021 09:35:35 - Karen: Let's all discuss it after we've watched it.
01.09.2021 09:36:47 - Ashley: That's a great idea, Karen. Looking forward to it.
01.09.2021 13:19:00 - John: Hey guys, have you seen the latest episode of The Witcher yet?
01.09.2021 13:19:31 - Peter: Oh yes, it was amazing! I loved the battle scenes!
01.09.2021 13:20:07 - Richard: I agree, Peter. The special effects were top notch!
01.09.2021 13:20:55 - Karen: I haven't seen it yet! No spoilers, please!
01.09.2021 13:22:22 - Ashley: I'm with Karen on this one, still need to catch up!
01.09.2021 13:24:15 - John: Okay, no spoilers. But you guys should definitely watch it soon!
01.09.2021 13:24:54 - Peter: I heard the next season is coming out next year. Is that right?
01.09.2021 13:25:53 - Richard: Yes, that's correct! Can't wait for it!
01.09.2021 13:27:00 - Karen: Gosh, I need to hurry up then. So much to watch, so little time!
01.09.2021 13:27:33 - Ashley: Tell me about it, Karen. The list just keeps getting longer!
01.09.2021 13:28:50 - John: Maybe we should have a movie night and watch it together?
01.09.2021 13:29:36 - Peter: That's a great idea, John!
01.09.2021 13:30:32 - Richard: I'm in!
01.09.2021 13:31:19 - Karen: Me too!
01.09.2021 13:33:09 - Ashley: Count me in! It’s a plan then!
01.09.2021 16:23:34 - John: Hi everyone, have you read any good books lately?
01.09.2021 16:25:08 - Peter: I've just finished 'The Silent Patient'. A great psychological thriller!
01.09.2021 16:26:20 - Richard: I'm currently reading 'Educated' by Tara Westover. It's an amazing memoir.
01.09.2021 16:27:34 - Karen: I recently read 'Becoming' by Michelle Obama. It was truly inspiring.
01.09.2021 16:28:47 - Ashley: I've just started 'Where the Crawdads Sing'. It's been on my list for a while now.
01.09.2021 16:29:54 - John: 'The Silent Patient' sounds interesting, Peter. What's it about?
01.09.2021 16:31:52 - Peter: It's about a woman who becomes a mute after allegedly killing her husband, and her therapist's efforts to unravel the mystery.
01.09.2021 16:33:23 - Richard: I've heard good things about 'Where the Crawdads Sing', Ashley. Let us know how it is.
01.09.2021 16:35:20 - Karen: I also want to read 'Educated'. Richard, maybe we can discuss it when you're done?
01.09.2021 16:36:15 - Ashley: Definitely, Richard. And 'Becoming' is next on my list, Karen!
01.09.2021 19:30:00 - John: Hey guys, I think we have a situation.
01.09.2021 19:31:21 - Peter: What's up, John?
01.09.2021 19:32:00 - John: I believe we have a mole in our operations.
01.09.2021 19:32:58 - Richard: How can you be so sure, John?
01.09.2021 19:33:58 - John: Some of our shipments have been intercepted recently. This can't be a coincidence.
01.09.2021 19:35:06 - Peter: We need to figure this out before things get out of hand.
01.09.2021 19:36:14 - Karen: I agree with Peter. We should investigate this matter.
01.09.2021 19:37:37 - Ashley: I have a few contacts who might be able to help us.
01.09.2021 19:38:48 - Richard: Let's proceed with that then, Ashley.
01.09.2021 19:39:18 - John: We should also be careful about what we discuss here.
01.09.2021 19:40:59 - Peter: Agreed. Let's use code words for sensitive topics from now on.
01.09.2021 19:42:44 - Karen: Good idea, Peter. Let's keep this under wraps until we figure out what's going on.
01.09.2021 19:44:44 - Ashley: I'll start reaching out to my contacts.
01.09.2021 19:45:35 - John: Keep us posted, Ashley.
01.09.2021 19:46:17 - Richard: Let's tread carefully, everyone.
01.09.2021 23:45:05 - John: Hey guys, have you all registered for next semester?
01.09.2021 23:46:37 - Peter: I have. I'm taking 3 computer science courses.
01.09.2021 23:47:59 - Richard: I'm still deciding between two philosophy courses. 
01.09.2021 23:49:47 - Karen: I've registered, but I'm still on the waitlist for one of my classes.
01.09.2021 23:51:16 - Ashley: I haven't yet. I've been so busy with exams.
01.09.2021 23:52:34 - John: Ashley, you should do it soon. The classes get filled up pretty quickly.
01.09.2021 23:53:54 - Peter: Yeah, Ashley. Plus you can always change later if you need to.
01.09.2021 23:55:30 - Richard: That's true. I did that last semester.
01.09.2021 23:56:03 - Karen: Same here. It's better to secure your spot first.
01.09.2021 23:57:11 - Ashley: You guys are right. I'll do it tonight. Thanks.
02.09.2021 05:10:23 - John: Hi everyone, I was thinking about Plato's theory of forms today. What does everyone think about it?
02.09.2021 05:10:59 - Peter: I've always found it fascinating. The idea that the physical world isn't the 'real' world is a mind-bending concept.
02.09.2021 05:11:34 - Richard: It's an interesting theory for sure, but I've always preferred Aristotle's more tangible, empirical approach.
02.09.2021 05:12:29 - Karen: I think both have their merits. Plato's idealism is a good counterpoint to Aristotle's materialism.
02.09.2021 05:13:24 - Ashley: I agree with Karen. Both theories offer different perspectives on the nature of reality. They can coexist.
02.09.2021 07:15:45 - John: Hey guys, remember our high school years?
02.09.2021 07:16:28 - Peter: Of course, John. Those were some of the best years of my life.
02.09.2021 07:17:41 - Richard: I agree. I miss the football games and the pep rallies.
02.09.2021 07:18:36 - Karen: And the school plays! We had so much fun in drama club.
02.09.2021 07:19:24 - Ashley: I remember the science fairs. We always had a blast creating those projects.
02.09.2021 07:20:06 - John: Yeah, I think we all learned a lot during those years.
02.09.2021 07:20:45 - Peter: Definitely. It's amazing how much we've all grown since then.
02.09.2021 07:21:32 - Richard: I'd love to go back and relive some of those moments.
02.09.2021 07:23:12 - Karen: Maybe we could organize a reunion?
02.09.2021 07:24:16 - Ashley: That's a great idea, Karen. Let's do it.

Use the following format for each topic: "From {datetime first message} to {datetime last message}: \n\t {short summary of the topic discussed}". No introduction is required, just directly provide the short summaries.

Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

15.10.2022 05:26:01 - Clara: Hey Carlton, I'm thinking about going on a trip.
15.10.2022 05:26:50 - Carlton: That sounds like a great idea! Where are you planning to go?
15.10.2022 05:28:06 - Clara: I'm not sure yet, I was thinking about going to Europe. Have you ever been?
15.10.2022 05:29:51 - Carlton: Yes, I've been to France and Italy. Both were great experiences. 
15.10.2022 05:30:42 - Clara: I've always wanted to go to France. What was your favorite part?
15.10.2022 05:31:22 - Carlton: The food was incredible! And the art museums in Paris were a highlight.
15.10.2022 05:32:54 - Clara: That sounds amazing. I think I'll start planning my trip to France!
15.10.2022 05:33:59 - Carlton: That's exciting! Make sure to visit the Louvre and take a trip to the countryside.
15.10.2022 05:34:57 - Clara: Definitely, I'll add those to my list. Thanks for the advice, Carlton.
15.10.2022 05:35:54 - Carlton: No problem, Clara. Have a fantastic trip!
15.10.2022 08:20:19 - Clara: Hey Carlton, have you read 'To Kill a Mockingbird' yet?
15.10.2022 08:21:23 - Carlton: Hey Clara! Yes, I finished it last night. It was an incredibly moving read.
15.10.2022 08:23:11 - Clara: I'm glad you enjoyed it. What did you think of Scout as a character?
15.10.2022 08:23:43 - Carlton: I thought Scout was a brilliant character. She provided an innocent and unique perspective to the racial tension in the story.
15.10.2022 08:25:32 - Clara: Exactly! Her innocence made the events even more poignant. Now, what about '1984'? Have you started that?
15.10.2022 08:26:04 - Carlton: Not yet, but it's next on my list. I've heard it's quite a thought-provoking book.
15.10.2022 08:27:04 - Clara: It certainly is. Looking forward to hearing your thoughts on it. Happy reading!
15.10.2022 08:27:52 - Carlton: Thanks, Clara! I'll let you know once I've finished it.
15.10.2022 12:26:21 - Clara: Hey Carlton, have you heard the new album from The Weeknd?
15.10.2022 12:28:09 - Carlton: Yes, Clara. I just finished listening to it. It's pretty amazing, don't you think?
15.10.2022 12:29:46 - Clara: Absolutely! I especially loved the track "Save Your Tears". The lyrics are so deep.
15.10.2022 12:31:22 - Carlton: I couldn't agree more. But I'm also really into "Blinding Lights". The beat is so catchy.
15.10.2022 12:32:48 - Clara: True that. I've been playing it on repeat. What do you think about the overall theme of the album?
15.10.2022 12:33:47 - Carlton: It seems to me that it's about heartbreak and recovery, with a touch of his usual dark style.
15.10.2022 12:35:18 - Clara: Yes, I also think it's a bit darker than his previous work. But I like it, it's different.
15.10.2022 12:36:09 - Carlton: Definitely. It's always refreshing when artists try something new and it works.
15.10.2022 12:37:12 - Clara: Right. By the way, do you have any other music recommendations?
15.10.2022 12:38:48 - Carlton: If you're into The Weeknd, you might also like Frank Ocean. His music has a similar vibe.
15.10.2022 12:40:10 - Clara: Thanks, Carlton! I'll check him out.
15.10.2022 12:42:10 - Carlton: No problem, Clara. Enjoy!
15.10.2022 14:22:13 - Clara: Hey Carlton, have you seen the recent news about the Mars Rover?
15.10.2022 14:22:43 - Carlton: Yes, Clara! It's fascinating. They've just recently collected a sample from the Martian surface.
15.10.2022 14:24:36 - Clara: Yeah, I read about it. It's such a milestone in space exploration, isn't it?
15.10.2022 14:25:10 - Carlton: Definitely. It's mind-blowing to think that we're now able to collect samples from another planet.
15.10.2022 14:26:38 - Clara: I know, right? And the fact that we might discover signs of past microbial life on Mars!
15.10.2022 14:28:25 - Carlton: It's a huge leap towards answering the age-old question: Are we alone in the universe?
15.10.2022 14:29:02 - Clara: Exactly! It's both exciting and a bit scary at the same time.
15.10.2022 14:30:58 - Carlton: I agree. But it's definitely more exciting. The universe is full of possibilities.
15.10.2022 14:32:17 - Clara: I can't wait to see what they'll discover next.
15.10.2022 14:32:55 - Carlton: Me too. These are exciting times we're living in.
15.10.2022 14:34:54 - Clara: Definitely. Let's keep each other posted on any new updates!
15.10.2022 14:36:25 - Carlton: Deal. It's always fun discussing these things with you, Clara.
15.10.2022 17:17:06 - Clara: Hey Carlton, how are you?
15.10.2022 17:18:11 - Carlton: Hey Clara, I'm doing well. Just a bit stressed about exams.
15.10.2022 17:20:02 - Clara: I can relate, these end of year exams are really nerve-wracking.
15.10.2022 17:20:59 - Carlton: Yeah, especially the physics exam. I am really struggling with that subject.
15.10.2022 17:21:32 - Clara: Have you tried revising with some online resources? There are some good YouTube channels that explain the concepts really well.
15.10.2022 17:22:56 - Carlton: I haven't tried that yet. Could you recommend some channels?
15.10.2022 17:23:39 - Clara: Sure, I'll send you some links. Also, we could study together if you want.
15.10.2022 17:24:46 - Carlton: That would be great. Thanks a lot, Clara.
15.10.2022 17:25:43 - Clara: No problem, Carlton. We can get through this together.
15.10.2022 17:26:55 - Carlton: I appreciate it, Clara. You're a lifesaver.
15.10.2022 18:45:30 - Clara: Hey Carlton, got a minute to discuss our next move?
15.10.2022 18:46:29 - Carlton: Sure, Clara. What's on your mind?
15.10.2022 18:47:42 - Clara: I've been thinking about the museum heist. We need to plan carefully.
15.10.2022 18:48:40 - Carlton: Agreed. Let's start with the security. Any idea what we're dealing with?
15.10.2022 18:49:11 - Clara: They have motion detectors and laser security grids. But, I have a contact who can help us disable it.
15.10.2022 18:50:09 - Carlton: Sounds promising. What about the guards and surveillance cameras?
15.10.2022 18:51:53 - Clara: There are four guards on rotation and cameras at every corner. We might need a distraction.
15.10.2022 18:53:40 - Carlton: I might know just the guy for that. Can we trust your contact though?
15.10.2022 18:54:27 - Clara: Absolutely. She's a pro. But we need to act fast, they're switching security companies soon.
15.10.2022 18:55:01 - Carlton: Alright, let's get everyone together tomorrow and lay out the plan.
15.10.2022 18:56:40 - Clara: Sounds like a plan, Carlton. See you tomorrow.
15.10.2022 21:12:12 - Clara: Hey Carlton, have you started watching the new season of 'Stranger Things' yet?
15.10.2022 21:13:45 - Carlton: Not yet, Clara. I've been busy with work. Is it any good?
15.10.2022 21:15:15 - Clara: I think it's amazing! The plot seems more intense this time. You should really start watching it.
15.10.2022 21:16:04 - Carlton: I've heard mixed reviews about it. Some say it's not as good as the previous seasons.
15.10.2022 21:17:57 - Clara: Well, I think it's subjective. I personally loved it. There are some unexpected twists that make it more interesting.
15.10.2022 21:19:46 - Carlton: Alright, you've convinced me. I'll start watching it this weekend.
15.10.2022 21:20:35 - Clara: Great! We can discuss the episodes once you've seen them.
15.10.2022 21:22:35 - Carlton: Sounds good. I'll get back to you once I start watching.

10.05.2022 13:45:00 - Joshua: Hey Renea, are you up for a bit of a mental exercise?
10.05.2022 13:45:33 - Renea: Hey Joshua. Sure, what's up?
10.05.2022 13:46:07 - Joshua: Ever watch those heist movies where they break into a high-security vault?
10.05.2022 13:47:06 - Renea: Yeah, I've seen a few. Why do you ask?
10.05.2022 13:48:34 - Joshua: Just for fun, how do you think you would go about it if it was a fictional scenario?
10.05.2022 13:50:27 - Renea: Hmm, I'd probably start by studying the security system in depth.
10.05.2022 13:52:01 - Joshua: Right, and how would you bypass the cameras?
10.05.2022 13:52:59 - Renea: Maybe hack into the system and loop the feed?
10.05.2022 13:54:32 - Joshua: Good idea, and what about the laser security?
10.05.2022 13:55:39 - Renea: I'd use smoke or dust to reveal them, then carefully navigate through.
10.05.2022 13:56:48 - Joshua: Lastly, how would you open the vault?
10.05.2022 13:57:48 - Renea: I'd have to figure out the lock mechanism. Might even need a safe-cracker.
10.05.2022 13:58:27 - Joshua: Interesting. Thanks for indulging me, Renea.
10.05.2022 15:03:00 - Joshua: Hey Renea, have you seen the latest news about the Mars Rover?
10.05.2022 15:04:51 - Renea: Hey Joshua, yeah I saw something about it. Didn't it find something interesting?
10.05.2022 15:06:24 - Joshua: Yeah! It seems to have found new signs of ancient microbial life. It's a huge discovery.
10.05.2022 15:08:15 - Renea: Oh wow, that's amazing. I wonder what this means for the future of space exploration.
10.05.2022 15:09:40 - Joshua: I think it opens up a lot of possibilities. Maybe there was life on Mars in the past.
10.05.2022 15:11:30 - Renea: That's an exciting thought. Do you think there could still be life on Mars now?
10.05.2022 15:12:46 - Joshua: It's hard to say, but I think it's definitely a possibility. We'll have to wait and see what the scientists say.
10.05.2022 15:13:47 - Renea: True. It's an exciting time to be alive, isn't it?
10.05.2022 15:14:33 - Joshua: Definitely. I can't wait to see what other discoveries are made in the future.
10.05.2022 15:16:24 - Renea: Same here. Let's keep each other updated on any new developments.
10.05.2022 15:17:00 - Joshua: Sounds like a plan.
10.05.2022 16:35:34 - Joshua: Hey Renea, have you seen the new Marvel movie yet?
10.05.2022 16:36:30 - Renea,Hi Joshua, yes, I saw it last weekend. It was amazing!: None
10.05.2022 16:37:25 - Joshua: I thought so too! The special effects were really top-notch.
10.05.2022 16:38:49 - Renea: Definitely. And the storyline was so engaging. I can't wait for the next movie.
10.05.2022 16:40:17 - Joshua: Same here. I heard it's coming out next year.
10.05.2022 16:41:40 - Renea: Yes, I also read that. Any other movies you're looking forward to?
10.05.2022 16:42:15 - Joshua: Actually, I'm quite excited about the new James Bond movie. How about you?
10.05.2022 16:43:25 - Renea: Oh, I can't wait to see that one as well. I'm a big fan of the franchise.
10.05.2022 16:45:19 - Joshua: Great! Maybe we can go watch it together.
10.05.2022 16:46:24 - Renea: That sounds like a plan. Let's do that.
10.05.2022 20:00:01 - Joshua: Hey Renea, have you seen the lineup for the upcoming concert?
10.05.2022 20:00:59 - Renea: No, I haven't. Who's performing?
10.05.2022 20:01:53 - Joshua: It's a mix of different genres. The headliners are Imagine Dragons and Post Malone.
10.05.2022 20:03:07 - Renea: That sounds great. I love Post Malone!
10.05.2022 20:03:52 - Joshua: Me too! They also have a couple of local bands that are really good.
10.05.2022 20:05:31 - Renea: I'm intrigued. When is it?
10.05.2022 20:06:18 - Joshua: It's next Saturday. Are you free?
10.05.2022 20:07:43 - Renea: Yeah, I don't have any plans. Where's the concert?
10.05.2022 20:09:17 - Joshua: It's at the city park. They've got a huge stage set up.
10.05.2022 20:09:47 - Renea: That sounds amazing. Do you know how much the tickets are?
10.05.2022 20:11:19 - Joshua: I think they're around $50. Would you like me to get us a pair?
10.05.2022 20:12:08 - Renea: Yes, please. That would be awesome.
10.05.2022 20:13:24 - Joshua: Great, I'll get them today. Looking forward to it!
10.05.2022 20:15:15 - Renea: Me too. Thanks, Joshua.
10.05.2022 22:10:39 - Joshua: Hey Renea, how's it going with the new math teacher?
10.05.2022 22:11:23 - Renea: Hi Joshua! She's really good, explains everything clearly. But the homework is quite a lot.
10.05.2022 22:12:44 - Joshua: Yeah, I've heard she's strict. Think we'll have a lot of tests?
10.05.2022 22:14:12 - Renea: I guess so. But I think it's better to understand the material than just memorizing it.
10.05.2022 22:15:06 - Joshua: You're right. Have you started studying for the biology test yet?
10.05.2022 22:17:00 - Renea: Not yet, but I've gathered all my notes. We should study together, what do you think?
10.05.2022 22:17:52 - Joshua: That sounds like a good idea, Renea. Let's do it.

Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

01.03.2022 16:10:31 - Jason: Hey everyone, have you ever thought about where you'd like to go if we planned a group trip?
01.03.2022 16:11:43 - Desiree: Definitely! I've always wanted to see the Northern Lights in Iceland. 
01.03.2022 16:13:15 - Katherine: That sounds amazing, Desiree! I'd love to go to Japan, the culture and food have always intrigued me.
01.03.2022 16:13:48 - Ronda: Japan sounds great, Katherine. I have always wanted to go on a safari in Kenya though.
01.03.2022 16:15:03 - Mario: I have a soft spot for history. So, Greece is on top of my list. 
01.03.2022 16:16:35 - Jason: Great choices everyone! Let's put these options into a poll and vote?
01.03.2022 16:17:12 - Desiree: Good idea Jason. But before that, let's discuss the best time to travel to these places.
01.03.2022 16:18:02 - Katherine: For Japan, it's best to go in Spring for the cherry blossoms, or in Autumn for the fall colors.
01.03.2022 16:19:57 - Ronda: In Kenya, the best wildlife viewing months are during the dry season from late June to October.
01.03.2022 16:21:16 - Mario: And for Greece, the best time is from April to early November. The weather is warm and there's little rain.
01.03.2022 16:22:39 - Desiree: For Iceland, the best time to see the Northern Lights is from late September to late March.
01.03.2022 16:23:37 - Jason: Perfect, let's put all this info into the poll too.
01.03.2022 16:24:30 - Katherine: Great! Looking forward to this trip, wherever we end up going!
01.03.2022 16:26:06 - Ronda: Same here, can't wait!
01.03.2022 19:30:00 - Jason: Hey team, I've been thinking about our next target. What do you all think about the old mansion on Main Street?
01.03.2022 19:31:39 - Desiree: Sounds promising, Jason. But isn't it rumored to be haunted?
01.03.2022 19:33:34 - Katherine: That's just a myth, Desiree. I think it could be a good idea. We need to plan carefully though.
01.03.2022 19:34:20 - Ronda: I agree with Katherine. We need to ensure we have all exit points covered.
01.03.2022 19:35:05 - Mario: I can handle the security systems. But we need someone on the lookout too.
01.03.2022 19:37:02 - Jason: Good point, Mario. Desiree, could you handle that?
01.03.2022 19:38:54 - Desiree: Sure, Jason. I'll keep an eye out for any unexpected surprises.
01.03.2022 19:40:11 - Katherine: Let's meet tomorrow to discuss the plan in detail.
01.03.2022 19:41:28 - Ronda: Works for me. Let's keep everything low-key as usual.
01.03.2022 19:43:19 - Mario: Agreed. See you all tomorrow.
01.03.2022 21:19:42 - Jason: Hey guys, I just finished reading 'The Alchemist'. Absolutely loved it!
01.03.2022 21:20:24 - Desiree: Oh, I love Paulo Coelho's work! Have you read 'Brida' yet, Jason?
01.03.2022 21:22:07 - Katherine: I have heard a lot about 'The Alchemist', but never got around to reading it. What's it about, Jason?
01.03.2022 21:24:05 - Jason: It's about a young shepherd named Santiago who embarks on a journey to find a worldly treasure. But, along the way, he discovers himself.
01.03.2022 21:25:22 - Ronda: Sounds interesting. I might give it a read.
01.03.2022 21:26:34 - Mario: I prefer non-fiction. Currently reading 'Sapiens' by Yuval Noah Harari. It's mind-blowing!
01.03.2022 21:27:33 - Desiree: I've heard great things about 'Sapiens', Mario. What's it about?
01.03.2022 21:28:08 - Mario: It's about the history of humankind, right from the evolution of Homo Sapiens to the present day. It presents some thought-provoking perspectives.
01.03.2022 21:29:48 - Katherine: Wow, that sounds intriguing, Mario. I'll add it to my reading list.
01.03.2022 21:31:13 - Ronda: I'm into mystery novels. Just started with 'The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo'.
01.03.2022 21:32:54 - Jason: That's a great book, Ronda. You're in for a treat!
01.03.2022 21:34:22 - Desiree: I'll have to check that out too. So many books, so little time!
01.03.2022 21:35:51 - Katherine: Tell me about it, Desiree. My reading list keeps growing!
01.03.2022 21:37:25 - Jason: Haha, same here. Well, happy reading everyone!
01.03.2022 22:25:26 - Jason: So what do you guys think about existentialism?
01.03.2022 22:27:12 - Desiree: Well, I find it quite intriguing. It's all about finding self and personal meaning in life.
01.03.2022 22:28:26 - Katherine: I agree with Desiree, but it also feels like a lonely philosophy. It relies so heavily on the individual.
01.03.2022 22:30:08 - Ronda: But isn't that the point, Katherine? To highlight the importance of individual choice in a seemingly indifferent universe.
01.03.2022 22:30:42 - Mario: I see your points, but I lean more towards Absurdism. Life is meaningless and it's up to us to create our own purpose.
01.03.2022 22:32:00 - Jason: That's interesting, Mario. But doesn't that sound similar to Existentialism?
01.03.2022 22:32:47 - Mario: They're similar, but Absurdism is more about embracing the absurdity of life rather than seeking personal meaning.
01.03.2022 22:33:23 - Katherine: I can see why you'd think that way, Mario. It's definitely a unique perspective.
01.03.2022 22:35:12 - Desiree: Regardless of our philosophical inclinations, I think it's beautiful how we can interpret and find our own meanings in life.
01.03.2022 22:35:58 - Ronda: Absolutely, Desiree. That's the beauty of philosophy, isn't it? It allows us to explore different perspectives and possibilities.
01.03.2022 22:37:08 - Jason: Well said, everyone. This was a great discussion.
02.03.2022 03:28:34 - Jason: Hey guys, have you heard the new Coldplay album?
02.03.2022 03:30:08 - Desiree: Yes, I actually have. I think it's one of their best works yet.
02.03.2022 03:30:57 - Katherine: I haven't listened to it yet. Is it really that good?
02.03.2022 03:31:31 - Ronda: I'm not much of a Coldplay fan, but I'll give it a listen.
02.03.2022 03:33:14 - Mario: I'm with Ronda. Not a fan, but I won't knock it until I try it.
02.03.2022 03:34:29 - Jason: That's the spirit, guys! Let's all give it a listen and discuss it next time.
02.03.2022 03:35:47 - Desiree: Sounds like a plan. Music discussion night, here we come!
02.03.2022 03:37:02 - Katherine: I'm in! I'll listen to it tonight.

messages.content:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

01.03.2022 16:10:31 - Jason: Hey everyone, have you ever thought about where you'd like to go if we planned a group trip?
01.03.2022 16:11:43 - Desiree: Definitely! I've always wanted to see the Northern Lights in Iceland. 
01.03.2022 16:13:15 - Katherine: That sounds amazing, Desiree! I'd love to go to Japan, the culture and food have always intrigued me.
01.03.2022 16:13:48 - Ronda: Japan sounds great, Katherine. I have always wanted to go on a safari in Kenya though.
01.03.2022 16:15:03 - Mario: I have a soft spot for history. So, Greece is on top of my list. 
01.03.2022 16:16:35 - Jason: Great choices everyone! Let's put these options into a poll and vote?
01.03.2022 16:17:12 - Desiree: Good idea Jason. But before that, let's discuss the best time to travel to these places.
01.03.2022 16:18:02 - Katherine: For Japan, it's best to go in Spring for the cherry blossoms, or in Autumn for the fall colors.
01.03.2022 16:19:57 - Ronda: In Kenya, the best wildlife viewing months are during the dry season from late June to October.
01.03.2022 16:21:16 - Mario: And for Greece, the best time is from April to early November. The weather is warm and there's little rain.
01.03.2022 16:22:39 - Desiree: For Iceland, the best time to see the Northern Lights is from late September to late March.
01.03.2022 16:23:37 - Jason: Perfect, let's put all this info into the poll too.
01.03.2022 16:24:30 - Katherine: Great! Looking forward to this trip, wherever we end up going!
01.03.2022 16:26:06 - Ronda: Same here, can't wait!
01.03.2022 19:30:00 - Jason: Hey team, I've been thinking about our next target. What do you all think about the old mansion on Main Street?
01.03.2022 19:31:39 - Desiree: Sounds promising, Jason. But isn't it rumored to be haunted?
01.03.2022 19:33:34 - Katherine: That's just a myth, Desiree. I think it could be a good idea. We need to plan carefully though.
01.03.2022 19:34:20 - Ronda: I agree with Katherine. We need to ensure we have all exit points covered.
01.03.2022 19:35:05 - Mario: I can handle the security systems. But we need someone on the lookout too.
01.03.2022 19:37:02 - Jason: Good point, Mario. Desiree, could you handle that?
01.03.2022 19:38:54 - Desiree: Sure, Jason. I'll keep an eye out for any unexpected surprises.
01.03.2022 19:40:11 - Katherine: Let's meet tomorrow to discuss the plan in detail.
01.03.2022 19:41:28 - Ronda: Works for me. Let's keep everything low-key as usual.
01.03.2022 19:43:19 - Mario: Agreed. See you all tomorrow.
01.03.2022 21:19:42 - Jason: Hey guys, I just finished reading 'The Alchemist'. Absolutely loved it!
01.03.2022 21:20:24 - Desiree: Oh, I love Paulo Coelho's work! Have you read 'Brida' yet, Jason?
01.03.2022 21:22:07 - Katherine: I have heard a lot about 'The Alchemist', but never got around to reading it. What's it about, Jason?
01.03.2022 21:24:05 - Jason: It's about a young shepherd named Santiago who embarks on a journey to find a worldly treasure. But, along the way, he discovers himself.
01.03.2022 21:25:22 - Ronda: Sounds interesting. I might give it a read.
01.03.2022 21:26:34 - Mario: I prefer non-fiction. Currently reading 'Sapiens' by Yuval Noah Harari. It's mind-blowing!
01.03.2022 21:27:33 - Desiree: I've heard great things about 'Sapiens', Mario. What's it about?
01.03.2022 21:28:08 - Mario: It's about the history of humankind, right from the evolution of Homo Sapiens to the present day. It presents some thought-provoking perspectives.
01.03.2022 21:29:48 - Katherine: Wow, that sounds intriguing, Mario. I'll add it to my reading list.
01.03.2022 21:31:13 - Ronda: I'm into mystery novels. Just started with 'The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo'.
01.03.2022 21:32:54 - Jason: That's a great book, Ronda. You're in for a treat!
01.03.2022 21:34:22 - Desiree: I'll have to check that out too. So many books, so little time!
01.03.2022 21:35:51 - Katherine: Tell me about it, Desiree. My reading list keeps growing!
01.03.2022 21:37:25 - Jason: Haha, same here. Well, happy reading everyone!
01.03.2022 22:25:26 - Jason: So what do you guys think about existentialism?
01.03.2022 22:27:12 - Desiree: Well, I find it quite intriguing. It's all about finding self and personal meaning in life.
01.03.2022 22:28:26 - Katherine: I agree with Desiree, but it also feels like a lonely philosophy. It relies so heavily on the individual.
01.03.2022 22:30:08 - Ronda: But isn't that the point, Katherine? To highlight the importance of individual choice in a seemingly indifferent universe.
01.03.2022 22:30:42 - Mario: I see your points, but I lean more towards Absurdism. Life is meaningless and it's up to us to create our own purpose.
01.03.2022 22:32:00 - Jason: That's interesting, Mario. But doesn't that sound similar to Existentialism?
01.03.2022 22:32:47 - Mario: They're similar, but Absurdism is more about embracing the absurdity of life rather than seeking personal meaning.
01.03.2022 22:33:23 - Katherine: I can see why you'd think that way, Mario. It's definitely a unique perspective.
01.03.2022 22:35:12 - Desiree: Regardless of our philosophical inclinations, I think it's beautiful how we can interpret and find our own meanings in life.
01.03.2022 22:35:58 - Ronda: Absolutely, Desiree. That's the beauty of philosophy, isn't it? It allows us to explore different perspectives and possibilities.
01.03.2022 22:37:08 - Jason: Well said, everyone. This was a great discussion.
02.03.2022 03:28:34 - Jason: Hey guys, have you heard the new Coldplay album?
02.03.2022 03:30:08 - Desiree: Yes, I actually have. I think it's one of their best works yet.
02.03.2022 03:30:57 - Katherine: I haven't listened to it yet. Is it really that good?
02.03.2022 03:31:31 - Ronda: I'm not much of a Coldplay fan, but I'll give it a listen.
02.03.2022 03:33:14 - Mario: I'm with Ronda. Not a fan, but I won't knock it until I try it.
02.03.2022 03:34:29 - Jason: That's the spirit, guys! Let's all give it a listen and discuss it next time.
02.03.2022 03:35:47 - Desiree: Sounds like a plan. Music discussion night, here we come!
02.03.2022 03:37:02 - Katherine: I'm in! I'll listen to it tonight.
02.03.2022 03:37:59 - Ronda: Same here. It'll be a new experience for sure.
02.03.2022 03:39:52 - Mario: Count me in as well. Let's see if it changes my mind about Coldplay.

27.08.2024 22:17:19 - Azaiah: Got them. Just went over them—security’s tight, but we’ve handled worse.

28.08.2024 01:32:11 - Eusebia: Hi Azaiah, hope you're doing well.

28.08.2024 01:34:35 - Eusebia: I wanted to discuss the new project we are working on. I'm struggling a bit with the initial stages.
28.08.2024 01:35:33 - Azaiah: Of course, Eusebia. Can you tell me exactly where you're facing issues?

28.08.2024 01:45:08 - Eusebia: Thank you, Azaiah. Your guidance is truly appreciated.
28.08.2024 01:46:04 - Azaiah: No problem, Eusebia. We're a team and we're in this together.
28.08.2024 05:43:01 - Eusebia: Hey Azaiah, have you heard about the upcoming concert in town?
28.08.2024 05:44:50 - Azaiah: No, I haven't. Who's performing?
28.08.2024 05:46:08 - Eusebia: It's the rock band, The Rolling Stones.
28.08.2024 05:46:48 - Azaiah: Oh wow, I am a huge fan of them. When is the concert?

28.08.2024 05:55:59 - Azaiah: I can't wait. Let's plan to go together.
28.08.2024 05:57:42 - Eusebia: Sounds like a plan. See you at the concert, Azaiah.
28.08.2024 05:58:53 - Azaiah: Definitely, see you there, Eusebia.
28.08.2024 08:15:10 - Eusebia: Hi Azaiah, I have been having some health issues lately.
28.08.2024 08:16:27 - Azaiah: Oh no Eusebia, sorry to hear that. What seems to be the problem?
28.08.2024 08:18:13 - Eusebia: I have been feeling very tired and weak. I also have frequent headaches.
28.08.2024 08:19:49 - Azaiah: It sounds like you need to see a doctor, Eusebia. It could be something simple like a vitamin deficiency, but it's best to get checked.
28.08.2024 08:20:43 - Eusebia: Yes, I agree. I have scheduled an appointment for next week.
28.08.2024 08:22:32 - Azaiah: That's good, Eusebia. In the meantime, try to eat healthily and rest as much as you can.
28.08.2024 08:24:09 - Eusebia: I will. Thank you for your concern, Azaiah.
28.08.2024 08:26:02 - Azaiah: Of course, Eusebia. Health is important. Let me know how it goes, okay?
28.08.2024 08:27:11 - Eusebia: I definitely will. Thanks, Azaiah.
28.08.2024 08:28:56 - Azaiah: You're welcome, Eusebia. Take care.
28.08.2024 13:35:47 - Eusebia: Hey Azaiah, how are you finding your college experience so far?
28.08.2024 13:36:39 - Azaiah: Hi Eusebia, it's been a mix of emotions. There's a lot of studying, but I'm enjoying my course and the social life.
28.08.2024 13:38:22 - Eusebia: That's great to hear! What's been the most challenging part for you?
28.08.2024 13:40:08 - Azaiah: I think the most challenging part has been managing my time effectively. There's so much to do and so little time.
28.08.2024 13:41:18 - Eusebia: I can definitely relate to that. Do you have any tips on how to handle it?
28.08.2024 13:42:40 - Azaiah: I try to make a schedule every week and stick to it. It helps to keep track of assignments and exams.
28.08.2024 13:43:49 - Eusebia: That's a good strategy. I'll try it out. Thanks, Azaiah.
28.08.2024 13:45:24 - Azaiah: No problem, Eusebia. Happy to help.

28.08.2024 08:15:10 - Eusebia: Hi Azaiah, I have been having some health issues lately.
28.08.2024 08:16:27 - Azaiah: Oh no Eusebia, sorry to hear that. What seems to be the problem?
28.08.2024 08:18:13 - Eusebia: I have been feeling very tired and weak. I also have frequent headaches.
28.08.2024 08:19:49 - Azaiah: It sounds like you need to see a doctor, Eusebia. It could be something simple like a vitamin deficiency, but it's best to get checked.
28.08.2024 08:20:43 - Eusebia: Yes, I agree. I have scheduled an appointment for next week.
28.08.2024 08:22:32 - Azaiah: That's good, Eusebia. In the meantime, try to eat healthily and rest as much as you can.
28.08.2024 08:24:09 - Eusebia: I will. Thank you for your concern, Azaiah.
28.08.2024 08:26:02 - Azaiah: Of course, Eusebia. Health is important. Let me know how it goes, okay?
28.08.2024 08:27:11 - Eusebia: I definitely will. Thanks, Azaiah.
28.08.2024 08:28:56 - Azaiah: You're welcome, Eusebia. Take care.
28.08.2024 13:35:47 - Eusebia: Hey Azaiah, how are you finding your college experience so far?
28.08.2024 13:36:39 - Azaiah: Hi Eusebia, it's been a mix of emotions. There's a lot of studying, but I'm enjoying my course and the social life.
28.08.2024 13:38:22 - Eusebia: That's great to hear! What's been the most challenging part for you?
28.08.2024 13:40:08 - Azaiah: I think the most challenging part has been managing my time effectively. There's so much to do and so little time.
28.08.2024 13:41:18 - Eusebia: I can definitely relate to that. Do you have any tips on how to handle it?
28.08.2024 13:42:40 - Azaiah: I try to make a schedule every week and stick to it. It helps to keep track of assignments and exams.
28.08.2024 13:43:49 - Eusebia: That's a good strategy. I'll try it out. Thanks, Azaiah.
28.08.2024 13:45:24 - Azaiah: No problem, Eusebia. Happy to help.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

27.08.2024 19:14:21 - Ashton: Hey guys, did you watch the game last night?
27.08.2024 19:15:15 - Ryan: Yeah, it was intense. Can't believe they scored in the last minute.
27.08.2024 19:16:58 - Linda: I missed it. Who won?
27.08.2024 19:18:11 - Ryan: The Lakers. LeBron was on fire!
27.08.2024 19:19:10 - Lavern: I need to start following basketball more closely. I always miss the good games.
27.08.2024 19:20:43 - Ashton: We should all go watch a game together sometime.
27.08.2024 19:21:35 - Linda: That sounds fun. I'm in!
27.08.2024 19:23:06 - Ryan: Me too. Let's plan it.
27.08.2024 19:24:41 - Lavern: I'm game. Let's do it.
27.08.2024 21:13:05 - Ashton: We need to figure out how to get past that alarm system tonight.
27.08.2024 21:14:48 - Ryan: I heard there's a weak spot on the west side, near the basement window.
27.08.2024 21:16:00 - Linda: Are we sure there's no backup generator? Last time we almost got caught because of that.
27.08.2024 21:16:54 - Lavern: Already checked, there's no backup this time. But the guard shift change is at 2 AM, so we need to be quick.
27.08.2024 21:18:01 - Ashton: Perfect, then we'll go in right after the shift change. Who's got the gear?
27.08.2024 21:19:42 - Ryan: I’ll bring the tools. Lavern, you’re on lookout, right?
27.08.2024 21:21:17 - Lavern: Yeah, I’ll have the van ready around the corner. Make sure you wear gloves.
27.08.2024 21:22:10 - Linda: Got it. We can’t leave any traces behind. How about the security cameras?
27.08.2024 21:23:59 - Ashton: Ryan’s got that covered. He’ll loop the feed while we’re inside.
27.08.2024 21:24:53 - Ryan: I’ll disable them as soon as we’re ready to move in. No one will even know we were there.
27.08.2024 21:26:01 - Linda: Alright, then we’re all set. Let’s get this done quickly and cleanly.
27.08.2024 21:26:56 - Lavern: Agreed. No mistakes this time. Everyone knows their role, let’s stick to it.
27.08.2024 21:27:38 - Ryan: Meet at the usual spot at 1:30 AM. Don’t be late.
27.08.2024 23:06:21 - Ashton: Hi guys, have you picked up any new hobbies during the quarantine?
27.08.2024 23:07:34 - Ryan: I've actually started baking. Never thought I'd enjoy it this much!
27.08.2024 23:08:18 - Linda: That's awesome, Ryan! I've been doing a lot of gardening. It's so therapeutic.
27.08.2024 23:09:12 - Ashton: I've heard a lot about gardening being therapeutic. Maybe I should try it too.
27.08.2024 23:10:01 - Lavern: Well, I've been doing a lot of reading. Anyone has any book suggestions?
27.08.2024 23:11:58 - Ryan: If you're into mystery, I recommend 'The Silent Patient'. It's really gripping.
27.08.2024 23:13:38 - Linda: I'm more into biographies. Recently read 'Becoming' by Michelle Obama. Highly recommend it.
27.08.2024 23:14:21 - Ashton: I've been learning guitar. If anyone's interested, I can share some learning resources.
27.08.2024 23:16:19 - Lavern: That'd be great Ashton! I've always wanted to learn a musical instrument.
27.08.2024 23:17:40 - Ryan: Same here. Please share the resources, Ashton.
27.08.2024 23:19:29 - Linda: Looking forward to it Ashton. And Ryan, do share some of your baking recipes!
27.08.2024 23:20:37 - Ashton: Sure thing. Will share the guitar resources soon.
27.08.2024 23:21:09 - Lavern: Thanks Ashton. This chat has been really helpful. Let's do this more often.
28.08.2024 03:10:31 - Ashton: Hey guys, how many siblings do you all have?
28.08.2024 03:11:05 - Ryan: I have two younger brothers and one older sister. You?
28.08.2024 03:12:29 - Linda: Just one younger sister here. 
28.08.2024 03:13:57 - Ashton: Interesting, I have one older brother and two younger sisters.
28.08.2024 03:15:35 - Lavern: I'm the only child, so no siblings here.
28.08.2024 03:17:32 - Ryan: Lavern, do you ever wish you had siblings?
28.08.2024 03:18:13 - Lavern: Sometimes, yes. But I also appreciate the perks of being an only child.
28.08.2024 03:18:59 - Linda: I think it's fun to have a sibling. I can't imagine being an only child.
28.08.2024 03:19:56 - Ashton: Agree with you Linda. My siblings and I have a lot of fun together.
28.08.2024 03:20:31 - Ryan: Yeah, siblings can be annoying but they are also your best friends.
28.08.2024 03:22:21 - Linda: So true, Ryan! Despite the fights, I wouldn't trade my sister for anything.
28.08.2024 03:23:45 - Ashton: Same here! I love my siblings to bits, even when they drive me crazy.
28.08.2024 03:24:36 - Lavern: You guys make having siblings sound so fun. Maybe I missed out on something.
28.08.2024 03:25:17 - Ryan: Every family is unique, Lavern. There are pros and cons to every situation.
28.08.2024 03:26:38 - Linda: Well said, Ryan. At the end of the day, it's the love in the family that matters.

27.08.2024 23:10:01 - Lavern: Well, I've been doing a lot of reading. Anyone has any book suggestions?
27.08.2024 23:11:58 - Ryan: If you're into mystery, I recommend 'The Silent Patient'. It's really gripping.
27.08.2024 23:13:38 - Linda: I'm more into biographies. Recently read 'Becoming' by Michelle Obama. Highly recommend it.
27.08.2024 23:14:21 - Ashton: I've been learning guitar. If anyone's interested, I can share some learning resources.
27.08.2024 23:16:19 - Lavern: That'd be great Ashton! I've always wanted to learn a musical instrument.
27.08.2024 23:17:40 - Ryan: Same here. Please share the resources, Ashton.
27.08.2024 23:19:29 - Linda: Looking forward to it Ashton. And Ryan, do share some of your baking recipes!
27.08.2024 23:20:37 - Ashton: Sure thing. Will share the guitar resources soon.
27.08.2024 23:21:09 - Lavern: Thanks Ashton. This chat has been really helpful. Let's do this more often.
28.08.2024 03:10:31 - Ashton: Hey guys, how many siblings do you all have?
28.08.2024 03:11:05 - Ryan: I have two younger brothers and one older sister. You?
28.08.2024 03:12:29 - Linda: Just one younger sister here. 
28.08.2024 03:13:57 - Ashton: Interesting, I have one older brother and two younger sisters.
28.08.2024 03:15:35 - Lavern: I'm the only child, so no siblings here.
28.08.2024 03:17:32 - Ryan: Lavern, do you ever wish you had siblings?
28.08.2024 03:18:13 - Lavern: Sometimes, yes. But I also appreciate the perks of being an only child.
28.08.2024 03:18:59 - Linda: I think it's fun to have a sibling. I can't imagine being an only child.
28.08.2024 03:19:56 - Ashton: Agree with you Linda. My siblings and I have a lot of fun together.
28.08.2024 03:20:31 - Ryan: Yeah, siblings can be annoying but they are also your best friends.
28.08.2024 03:22:21 - Linda: So true, Ryan! Despite the fights, I wouldn't trade my sister for anything.
28.08.2024 03:23:45 - Ashton: Same here! I love my siblings to bits, even when they drive me crazy.
28.08.2024 03:24:36 - Lavern: You guys make having siblings sound so fun. Maybe I missed out on something.
28.08.2024 03:25:17 - Ryan: Every family is unique, Lavern. There are pros and cons to every situation.
28.08.2024 03:26:38 - Linda: Well said, Ryan. At the end of the day, it's the love in the family that matters.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

25.08.2024 14:23:47 - Amanda: Got the package, Paulette?
25.08.2024 14:25:20 - Paulette: Yeah, just picked it up. Quality seems good this time.
25.08.2024 14:26:19 - Amanda: Nice. Same spot for the drop-off tomorrow?
25.08.2024 14:27:31 - Paulette: You got it. Usual time?
25.08.2024 14:29:11 - Amanda: Make it 3 PM. We need to avoid the heat.
25.08.2024 14:30:24 - Paulette: Works for me. How many units we talking?
25.08.2024 14:30:59 - Amanda: 10 this round. And keep an eye out, I heard there's some new heat in the area.
25.08.2024 14:31:32 - Paulette: Already on it. Got a guy keeping watch.
25.08.2024 14:33:01 - Amanda: Perfect. Let's keep this smooth. We can't afford any slip-ups now.
25.08.2024 14:34:36 - Paulette: Agreed. Stay sharp, Amanda.
25.08.2024 14:35:06 - Amanda: Always. See you tomorrow.
25.08.2024 16:23:41 - Amanda: Hi Paulette, I am planning a trip and could use some advice.
25.08.2024 16:25:00 - Paulette: Sure Amanda, I would love to help. Where are you planning to go?
25.08.2024 16:26:12 - Amanda: I was thinking about Europe. Maybe France or Italy.
25.08.2024 16:27:44 - Paulette: Oh, both are great choices! Do you prefer cities or countryside?
25.08.2024 16:28:51 - Amanda: I think a bit of both. I love history, but I also enjoy relaxing in nature.
25.08.2024 16:30:21 - Paulette: Then I would recommend Italy. You can visit Rome and Florence for the history and Tuscany for the beautiful countryside.
25.08.2024 16:31:11 - Amanda: That sounds perfect. Do you have any hotel recommendations?
25.08.2024 16:32:38 - Paulette: In Rome, Hotel Hassler is a great option. In Florence, check out the St. Regis, and in Tuscany, Castello Banfi il Borgo is beautiful.
25.08.2024 16:33:33 - Amanda: Thanks Paulette, I will check them out. Any must-see sights or activities?
25.08.2024 16:35:31 - Paulette: In Rome, the Colosseum and Vatican are must-sees. Florence is famous for its art galleries, and in Tuscany, you can go wine tasting.
25.08.2024 16:36:24 - Amanda: Sounds amazing. I can't wait!
25.08.2024 16:37:00 - Paulette: You're going to have a great time. Don't forget to try the local cuisine!
25.08.2024 16:37:48 - Amanda: I won't! Thanks for all your help, Paulette.
25.08.2024 21:38:25 - Amanda: Hey Paulette, do you have the notes from yesterday's Chemistry class?
25.08.2024 21:40:03 - Paulette: Hi Amanda! Yes, I do. Do you want me to send them over?
25.08.2024 21:41:54 - Amanda: Yes please, that would be great. I missed the class because of basketball practice.
25.08.2024 21:42:51 - Paulette: No problem, I'll send them to you shortly. How's the basketball team doing?
25.08.2024 21:44:41 - Amanda: We're doing good. We've been practicing for the upcoming tournament.
25.08.2024 21:45:22 - Paulette: That sounds exciting! I'll come and cheer for you guys.
25.08.2024 21:47:13 - Amanda: That'd be great, thanks! We could use all the support we can get.
25.08.2024 21:48:45 - Paulette: Of course, we're in this high school journey together after all. I'll send the notes now.
25.08.2024 21:49:36 - Amanda: Thanks, Paulette. You're a lifesaver!
25.08.2024 21:50:13 - Paulette: Anything for a friend. Let's ace this semester together!
26.08.2024 00:40:31 - Amanda: Hey Paulette! Have you watched the latest season of The Crown yet?
26.08.2024 00:42:30 - Paulette: Hi Amanda! No, not yet. Is it any good?
26.08.2024 00:43:53 - Amanda: Oh it's brilliant! The portrayal of Princess Diana is just amazing.
26.08.2024 00:45:18 - Paulette: Oh wow, I'll have to check it out then!
26.08.2024 00:46:12 - Amanda: You definitely should. Do you have any show recommendations for me?
26.08.2024 00:47:33 - Paulette: Hmm, have you tried watching The Queen's Gambit? It's not exactly a historical drama, but it's really entertaining.
26.08.2024 00:49:31 - Amanda: No, I haven't. I'll add it to my watch list. Thanks!
26.08.2024 00:50:37 - Paulette: No problem! Let me know what you think once you've watched it.
26.08.2024 00:51:41 - Amanda: Sure thing. By the way, have you heard of the new movie Tenet?
26.08.2024 00:52:33 - Paulette: Yes, I've heard of it but not watched it. Is it worth watching?
26.08.2024 00:53:24 - Amanda: It's a bit complicated but if you love Nolan's movies, you'll enjoy it.
26.08.2024 00:55:06 - Paulette: I do enjoy his movies. I'll give it a go then. Thanks, Amanda!
26.08.2024 00:56:02 - Amanda: You're welcome! Enjoy your movie night, Paulette!
26.08.2024 05:32:44 - Amanda: Hi Paulette, have you ever pondered about the concept of existence? What it truly means to exist?
26.08.2024 05:34:36 - Paulette: Hello Amanda, that's a deep question. I think existence is subjective. It's different for every individual based on their perception.
26.08.2024 05:35:15 - Amanda: That's an interesting viewpoint. What about the idea of reality? Do you think our reality is constructed by our minds or is it an independent entity?
26.08.2024 05:36:13 - Paulette: I lean towards the concept of constructed reality. Our experiences and perceptions shape our reality.
26.08.2024 05:36:59 - Amanda: So, would you say our thoughts and consciousness shape the reality around us?
26.08.2024 05:38:20 - Paulette: Yes, I believe so. But at the same time, I think there are certain objective truths or realities that exist beyond our perceptions.
26.08.2024 05:39:54 - Amanda: It's fascinating to think about, isn't it? How our minds can potentially shape the world around us.
26.08.2024 05:41:00 - Paulette: Definitely, it's an intriguing subject. Philosophy really makes you question the world and your place in it.
26.08.2024 11:07:10 - Amanda: Hey Paulette, have you tried that new Italian restaurant downtown?
26.08.2024 11:09:07 - Paulette: Hi Amanda, are you talking about Bella Napoli?
26.08.2024 11:10:16 - Amanda: Yes, that's the one! I heard it's really good.
26.08.2024 11:11:02 - Paulette: I've been there once. The pasta was amazing!
26.08.2024 11:12:03 - Amanda: Really? What else did you try?
26.08.2024 11:13:45 - Paulette: I also had the tiramisu. It was absolutely delicious.
26.08.2024 11:14:49 - Amanda: That sounds great. I'm thinking of going there this weekend.
26.08.2024 11:15:27 - Paulette: You should! And make sure to try their seafood risotto. It's their specialty.
26.08.2024 11:17:22 - Amanda: Seafood risotto, got it. Thanks for the recommendation, Paulette!
26.08.2024 11:18:50 - Paulette: You're welcome, Amanda. Enjoy your meal!
26.08.2024 15:16:47 - Amanda: Hi Paulette, have you seen the new season of Stranger Things yet?
26.08.2024 15:17:18 - Paulette: Hey Amanda, not yet. Is it good?
26.08.2024 15:19:11 - Amanda: It's amazing! I love how they've developed the characters.
26.08.2024 15:20:43 - Paulette: That sounds promising. I'll have to catch up soon.
26.08.2024 15:22:33 - Amanda: You should! Oh, and have you seen The Witcher?
26.08.2024 15:23:44 - Paulette: No, I haven't. Is it worth a watch?
26.08.2024 15:25:10 - Amanda: Absolutely! The storyline is so intriguing.
26.08.2024 15:27:05 - Paulette: I'll add that to my list too then. Thanks for the recommendations, Amanda.
26.08.2024 15:27:55 - Amanda: You're welcome, Paulette! Enjoy your TV time.
26.08.2024 15:29:51 - Paulette: Definitely will. Talk to you later, Amanda.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

01.06.2022 09:51:08 - Joseph: Hi guys, have you read any good books lately?
01.06.2022 09:51:52 - Elizabeth: Hey Joseph, I just finished 'Educated' by Tara Westover. It's a memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge.
01.06.2022 09:53:22 - Justin: Sounds intense Elizabeth. I've been reading 'The Silent Patient'. It's a psychological thriller about a woman who refuses to speak after allegedly murdering her husband.
01.06.2022 09:53:57 - Joseph: I've heard about 'The Silent Patient', Justin. It's supposed to have a great twist at the end.
01.06.2022 09:54:39 - Elizabeth: Oh, that sounds interesting, Justin. I might check it out after I'm done with my current read.
01.06.2022 09:55:13 - Justin: You should, Elizabeth. It's a page-turner.
01.06.2022 09:55:49 - Joseph: I'm looking for something a bit lighter. Any recommendations?
01.06.2022 09:57:29 - Elizabeth: How about 'Eleanor Oliphant is Completely Fine'? It's a heartwarming story about friendship and self-discovery.
01.06.2022 09:58:09 - Justin: Or 'A Man Called Ove'. It's a funny and touching book about a grumpy old man who finds his world turned upside down when a chatty family moves in next door.
01.06.2022 09:58:51 - Joseph: Thank you, guys. I'll look into these books.
01.06.2022 13:31:34 - Joseph: Hey guys, do you remember when we used to fight over the remote control?
01.06.2022 13:32:18 - Elizabeth: Oh yes, those were the days. Justin, you always wanted to watch cartoons.
01.06.2022 13:33:27 - Justin: And you, Liz, always wanted to watch those boring documentaries!
01.06.2022 13:34:43 - Joseph: And now, look at us. We all have our own TVs, but we miss those fights.
01.06.2022 13:35:39 - Elizabeth: Indeed, Joe. It's the fights and bickering that actually brought us closer as siblings.
01.06.2022 13:36:19 - Justin: True, Liz. Now, we may have our own TVs, but we've also got our own lives. I miss you guys.
01.06.2022 13:37:47 - Joseph: Well, we should plan a reunion soon. And this time, we’ll let Justin have the remote control.
01.06.2022 13:39:45 - Elizabeth: Sounds like a plan, Joe! Justin, you better not make us watch cartoons all day.
01.06.2022 13:40:30 - Justin: Deal! But only if you promise not to make us watch any documentaries, Liz.
01.06.2022 18:30:00 - Joseph: Hey, I've got a new shipment coming in
01.06.2022 18:30:30 - Elizabeth: That's great news Joseph. When can we expect it?
01.06.2022 18:32:19 - Joseph: It should be by tomorrow night
01.06.2022 18:33:33 - Justin: Are we talking about the same high-quality stuff?
01.06.2022 18:35:23 - Joseph: Yes Justin, the same one. We need to ensure everything goes smoothly
01.06.2022 18:36:20 - Elizabeth: I have the perfect location for the drop-off. It's secluded and safe
01.06.2022 18:37:13 - Justin: Elizabeth, let's discuss the location details privately
01.06.2022 18:38:45 - Joseph: Good idea Justin. We all need to be careful
01.06.2022 18:40:09 - Elizabeth: Absolutely, safety first
01.06.2022 18:41:15 - Joseph: I'll update you both once the shipment is near
01.06.2022 23:42:32 - Joseph: Hey guys, have you been keeping up with your fitness routines during the lockdown?
01.06.2022 23:44:12 - Elizabeth: Not as much as I would like, Joseph. I've found it hard to stay motivated without the gym.
01.06.2022 23:44:58 - Justin: I've actually been doing quite well with home workouts, surprisingly. It was tough initially, but I've found a rhythm now.
01.06.2022 23:45:38 - Joseph: That's great, Justin! Elizabeth, perhaps you could try mixing things up a bit? Maybe try yoga or dance workouts?
01.06.2022 23:46:42 - Elizabeth: I think that's a great idea, Joseph. I'll look into it.
01.06.2022 23:47:13 - Justin: There are tons of free resources online, Elizabeth. I can send you some links if you'd like.
01.06.2022 23:48:29 - Elizabeth: That would be great, Justin. Thanks a lot!
01.06.2022 23:50:25 - Joseph: It's important that we all keep active, especially now. Remember, health is wealth.
01.06.2022 23:52:20 - Justin: Agreed, Joseph. Let's all try and motivate each other.
01.06.2022 23:53:33 - Elizabeth: I'm in. Let's do this!

prompt_1.content:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

01.06.2022 09:51:08 - Joseph: Hi guys, have you read any good books lately?
01.06.2022 09:51:52 - Elizabeth: Hey Joseph, I just finished 'Educated' by Tara Westover. It's a memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge.
01.06.2022 09:53:22 - Justin: Sounds intense Elizabeth. I've been reading 'The Silent Patient'. It's a psychological thriller about a woman who refuses to speak after allegedly murdering her husband.
01.06.2022 09:53:57 - Joseph: I've heard about 'The Silent Patient', Justin. It's supposed to have a great twist at the end.
01.06.2022 09:54:39 - Elizabeth: Oh, that sounds interesting, Justin. I might check it out after I'm done with my current read.
01.06.2022 09:55:13 - Justin: You should, Elizabeth. It's a page-turner.
01.06.2022 09:55:49 - Joseph: I'm looking for something a bit lighter. Any recommendations?
01.06.2022 09:57:29 - Elizabeth: How about 'Eleanor Oliphant is Completely Fine'? It's a heartwarming story about friendship and self-discovery.
01.06.2022 09:58:09 - Justin: Or 'A Man Called Ove'. It's a funny and touching book about a grumpy old man who finds his world turned upside down when a chatty family moves in next door.
01.06.2022 09:58:51 - Joseph: Thank you, guys. I'll look into these books.
01.06.2022 13:31:34 - Joseph: Hey guys, do you remember when we used to fight over the remote control?
01.06.2022 13:32:18 - Elizabeth: Oh yes, those were the days. Justin, you always wanted to watch cartoons.
01.06.2022 13:33:27 - Justin: And you, Liz, always wanted to watch those boring documentaries!
01.06.2022 13:34:43 - Joseph: And now, look at us. We all have our own TVs, but we miss those fights.
01.06.2022 13:35:39 - Elizabeth: Indeed, Joe. It's the fights and bickering that actually brought us closer as siblings.
01.06.2022 13:36:19 - Justin: True, Liz. Now, we may have our own TVs, but we've also got our own lives. I miss you guys.
01.06.2022 13:37:47 - Joseph: Well, we should plan a reunion soon. And this time, we’ll let Justin have the remote control.
01.06.2022 13:39:45 - Elizabeth: Sounds like a plan, Joe! Justin, you better not make us watch cartoons all day.
01.06.2022 13:40:30 - Justin: Deal! But only if you promise not to make us watch any documentaries, Liz.
01.06.2022 18:30:00 - Joseph: Hey, I've got a new shipment coming in
01.06.2022 18:30:30 - Elizabeth: That's great news Joseph. When can we expect it?
01.06.2022 18:32:19 - Joseph: It should be by tomorrow night
01.06.2022 18:33:33 - Justin: Are we talking about the same high-quality stuff?
01.06.2022 18:35:23 - Joseph: Yes Justin, the same one. We need to ensure everything goes smoothly
01.06.2022 18:36:20 - Elizabeth: I have the perfect location for the drop-off. It's secluded and safe
01.06.2022 18:37:13 - Justin: Elizabeth, let's discuss the location details privately
01.06.2022 18:38:45 - Joseph: Good idea Justin. We all need to be careful
01.06.2022 18:40:09 - Elizabeth: Absolutely, safety first
01.06.2022 18:41:15 - Joseph: I'll update you both once the shipment is near
01.06.2022 23:42:32 - Joseph: Hey guys, have you been keeping up with your fitness routines during the lockdown?
01.06.2022 23:44:12 - Elizabeth: Not as much as I would like, Joseph. I've found it hard to stay motivated without the gym.
01.06.2022 23:44:58 - Justin: I've actually been doing quite well with home workouts, surprisingly. It was tough initially, but I've found a rhythm now.
01.06.2022 23:45:38 - Joseph: That's great, Justin! Elizabeth, perhaps you could try mixing things up a bit? Maybe try yoga or dance workouts?
01.06.2022 23:46:42 - Elizabeth: I think that's a great idea, Joseph. I'll look into it.
01.06.2022 23:47:13 - Justin: There are tons of free resources online, Elizabeth. I can send you some links if you'd like.
01.06.2022 23:48:29 - Elizabeth: That would be great, Justin. Thanks a lot!
01.06.2022 23:50:25 - Joseph: It's important that we all keep active, especially now. Remember, health is wealth.
01.06.2022 23:52:20 - Justin: Agreed, Joseph. Let's all try and motivate each other.
01.06.2022 23:53:33 - Elizabeth: I'm in. Let's do this!

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

26.08.2024 23:45:12 - Nicholas: The vault’s security is tighter than expected. We might need an alternative entry point.
26.08.2024 23:46:17 - Scharron: Did you check the ventilation system on the south side? It could be our best bet.
26.08.2024 23:48:10 - Nicholas: Already on it. It’s narrow, but it’s doable. We’ll need to cut power to avoid triggering alarms.
26.08.2024 23:48:46 - Scharron: Agreed. I’ll handle the power grid. You just make sure the cameras are looped before we move in.
26.08.2024 23:50:10 - Nicholas: Looping the cameras now. We’ll have a 15-minute window. Is the getaway vehicle ready?
26.08.2024 23:50:58 - Scharron: Yes, it’s parked two blocks away. Remember, we’ve got to be quick. The guards change shifts at 02:00.
26.08.2024 23:52:01 - Nicholas: Perfect timing then. I’ll signal you once I’m inside. Stay sharp.
26.08.2024 23:53:07 - Scharron: Understood. Let’s make this clean. We can’t afford any mistakes tonight.
26.08.2024 23:54:08 - Nicholas: Copy that. I’m heading in now. Keep the comms open in case things go sideways.
26.08.2024 23:55:28 - Scharron: I’m monitoring everything from here. If something goes wrong, I’ll create a diversion.
27.08.2024 04:49:22 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, have you seen the latest episode of Breaking Bad?
27.08.2024 04:50:09 - Scharron: Hi Nicholas, yes I did. The episode was mind-blowing, wasn't it?
27.08.2024 04:51:46 - Nicholas: Absolutely, I never expected Walt to take such a drastic step.
27.08.2024 04:52:29 - Scharron: True, the character development is really interesting in this series.
27.08.2024 04:53:28 - Nicholas: I agree. This is why I prefer Breaking Bad over other series.
27.08.2024 04:54:18 - Scharron: I can see your point, but have you ever watched Game of Thrones? The plot twists are amazing.
27.08.2024 04:55:40 - Nicholas: I haven't yet, but I've heard a lot about it. I will definitely give it a try.
27.08.2024 04:56:50 - Scharron: You should, Nicholas. It's really worth it.
27.08.2024 04:57:57 - Nicholas: I will definitely watch it soon. Thanks for the recommendation, Scharron.
27.08.2024 04:58:30 - Scharron: No problem, Nicholas. Let's discuss it once you've seen a few episodes.
27.08.2024 08:57:08 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, what's your favorite sport?
27.08.2024 08:57:51 - Scharron: Hey Nicholas! I really like basketball. How about you?
27.08.2024 08:59:49 - Nicholas: I'm more into soccer actually. 
27.08.2024 09:01:17 - Scharron: That's cool! Do you play or just watch?
27.08.2024 09:02:02 - Nicholas: I play occasionally, but mostly watch. 
27.08.2024 09:03:23 - Scharron: I used to play basketball in college.
27.08.2024 09:05:01 - Nicholas: Oh really? That's impressive. 
27.08.2024 09:06:14 - Scharron: Yeah, it was a great experience.
27.08.2024 09:06:44 - Nicholas: I bet it was. Do you still play now?
27.08.2024 09:07:16 - Scharron: Not as much as I'd like to, but I try to keep up with it.
27.08.2024 09:08:39 - Nicholas: That's nice. It's important to keep doing what you love.
27.08.2024 09:10:11 - Scharron: Absolutely. Maybe we can play a game sometime!
27.08.2024 09:12:08 - Nicholas: That sounds like a great idea!
27.08.2024 10:01:12 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, have you ever had a lucid dream?
27.08.2024 10:02:48 - Scharron: Hi Nicholas, yes I have. It's quite a fascinating experience.
27.08.2024 10:04:19 - Nicholas: Really? Can you control what happens in those dreams?
27.08.2024 10:05:36 - Scharron: To some extent, yes. But it takes practice and not all dreams are lucid.
27.08.2024 10:07:15 - Nicholas: I see. I want to learn how to have lucid dreams. Any advice?
27.08.2024 10:08:25 - Scharron: Well, it involves recognizing that you're dreaming while you're in the dream. A trick is to look for details that don't make sense in real life.
27.08.2024 10:09:20 - Nicholas: That sounds challenging but fun. I'll give it a try.
27.08.2024 10:10:30 - Scharron: Good luck, Nicholas! Remember, it might take time. Don't get frustrated.
27.08.2024 10:11:15 - Nicholas: Thanks for the advice, Scharron. I'll keep that in mind.
27.08.2024 10:13:13 - Scharron: You're welcome, Nicholas. Let me know if you have any success or need more tips.
27.08.2024 13:34:29 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, how are you doing?
27.08.2024 13:35:03 - Scharron: Hi Nicholas, I'm doing well. How about you?
27.08.2024 13:36:01 - Nicholas: I'm good too. Been wondering how the kids are doing.
27.08.2024 13:37:35 - Scharron: They're all fine. Growing up so fast. The eldest just started middle school.
27.08.2024 13:39:15 - Nicholas: Wow, time flies. How are they coping with the new environment?
27.08.2024 13:40:02 - Scharron: They're adjusting well. It's a bit challenging but they're managing.
27.08.2024 13:41:56 - Nicholas: That's good to hear. And how's your husband?
27.08.2024 13:43:23 - Scharron: He's doing well. Busy with work as always.
27.08.2024 13:45:12 - Nicholas: Send my regards to him. We should plan a family get together soon.
27.08.2024 13:46:47 - Scharron: That sounds like a great idea. The kids would love that.
27.08.2024 19:13:44 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, any plans for the weekend?
27.08.2024 19:15:26 - Scharron: Not sure yet, maybe just some Netflix and chill. How about you?
27.08.2024 19:16:46 - Nicholas: I'm thinking about going hiking, the weather should be good.
27.08.2024 19:18:12 - Scharron: That sounds fun, where are you planning to go?
27.08.2024 19:19:59 - Nicholas: Probably the local national park, wanna join?
27.08.2024 19:20:32 - Scharron: I'd love to, but I am not feeling too adventurous lately.
27.08.2024 19:21:04 - Nicholas: No problem, maybe next time. We could do a movie night instead?
27.08.2024 19:21:47 - Scharron: Sure, that sounds great. Any movie suggestions?
27.08.2024 19:22:59 - Nicholas: How about 'The Shawshank Redemption'? It's a classic.
27.08.2024 19:23:36 - Scharron: Oh, I love that movie. It's a deal then.
27.08.2024 19:24:35 - Nicholas: Great, see you on Saturday then.
27.08.2024 19:25:28 - Scharron: Looking forward to it, see you!
