Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

26.08.2024 23:45:12 - Nicholas: The vault’s security is tighter than expected. We might need an alternative entry point.
26.08.2024 23:46:17 - Scharron: Did you check the ventilation system on the south side? It could be our best bet.
26.08.2024 23:48:10 - Nicholas: Already on it. It’s narrow, but it’s doable. We’ll need to cut power to avoid triggering alarms.
26.08.2024 23:48:46 - Scharron: Agreed. I’ll handle the power grid. You just make sure the cameras are looped before we move in.
26.08.2024 23:50:10 - Nicholas: Looping the cameras now. We’ll have a 15-minute window. Is the getaway vehicle ready?
26.08.2024 23:50:58 - Scharron: Yes, it’s parked two blocks away. Remember, we’ve got to be quick. The guards change shifts at 02:00.
26.08.2024 23:52:01 - Nicholas: Perfect timing then. I’ll signal you once I’m inside. Stay sharp.
26.08.2024 23:53:07 - Scharron: Understood. Let’s make this clean. We can’t afford any mistakes tonight.
26.08.2024 23:54:08 - Nicholas: Copy that. I’m heading in now. Keep the comms open in case things go sideways.
26.08.2024 23:55:28 - Scharron: I’m monitoring everything from here. If something goes wrong, I’ll create a diversion.
27.08.2024 04:49:22 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, have you seen the latest episode of Breaking Bad?
27.08.2024 04:50:09 - Scharron: Hi Nicholas, yes I did. The episode was mind-blowing, wasn't it?
27.08.2024 04:51:46 - Nicholas: Absolutely, I never expected Walt to take such a drastic step.
27.08.2024 04:52:29 - Scharron: True, the character development is really interesting in this series.
27.08.2024 04:53:28 - Nicholas: I agree. This is why I prefer Breaking Bad over other series.
27.08.2024 04:54:18 - Scharron: I can see your point, but have you ever watched Game of Thrones? The plot twists are amazing.
27.08.2024 04:55:40 - Nicholas: I haven't yet, but I've heard a lot about it. I will definitely give it a try.
27.08.2024 04:56:50 - Scharron: You should, Nicholas. It's really worth it.
27.08.2024 04:57:57 - Nicholas: I will definitely watch it soon. Thanks for the recommendation, Scharron.
27.08.2024 04:58:30 - Scharron: No problem, Nicholas. Let's discuss it once you've seen a few episodes.
27.08.2024 08:57:08 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, what's your favorite sport?
27.08.2024 08:57:51 - Scharron: Hey Nicholas! I really like basketball. How about you?
27.08.2024 08:59:49 - Nicholas: I'm more into soccer actually. 
27.08.2024 09:01:17 - Scharron: That's cool! Do you play or just watch?
27.08.2024 09:02:02 - Nicholas: I play occasionally, but mostly watch. 
27.08.2024 09:03:23 - Scharron: I used to play basketball in college.
27.08.2024 09:05:01 - Nicholas: Oh really? That's impressive. 
27.08.2024 09:06:14 - Scharron: Yeah, it was a great experience.
27.08.2024 09:06:44 - Nicholas: I bet it was. Do you still play now?
27.08.2024 09:07:16 - Scharron: Not as much as I'd like to, but I try to keep up with it.
27.08.2024 09:08:39 - Nicholas: That's nice. It's important to keep doing what you love.
27.08.2024 09:10:11 - Scharron: Absolutely. Maybe we can play a game sometime!
27.08.2024 09:12:08 - Nicholas: That sounds like a great idea!
27.08.2024 10:01:12 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, have you ever had a lucid dream?
27.08.2024 10:02:48 - Scharron: Hi Nicholas, yes I have. It's quite a fascinating experience.
27.08.2024 10:04:19 - Nicholas: Really? Can you control what happens in those dreams?
27.08.2024 10:05:36 - Scharron: To some extent, yes. But it takes practice and not all dreams are lucid.
27.08.2024 10:07:15 - Nicholas: I see. I want to learn how to have lucid dreams. Any advice?
27.08.2024 10:08:25 - Scharron: Well, it involves recognizing that you're dreaming while you're in the dream. A trick is to look for details that don't make sense in real life.
27.08.2024 10:09:20 - Nicholas: That sounds challenging but fun. I'll give it a try.
27.08.2024 10:10:30 - Scharron: Good luck, Nicholas! Remember, it might take time. Don't get frustrated.
27.08.2024 10:11:15 - Nicholas: Thanks for the advice, Scharron. I'll keep that in mind.
27.08.2024 10:13:13 - Scharron: You're welcome, Nicholas. Let me know if you have any success or need more tips.
27.08.2024 13:34:29 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, how are you doing?
27.08.2024 13:35:03 - Scharron: Hi Nicholas, I'm doing well. How about you?
27.08.2024 13:36:01 - Nicholas: I'm good too. Been wondering how the kids are doing.
27.08.2024 13:37:35 - Scharron: They're all fine. Growing up so fast. The eldest just started middle school.
27.08.2024 13:39:15 - Nicholas: Wow, time flies. How are they coping with the new environment?
27.08.2024 13:40:02 - Scharron: They're adjusting well. It's a bit challenging but they're managing.
27.08.2024 13:41:56 - Nicholas: That's good to hear. And how's your husband?
27.08.2024 13:43:23 - Scharron: He's doing well. Busy with work as always.
27.08.2024 13:45:12 - Nicholas: Send my regards to him. We should plan a family get together soon.
27.08.2024 13:46:47 - Scharron: That sounds like a great idea. The kids would love that.
27.08.2024 19:13:44 - Nicholas: Hey Scharron, any plans for the weekend?
27.08.2024 19:15:26 - Scharron: Not sure yet, maybe just some Netflix and chill. How about you?
27.08.2024 19:16:46 - Nicholas: I'm thinking about going hiking, the weather should be good.

27.08.2024 19:21:04 - Nicholas: No problem, maybe next time. We could do a movie night instead?

27.08.2024 19:25:28 - Scharron: Looking forward to it, see you!

05.08.2022 04:29:30 - Aliyah: I didn't know that, Salik. I love baking. There's something satisfying about creating something tasty from scratch.

05.08.2022 04:32:51 - Alex: Wow, we have some diverse interests here. Sydney, have you ever considered selling your paintings?

05.08.2022 04:37:12 - Aliyah: That would be amazing, Salik. Chester, where's your favorite place to hike?
05.08.2022 04:38:14 - Chester: I love hiking in the Rockies, Aliyah. The views are incredible.
05.08.2022 04:38:55 - Alex: Those sound like great experiences. Let's make a pact to try out each other's hobbies sometime.

05.08.2022 14:01:41 - Salik: It's a priceless artifact, last seen in the vault of a billionaire tycoon.
05.08.2022 14:03:11 - Aliyah: Getting into that vault won't be easy. We'll need a solid plan.

05.08.2022 14:15:52 - Aliyah: We'll need it. See you tomorrow.

05.08.2022 18:32:11 - Chester: Both views have merit, but I'm intrigued by the notion of compatibilism, which combines free will and determinism. It suggests that free will is compatible with determinism.
05.08.2022 18:33:35 - Alex: That's a fascinating perspective, Chester. Can we dive deeper into compatibilism?
05.08.2022 18:34:44 - Sydney: Sure, we can look at it in terms of cause and effect. Compatibilism suggests that our actions are both caused by previous events and also by our decisions.
05.08.2022 18:36:34 - Salik: So, in essence, it's like saying although our choices are influenced, they're still our choices. That's a thought-provoking take.
05.08.2022 18:38:18 - Aliyah: I like the idea of compatibilism. It seems to provide a balance between free will and determinism.
05.08.2022 18:40:00 - Chester: Exactly, Aliyah. It's all about finding that balance. It's a complex topic, but worth exploring in depth.

05.08.2022 04:24:39 - Alex: Hi guys, I was thinking we could share our favorite hobbies and maybe learn something new from each other.
05.08.2022 04:26:16 - Sydney: That sounds like a fun idea, Alex. I'll start - I love painting, it's my way of expressing my creativity and it relaxes me.
05.08.2022 04:27:56 - Salik: That's cool, Sydney. I enjoy playing the guitar. I find it therapeutic.
05.08.2022 04:29:30 - Aliyah: I didn't know that, Salik. I love baking. There's something satisfying about creating something tasty from scratch.
05.08.2022 04:31:07 - Chester: Interesting hobbies everyone! I'm a big fan of hiking. Being in nature and the physical activity really clears my mind.
05.08.2022 04:32:51 - Alex: Wow, we have some diverse interests here. Sydney, have you ever considered selling your paintings?
05.08.2022 04:34:31 - Sydney: I've thought about it, Alex. But for now, I just enjoy doing it for myself. Salik, do you play in a band or just for fun?
05.08.2022 04:35:29 - Salik: Just for fun, Sydney. But I do dream of performing on stage one day.
05.08.2022 04:37:12 - Aliyah: That would be amazing, Salik. Chester, where's your favorite place to hike?
05.08.2022 04:38:14 - Chester: I love hiking in the Rockies, Aliyah. The views are incredible.
05.08.2022 04:38:55 - Alex: Those sound like great experiences. Let's make a pact to try out each other's hobbies sometime.
05.08.2022 10:02:51 - Alex: Hey guys, have you seen the latest concert line-ups?
05.08.2022 10:04:18 - Sydney: No, not yet. Who's performing?
05.08.2022 10:05:49 - Salik: I heard that Coldplay is headlining.
05.08.2022 10:06:23 - Aliyah: Really? I love Coldplay! When is it?
05.08.2022 10:07:32 - Chester: It's on the 30th next month. We should all go.
05.08.2022 10:09:05 - Alex: That sounds like a great idea. Let's do it.
05.08.2022 10:09:40 - Sydney: I'm in! Let's buy the tickets tomorrow.
05.08.2022 10:11:10 - Salik: Sounds like a plan. I'll check the prices.
05.08.2022 10:12:13 - Aliyah: Great, let's meet at the coffee shop to plan this out.
05.08.2022 10:12:56 - Chester: Perfect. See you guys tomorrow.
05.08.2022 10:14:47 - Alex: Looking forward to it.
05.08.2022 10:15:46 - Sydney: Me too. Can't wait!
05.08.2022 10:17:00 - Salik: It's going to be fun.
05.08.2022 10:17:52 - Aliyah: Definitely. Concerts are always fun with you guys.
05.08.2022 10:18:50 - Chester: Couldn't agree more. See you all tomorrow.
05.08.2022 14:00:00 - Alex: I've got a lead on the next mark. The Golden Griffin, it's called.
05.08.2022 14:00:39 - Sydney: Sounds exotic. What's the story?
05.08.2022 14:01:41 - Salik: It's a priceless artifact, last seen in the vault of a billionaire tycoon.
05.08.2022 14:03:11 - Aliyah: Getting into that vault won't be easy. We'll need a solid plan.
05.08.2022 14:04:25 - Chester: And the right tools. I can handle that part.
05.08.2022 14:05:37 - Alex: Sydney, start gathering intel on the tycoon's security measures.
05.08.2022 14:07:23 - Sydney: On it. Salik, let's touch base later. We need to map out the building.
05.08.2022 14:08:28 - Salik: Agreed. Aliyah, can you work on possible escape routes?
05.08.2022 14:10:12 - Aliyah: Sure thing. Chester, I'll need your help with that.
05.08.2022 14:11:55 - Chester: No problem, Aliyah. We've got this.
05.08.2022 14:13:30 - Alex: Let's meet tomorrow at dawn. Everyone knows their role.
05.08.2022 14:14:41 - Sydney: See you all tomorrow. Stay safe.
05.08.2022 14:15:22 - Salik: Good luck, everyone.
05.08.2022 14:15:52 - Aliyah: We'll need it. See you tomorrow.
05.08.2022 14:17:42 - Chester: Until then, team.

05.08.2022 14:05:37 - Alex: Sydney, start gathering intel on the tycoon's security measures.
05.08.2022 14:07:23 - Sydney: On it. Salik, let's touch base later. We need to map out the building.
05.08.2022 14:08:28 - Salik: Agreed. Aliyah, can you work on possible escape routes?
05.08.2022 14:10:12 - Aliyah: Sure thing. Chester, I'll need your help with that.
05.08.2022 14:11:55 - Chester: No problem, Aliyah. We've got this.
05.08.2022 14:13:30 - Alex: Let's meet tomorrow at dawn. Everyone knows their role.
05.08.2022 14:14:41 - Sydney: See you all tomorrow. Stay safe.
05.08.2022 14:15:22 - Salik: Good luck, everyone.
05.08.2022 14:15:52 - Aliyah: We'll need it. See you tomorrow.
05.08.2022 14:17:42 - Chester: Until then, team.
05.08.2022 17:06:33 - Alex: Hey guys, did anyone watch the football game last night?
05.08.2022 17:07:47 - Sydney: I did, it was quite intense. I can't believe they went into overtime!
05.08.2022 17:09:31 - Salik: I missed it, had to work late. Who won in the end?
05.08.2022 17:10:47 - Aliyah: The Tigers did. They scored a goal in the last minute. It was really exciting!
05.08.2022 17:11:58 - Chester: I knew it! I bet on them. They've been playing really well this season.
05.08.2022 17:13:58 - Alex: Chester, you're always lucky with your bets.
05.08.2022 17:15:09 - Salik: Can someone tell me the final score?
05.08.2022 17:16:18 - Sydney: It was 3-2 for the Tigers.
05.08.2022 17:17:10 - Aliyah: Salik, you should really try to catch the next game. It's against the Hawks, it's going to be a good one.
05.08.2022 17:18:42 - Chester: I agree with Aliyah. The Hawks are a tough team, it's going to be a great match.
05.08.2022 17:20:06 - Alex: Let's all watch it together. Game night at my place?
05.08.2022 17:22:01 - Sydney: Sounds good to me. What about you guys?
05.08.2022 17:23:29 - Salik: I'm in. Thanks, Alex.
05.08.2022 17:24:00 - Aliyah: Me too. Looking forward to it.
05.08.2022 17:25:56 - Chester: Count me in. I'll bring the snacks.
05.08.2022 18:27:40 - Alex: Hello everyone, have you ever thought about the concept of free will versus determinism?
05.08.2022 18:28:42 - Sydney: That's a deep topic, Alex. I believe in determinism. Every action we take is a result of some previous action or event.
05.08.2022 18:30:07 - Salik: Interesting Sydney, but I lean more towards free will. I think we have the power to make our own choices, independent of any predetermined path.
05.08.2022 18:31:37 - Aliyah: I think it's a mix of both. Our surroundings and upbringing might shape us, but we still have the power to make decisions.
05.08.2022 18:32:11 - Chester: Both views have merit, but I'm intrigued by the notion of compatibilism, which combines free will and determinism. It suggests that free will is compatible with determinism.
05.08.2022 18:33:35 - Alex: That's a fascinating perspective, Chester. Can we dive deeper into compatibilism?
05.08.2022 18:34:44 - Sydney: Sure, we can look at it in terms of cause and effect. Compatibilism suggests that our actions are both caused by previous events and also by our decisions.
05.08.2022 18:36:34 - Salik: So, in essence, it's like saying although our choices are influenced, they're still our choices. That's a thought-provoking take.
05.08.2022 18:38:18 - Aliyah: I like the idea of compatibilism. It seems to provide a balance between free will and determinism.
05.08.2022 18:40:00 - Chester: Exactly, Aliyah. It's all about finding that balance. It's a complex topic, but worth exploring in depth.
05.08.2022 19:34:49 - Alex: Hey guys, have you listened to the new album by The Weeknd?
05.08.2022 19:35:20 - Sydney: Yeah, I did. His sound has really evolved, I love it!
05.08.2022 19:36:13 - Salik: I haven't yet. Is it worth a listen?
05.08.2022 19:36:45 - Aliyah: Definitely, Salik. He has really outdone himself this time.
05.08.2022 19:37:53 - Chester: I'm more of a classic rock guy, but I'll give it a listen.
05.08.2022 19:38:52 - Alex: That's the spirit, Chester. Music is all about exploring different genres.
05.08.2022 19:40:45 - Sydney: True, Alex. By the way, has anyone been to a live concert recently?
05.08.2022 19:42:43 - Salik: No, but I'm planning to attend the Jazz festival next month.
05.08.2022 19:43:34 - Aliyah: That sounds exciting, Salik. I wish I could join.
05.08.2022 19:45:34 - Chester: I attended a Metallica concert last year. It was epic!

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

15.12.2021 21:30:00 - Mae: Brent, we're on. Are you in position?
15.12.2021 21:30:35 - Brent: Affirmative, Mae. The security is tight, but I've made it past the initial checkpoints.
15.12.2021 21:31:51 - Mae: Good, we can't afford any mistakes. Keep me updated.
15.12.2021 21:33:46 - Brent: Understood. I'm heading to the control room now.
15.12.2021 21:35:19 - Mae: Perfect. I'm making my way to the vault.
15.12.2021 21:36:21 - Brent: I'm in the control room. Disabling the security systems now.
15.12.2021 21:37:16 - Mae: Great. I'm at the vault. Waiting for your signal.
15.12.2021 21:38:02 - Brent: Security systems disabled. You're good to go.
15.12.2021 21:38:47 - Mae: Vault door opening. I'm in.
15.12.2021 21:39:45 - Brent: Security is picking up some disturbance. I suggest you hurry.
15.12.2021 21:40:58 - Mae: Got what we came for. Heading out now.
15.12.2021 21:41:50 - Brent: Security is on high alert. I'll create a diversion.
15.12.2021 21:43:33 - Mae: Thanks, Brent. Meet at the rendezvous point.
15.12.2021 21:44:46 - Brent: Affirmative. See you there, Mae.
16.12.2021 01:02:54 - Mae: Hey Brent, did you finish the math homework?
16.12.2021 01:03:54 - Brent: Hey Mae, yeah I did. Did you find it difficult too?
16.12.2021 01:05:31 - Mae: Absolutely, I’m not sure I did the last question right. Can we review it tomorrow?
16.12.2021 01:06:13 - Brent: Sure, we can go over it before class. I also had a hard time with it.
16.12.2021 01:07:40 - Mae: Thanks, Brent. Also, have you decided on a topic for the History project?
16.12.2021 01:08:45 - Brent: Not yet, any suggestions?
16.12.2021 01:10:08 - Mae: What about the French Revolution? I think we can find a lot of resources on it.
16.12.2021 01:11:32 - Brent: Sounds good to me. Let’s start researching tomorrow after we review the math homework.
16.12.2021 01:13:13 - Mae: Perfect! See you tomorrow, Brent.
16.12.2021 01:14:22 - Brent: See you, Mae.
16.12.2021 04:38:00 - Mae: Hey Brent! I had the weirdest dream last night.
16.12.2021 04:38:32 - Brent: Really? What happened?
16.12.2021 04:39:37 - Mae: I was flying over a city full of skyscrapers, it was so real.
16.12.2021 04:41:16 - Brent: That's cool! Do you often have dreams where you're flying?
16.12.2021 04:43:16 - Mae: Not really, it's the first time. Do you believe dreams have meanings?
16.12.2021 04:44:33 - Brent: Well, I think they can be influenced by our thoughts and experiences. For example, if you've been thinking about freedom or escape, that might explain the flying.
16.12.2021 04:45:38 - Mae: That makes sense. I've been feeling quite stressed at work lately. Maybe I'm yearning for an escape.
16.12.2021 04:46:51 - Brent: It's possible. Dreams can be a way for our subconscious to communicate with us.
16.12.2021 04:47:58 - Mae: Do you remember your dreams often?
16.12.2021 04:49:01 - Brent: Not always. But there are some dreams that I remember vividly, like the one where I was chased by a giant cookie.
16.12.2021 04:50:00 - Mae: Ha! That sounds like a fun dream, unless you're scared of cookies.
16.12.2021 04:51:24 - Brent: It was more amusing than scary. Anyway, it's interesting to analyze dreams, isn't it?
16.12.2021 04:53:05 - Mae: Definitely! It gives us a glimpse into our subconscious mind.
16.12.2021 04:54:02 - Brent: Yeah, I agree. Let's share more dreams next time.
16.12.2021 04:56:00 - Mae: Sure thing, Brent. Goodnight for now.
16.12.2021 10:26:36 - Mae: Hey Brent, have you seen the line-up for the upcoming music concert?
16.12.2021 10:28:16 - Brent: Not yet, Mae. Which bands are playing?
16.12.2021 10:29:49 - Mae: The headliners are Arctic Monkeys and The Black Keys. They also have some emerging local bands.
16.12.2021 10:31:06 - Brent: That sounds amazing! I'm a big fan of Arctic Monkeys. When is it happening?
16.12.2021 10:32:14 - Mae: It's on the 25th of next month. I was thinking of buying the tickets.
16.12.2021 10:32:48 - Brent: Count me in, Mae. Let's do it! I can't miss this concert.
16.12.2021 10:34:42 - Mae: Great! I'll get the tickets and let you know the details.

16.12.2021 01:10:08 - Mae: What about the French Revolution? I think we can find a lot of resources on it.
16.12.2021 01:11:32 - Brent: Sounds good to me. Let’s start researching tomorrow after we review the math homework.
16.12.2021 01:13:13 - Mae: Perfect! See you tomorrow, Brent.
16.12.2021 01:14:22 - Brent: See you, Mae.
16.12.2021 04:38:00 - Mae: Hey Brent! I had the weirdest dream last night.
16.12.2021 04:38:32 - Brent: Really? What happened?
16.12.2021 04:39:37 - Mae: I was flying over a city full of skyscrapers, it was so real.
16.12.2021 04:41:16 - Brent: That's cool! Do you often have dreams where you're flying?
16.12.2021 04:43:16 - Mae: Not really, it's the first time. Do you believe dreams have meanings?
16.12.2021 04:44:33 - Brent: Well, I think they can be influenced by our thoughts and experiences. For example, if you've been thinking about freedom or escape, that might explain the flying.
16.12.2021 04:45:38 - Mae: That makes sense. I've been feeling quite stressed at work lately. Maybe I'm yearning for an escape.
16.12.2021 04:46:51 - Brent: It's possible. Dreams can be a way for our subconscious to communicate with us.
16.12.2021 04:47:58 - Mae: Do you remember your dreams often?
16.12.2021 04:49:01 - Brent: Not always. But there are some dreams that I remember vividly, like the one where I was chased by a giant cookie.
16.12.2021 04:50:00 - Mae: Ha! That sounds like a fun dream, unless you're scared of cookies.
16.12.2021 04:51:24 - Brent: It was more amusing than scary. Anyway, it's interesting to analyze dreams, isn't it?
16.12.2021 04:53:05 - Mae: Definitely! It gives us a glimpse into our subconscious mind.
16.12.2021 04:54:02 - Brent: Yeah, I agree. Let's share more dreams next time.
16.12.2021 04:56:00 - Mae: Sure thing, Brent. Goodnight for now.
16.12.2021 10:26:36 - Mae: Hey Brent, have you seen the line-up for the upcoming music concert?
16.12.2021 10:28:16 - Brent: Not yet, Mae. Which bands are playing?
16.12.2021 10:29:49 - Mae: The headliners are Arctic Monkeys and The Black Keys. They also have some emerging local bands.
16.12.2021 10:31:06 - Brent: That sounds amazing! I'm a big fan of Arctic Monkeys. When is it happening?
16.12.2021 10:32:14 - Mae: It's on the 25th of next month. I was thinking of buying the tickets.
16.12.2021 10:32:48 - Brent: Count me in, Mae. Let's do it! I can't miss this concert.
16.12.2021 10:34:42 - Mae: Great! I'll get the tickets and let you know the details.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

12.04.2021 04:00:07 - Brody: Hey guys, did you watch the game last night?
12.04.2021 04:01:35 - Eric: Yes, it was quite the match. The final score was unexpected.
12.04.2021 04:03:13 - John: I agree. I thought they would lose after the first half.
12.04.2021 04:05:06 - Brody: That last-minute goal was a game-changer.
12.04.2021 04:05:56 - Eric: Absolutely, it completely turned the tables.
12.04.2021 04:07:51 - John: I'm excited to see how the season will progress.
12.04.2021 08:52:58 - Brody: Hey guys, have you seen the latest on the Mars Rover?
12.04.2021 08:54:35 - Eric: Yeah, I saw something about it. Isn't it sending some really cool images?
12.04.2021 08:55:32 - John: Absolutely, the images are stunning. It’s amazing how far we've come in space exploration.
12.04.2021 08:56:27 - Brody: The perseverance rover is also going to look for signs of past microbial life. That's huge!
12.04.2021 08:57:29 - Eric: I know right! Just imagine if they find something. It would change everything we know about life in the universe.
12.04.2021 08:58:11 - John: Indeed, it's fascinating! I can't wait to see what they discover next.
12.04.2021 08:58:46 - Brody: It's also interesting to see how this mission might pave the way for future manned missions to Mars.
12.04.2021 09:00:46 - Eric: That's true. The data this rover collects could be crucial for planning those missions.
12.04.2021 09:01:38 - John: I hope I'm around to see the day when the first human steps on Mars.
12.04.2021 14:15:30 - Brody: Just got the floor plans, how are we looking on the security system, Eric?
12.04.2021 14:16:48 - Eric: Still working on it. The system is more complicated than we thought.
12.04.2021 14:18:20 - John: We need to figure it out soon, we're on a tight schedule here.
12.04.2021 14:20:18 - Eric: I know, John. I'm doing my best here.
12.04.2021 14:21:52 - Brody: Let's stay focused, guys. Eric, you've got this. 
12.04.2021 14:23:30 - Eric: Thanks, Brody. I think I've got a lead here. 
12.04.2021 14:24:32 - John: Good. We need to be inside and out before the guards switch shifts.
12.04.2021 14:25:54 - Brody: Remember, no one gets hurt. That's the rule.
12.04.2021 14:27:43 - Eric: Of course. I've just cracked the system. We're all set.
12.04.2021 14:29:02 - John: Perfect. Let's meet up and finalize everything.
12.04.2021 14:30:55 - Brody: See you guys in an hour. Let's make this count.
12.04.2021 16:55:35 - Brody: Hey guys, I'm thinking of getting a new pet. Any suggestions?
12.04.2021 16:56:05 - Eric: What about a dog, Brody? They're loyal and great companions.
12.04.2021 16:57:53 - John: True, but they require a lot of care and time. How about a cat, Brody? They're more independent.
12.04.2021 16:58:32 - Brody: I do like cats. But I'm also considering something a little more unconventional. Like a reptile.
12.04.2021 17:00:23 - Eric: A reptile could be cool! Maybe a bearded dragon or a gecko?
12.04.2021 17:01:18 - John: Reptiles are definitely unique pets. But remember they also have specific needs, like regulated temperatures.
12.04.2021 17:02:17 - Brody: Yeah, I'll have to do some research. Thanks for the suggestions, guys.
12.04.2021 17:02:49 - Eric: No problem, Brody. Let us know what you decide!
12.04.2021 17:04:24 - John: Yeah, good luck with your decision, Brody!
12.04.2021 20:48:21 - Brody: Hey guys, have you played the new Call of Duty yet?
12.04.2021 20:49:57 - Eric: Not yet, Brody. I've been hooked on the new Assassin's Creed.
12.04.2021 20:51:35 - John: I've been playing CoD non-stop. It's awesome, Eric, you have to try it!
12.04.2021 20:52:28 - Eric: Really, John? What's so good about it?
12.04.2021 20:53:05 - John: The graphics are insane and there's more strategy involved now. Plus, the new maps are really cool.
12.04.2021 20:54:57 - Brody: I second John. The game play has really improved. Plus, there's a lot of new weapons.
12.04.2021 20:56:35 - Eric: Sounds interesting. I'll try it out soon.
12.04.2021 20:58:05 - John: Great! Let's plan a game night soon.
12.04.2021 20:59:26 - Brody: I'm in. Let's do this.
13.04.2021 01:55:12 - Brody: Hey guys, have you seen the latest episode of 'The Crown'?
13.04.2021 01:56:59 - Eric: No, not yet. But I've heard it's really good!
13.04.2021 01:58:25 - John: I've seen it! I think this might be the best season yet.
13.04.2021 01:59:54 - Brody: I agree, John. The acting and storytelling are just top-notch.
13.04.2021 02:01:28 - Eric: You guys are making me so curious. I'm definitely watching it tonight.
13.04.2021 02:02:13 - John: You won't regret it, Eric!
13.04.2021 02:03:27 - Brody: And what about 'Stranger Things'? The new season is about to start.
13.04.2021 02:04:48 - Eric: Oh, I can't wait for that! The trailer looks promising.
13.04.2021 02:05:49 - John: I must admit, I couldn't get into 'Stranger Things'. Maybe I should give it another try.
13.04.2021 02:06:33 - Brody: Yes, you should, John! It's a great show.
13.04.2021 02:07:31 - Eric: Maybe we should organize a watch party for the new season's premiere.
13.04.2021 02:08:58 - John: That sounds like a great idea, Eric!
13.04.2021 02:09:35 - Brody: I'm in! Let's do it.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

12.04.2022 05:57:42 - David: Hi Thomas, are you up for a trip to Italy this summer?
12.04.2022 05:58:23 - Thomas: Hey David, That sounds interesting. What cities are we considering?
12.04.2022 06:00:10 - David: I was thinking Rome, Venice, and maybe Florence. What do you think?
12.04.2022 06:01:06 - Thomas: That sounds great. But I'd like to add Milan to the list.
12.04.2022 06:02:58 - David: Sure, Milan sounds good too. We should probably start planning.
12.04.2022 06:04:31 - Thomas: Agreed. I can look into accommodation and travel within Italy.
12.04.2022 06:05:12 - David: Great, I'll take care of the flights and itinerary then.
12.04.2022 06:05:56 - Thomas: Sounds like a plan. Let's start working on this soon.
12.04.2022 06:07:33 - David: Absolutely, we should meet over the weekend to finalize everything.
12.04.2022 06:08:10 - Thomas: Perfect, see you then.
12.04.2022 10:15:30 - David: Hey Thomas, I got an interesting offer for you.
12.04.2022 10:16:42 - Thomas: Really? What's that about?
12.04.2022 10:17:26 - David: I got a mail from a Prince in Nigeria. He's offering a huge reward for helping him transfer his inheritance.
12.04.2022 10:19:26 - Thomas: Haha, that sounds like a classic scam, David.
12.04.2022 10:20:30 - David: Yeah, I know. But it's tempting, isn't it? Imagine if it was real.
12.04.2022 10:22:16 - Thomas: No way, it's a well-known scam. Don't even think about it.
12.04.2022 10:23:47 - David: Just kidding, Thomas. I'm not that naive. But it's fascinating how these scams still exist.
12.04.2022 10:24:37 - Thomas: I agree, it's because some people still fall for them. Always remember, if something seems too good to be true, it probably is.
12.04.2022 10:26:23 - David: Wise words, Thomas. Thanks for the reminder.
12.04.2022 13:56:23 - David: Hey Thomas, have you seen the latest Marvel movie?
12.04.2022 13:57:22 - Thomas: No, not yet. I've been meaning to catch up on them though. Is it any good?
12.04.2022 13:58:57 - David: Yeah, it's quite good. I think you'd like it. It's a bit different from the previous ones.
12.04.2022 13:59:28 - Thomas: Oh, in what way?
12.04.2022 14:01:10 - David: Well, it's a bit darker and more serious. But still has that classic Marvel humor.
12.04.2022 14:01:41 - Thomas: Sounds interesting. I'll definitely check it out. Thanks for the recommendation.
12.04.2022 14:02:39 - David: No problem. Let me know what you think when you see it.
12.04.2022 14:04:05 - Thomas: Sure, I'll do that. By the way, have you seen the new Star Wars movie?
12.04.2022 14:05:19 - David: Yes, I have. Didn't quite like it though.
12.04.2022 14:06:55 - Thomas: Really? I thought it was pretty good.
12.04.2022 14:08:02 - David: To each their own, I guess.
12.04.2022 15:59:32 - David: Hey Thomas, I've recently started listening to classical music and I'm loving it
12.04.2022 16:00:42 - Thomas: That's awesome, David! Do you have any favorite composers or pieces yet?
12.04.2022 16:01:12 - David: I've mainly been listening to Beethoven. His Moonlight Sonata is simply beautiful
12.04.2022 16:02:20 - Thomas: I completely agree. Beethoven's work is timeless. I'd also recommend Mozart if you're looking to explore more
12.04.2022 16:04:05 - David: Thanks for the recommendation! I'll check out some of Mozart's works. Do you play any instruments?
12.04.2022 16:05:31 - Thomas: I used to play the piano when I was younger. Nowadays, I just enjoy listening to good music
12.04.2022 16:06:54 - David: That's cool! I've been thinking about learning the guitar. Any tips?
12.04.2022 16:07:26 - Thomas: That's a great choice! Just be patient with yourself and practice regularly. It'll come to you eventually
12.04.2022 16:09:11 - David: Thanks for the advice, Thomas. I'll keep that in mind. 
12.04.2022 17:08:22 - David: Hey Thomas, how are you doing?
12.04.2022 17:10:17 - Thomas: Hey David, I am good! How about you?
12.04.2022 17:11:48 - David: I am doing well, thanks. I've been thinking about dreams lately.
12.04.2022 17:12:48 - Thomas: Oh really? That's interesting. In what way?
12.04.2022 17:13:49 - David: I was just wondering if there is a specific reason we dream about certain things.
12.04.2022 17:14:47 - Thomas: I think dreams are a reflection of our subconscious mind. They can be influenced by our day-to-day experiences, thoughts, and feelings.
12.04.2022 17:16:28 - David: Interesting. Have you ever had a recurring dream?
12.04.2022 17:17:18 - Thomas: Yes, I have. It was a strange one where I was flying above a city. 
12.04.2022 17:18:03 - David: That sounds fascinating. Do you think it had any specific meaning?
12.04.2022 17:18:48 - Thomas: It's hard to say for sure. But I think it might have represented a desire for freedom and exploration.
12.04.2022 17:20:03 - David: That's a great interpretation. It's amazing how our minds work, isn't it?
12.04.2022 17:21:37 - Thomas: It sure is, David. The human mind is truly fascinating.
12.04.2022 22:33:42 - David: Hey Thomas, how's the weather looking on your end?
12.04.2022 22:35:12 - Thomas: Hi David, it's quite sunny here. How about at your place?
12.04.2022 22:35:50 - David: It's quite gloomy here. Looks like it's going to rain.
12.04.2022 22:37:50 - Thomas: Oh, that's quite the contrast. Make sure to carry an umbrella if you're heading out.
12.04.2022 22:39:46 - David: Will do, Thomas. Hopefully, it clears up soon.
12.04.2022 22:41:29 - Thomas: Fingers crossed, David. Stay safe out there.
12.04.2022 22:43:01 - David: Thanks, Thomas. You too, enjoy the sun.

20.03.2022 18:20:30 - Chris: Guys, I've been thinking about a way we could make some quick cash.
20.03.2022 18:21:59 - Kenneth: Not another one of your get-rich-quick schemes, Chris.
20.03.2022 18:22:46 - Chris: No, hear me out. This is different.
20.03.2022 18:24:31 - Greyson: Alright, I'm intrigued. What is it?
20.03.2022 18:25:55 - Chris: We could set up a fake lottery. All we need is an email list and a convincing story.
20.03.2022 18:26:34 - Robert: Sounds risky. What if we get caught?
20.03.2022 18:27:32 - Kenneth: And where would we get an email list?
20.03.2022 18:29:14 - Greyson: I know a guy who could get us that. 
20.03.2022 18:30:39 - Robert: Still, isn't this illegal?
20.03.2022 18:32:12 - Chris: Only if we get caught.
20.03.2022 18:33:10 - Kenneth: I'm out. This sounds too risky.
20.03.2022 18:34:52 - Greyson: I'm with Kenneth. It's not worth it.
20.03.2022 18:36:31 - Robert: Agreed. Chris, maybe it's time for some honest work.
20.03.2022 18:37:44 - Chris: Alright, I get it. I'll think of something else.
20.03.2022 20:02:04 - Chris: Hey guys, have you heard the new album from Coldplay?
20.03.2022 20:03:18 - Kenneth: Yeah, I gave it a listen. It's a bit different from their usual style. I'm not sure if I like it yet.
20.03.2022 20:03:50 - Greyson: Really? I think it's their best work yet. I love the experimentation they've done.
20.03.2022 20:04:46 - Robert: I have to agree with Kenneth, I'm not a big fan of the new direction. I miss the old Coldplay.
20.03.2022 20:06:18 - Chris: That's fair. What about you, Greyson? Any new music recommendations?
20.03.2022 20:06:51 - Greyson: I've been really into a band called Tame Impala recently. They have a unique sound that I think you guys might like.
20.03.2022 20:08:32 - Kenneth: I'll give them a listen, Greyson. Thanks for the suggestion.
20.03.2022 20:10:25 - Robert: Same here. Always open to new music.
20.03.2022 20:11:55 - Chris: Great, let's all check them out and discuss in our next chat!
21.03.2022 00:52:59 - Chris: Hey guys, have you heard about the recent Mars Rover landing?
21.03.2022 00:53:45 - Kenneth: Yes, I saw it on the news. The Perseverance Rover, right?
21.03.2022 00:55:42 - Greyson: That's correct, Kenneth. It's really impressive how far we've come in space exploration.
21.03.2022 00:56:16 - Robert: I agree, Greyson. It's fascinating to think about what we might discover next.
21.03.2022 00:57:20 - Chris: It's also a testament to human ingenuity and perseverance. No pun intended!
21.03.2022 00:58:54 - Kenneth: Haha good one, Chris. But yes, it's truly inspiring.
21.03.2022 01:00:53 - Greyson: Did you guys know that the rover will also be looking for signs of past microbial life?
21.03.2022 01:02:15 - Robert: Really? That's amazing. Imagine if we found evidence of life on Mars.
21.03.2022 01:04:13 - Chris: That would be a game-changer. It would make us rethink our place in the universe.
21.03.2022 01:04:48 - Kenneth: Indeed. It's an exciting time to be alive!
21.03.2022 01:05:22 - Greyson: Absolutely. Let's keep our fingers crossed for some groundbreaking discoveries.
21.03.2022 01:05:54 - Robert: Definitely. Looking forward to hearing more about the mission.
21.03.2022 02:43:58 - Chris: Hey guys, how's everyone doing with their families in this lockdown?
21.03.2022 02:44:56 - Kenneth: It's quite a challenge, Chris. Homeschooling the kids is not an easy task.
21.03.2022 02:46:31 - Greyson: Tell me about it, Kenneth. I'm running out of ideas to keep the kids entertained.
21.03.2022 02:48:00 - Robert: I'm lucky that my kids are all grown up. But, I miss my grandchildren. Can't wait to see them.
21.03.2022 02:49:28 - Chris: I feel you, Robert. It's been tough on all of us. Let's hope things get better soon.
21.03.2022 02:50:12 - Kenneth: Yeah, let's stay positive. We're all in this together.
21.03.2022 02:51:25 - Greyson: Agreed. Let's also plan a virtual get-together for the kids.
21.03.2022 02:53:20 - Robert: That sounds like a great idea, Greyson. Let's do it.
21.03.2022 06:08:54 - Chris: Hey guys, have you seen the latest Marvel movie?
21.03.2022 06:09:39 - Kenneth: No, not yet. Is it worth watching?
21.03.2022 06:10:56 - Chris: Definitely! It's filled with action and the storyline is great!
21.03.2022 06:12:24 - Greyson: I agree with Chris. It's a must-watch movie. Marvel never disappoints.
21.03.2022 06:13:45 - Robert: I've seen it. And yes, it's fantastic. The visual effects are superb!
21.03.2022 06:14:27 - Kenneth: Okay, you guys convinced me. I'll watch it this weekend.
21.03.2022 06:14:57 - Greyson: You won't regret it, Kenneth.
21.03.2022 06:16:27 - Robert: By the way, do you guys have any other movie recommendations?
21.03.2022 06:17:19 - Chris: I recently watched a movie called 'Inception'. It's a bit old but it's really good.
21.03.2022 06:18:07 - Kenneth: Inception is a masterpiece! One of my all-time favorites.
21.03.2022 06:19:01 - Greyson: I second that. Inception is a classic. Definitely worth a rewatch.
21.03.2022 06:20:36 - Robert: I've never watched it, but I'll definitely give it a go. Thanks for the recommendation, guys.
21.03.2022 08:41:58 - Chris: Hey guys, any plans for the weekend? 
21.03.2022 08:42:44 - Kenneth: I'm thinking of going hiking. Weather's perfect. 
21.03.2022 08:43:19 - Greyson: That sounds like fun. I might join you. 
21.03.2022 08:44:41 - Robert: I have a family gathering on Saturday. Maybe Sunday? 
21.03.2022 08:45:18 - Chris: Sunday works for me. Kenneth, what about you? 
21.03.2022 08:46:38 - Kenneth: Sure, Sunday's good. Let's plan for it. 
21.03.2022 08:47:21 - Greyson: Awesome! Looking forward to it. 
21.03.2022 08:49:17 - Robert: Great. We'll figure out the details tomorrow. 
21.03.2022 08:50:36 - Chris: Sounds good. Have a good night, guys. 
21.03.2022 08:52:33 - Kenneth: You too. See you all on Sunday. 
21.03.2022 08:53:52 - Greyson: Goodnight, everyone. 
21.03.2022 08:54:30 - Robert: Night, guys. Excited for Sunday.
21.03.2022 12:10:45 - Chris: Hey guys, have you heard about the upcoming rock concert?
21.03.2022 12:11:41 - Kenneth: Yeah, I saw the flyer. It's next week right?
21.03.2022 12:13:38 - Greyson: Correct. I think it's going to be awesome. We should all go together.
21.03.2022 12:15:35 - Robert: Definitely. It's been a while since we all hung out.
21.03.2022 12:16:38 - Chris: Absolutely. Let's book the tickets tomorrow.
21.03.2022 12:18:33 - Kenneth: I'll check out the seating arrangements and prices.
21.03.2022 12:20:15 - Greyson: Great. Let's meet up for coffee tomorrow to finalize things?
21.03.2022 12:22:14 - Robert: Sounds good. Looking forward to it.
21.03.2022 12:22:55 - Chris: Alright, see you guys tomorrow.
21.03.2022 12:24:41 - Kenneth: See you.
21.03.2022 12:26:04 - Greyson: Later guys.
21.03.2022 12:27:13 - Robert: Bye.

20.06.2022 23:15:13 - Helen: Hey Karen, how's your brother doing?
20.06.2022 23:17:04 - Karen: Hey Helen, he's doing well. Just started a new job.
20.06.2022 23:18:15 - Helen: Oh that's great! How is he finding it?
20.06.2022 23:19:30 - Karen: He's enjoying it so far. It's a big change from his old job, but he's adapting.
20.06.2022 23:21:18 - Helen: That's good to hear. And what about your sister?
20.06.2022 23:22:13 - Karen: She's good too, thanks for asking. She just moved to a new city for her studies.
20.06.2022 23:23:24 - Helen: Your siblings seem to be doing really well. You must be proud.
20.06.2022 23:24:02 - Karen: Yes, I am. They've worked hard to get where they are.
20.06.2022 23:24:43 - Helen: I can imagine. My siblings are also a big part of my life.
20.06.2022 23:26:31 - Karen: It's always nice to have siblings to share your life with, isn't it?
21.06.2022 04:03:00 - Helen: Hey Karen, how are you finding high school so far?
21.06.2022 04:04:37 - Karen: Hi Helen! It's been a bit overwhelming, but I'm managing. How about you?
21.06.2022 04:05:30 - Helen: I know what you mean. It's a lot different from middle school. I'm doing okay though. Just trying to keep up with all the homework.
21.06.2022 04:06:33 - Karen: Right? I didn't expect so much work. Are you involved in any clubs or sports?
21.06.2022 04:07:14 - Helen: Yeah, I joined the debate team. It's pretty fun. Are you in any?
21.06.2022 04:07:50 - Karen: I'm thinking about joining the art club. I've always enjoyed painting and sketching.
21.06.2022 04:09:07 - Helen: That sounds great! You're really good at art. It would be a good outlet for you.
21.06.2022 04:10:00 - Karen: Thanks, Helen! That's really sweet of you to say. Maybe we can study together sometime?
21.06.2022 04:11:56 - Helen: That sounds like a great idea, Karen. I'd love that. We can help each other out.
21.06.2022 04:13:13 - Karen: Perfect! Let's plan for that. I'll message you about it later. Thanks, Helen.
21.06.2022 06:56:58 - Helen: Hi Karen, how's the weather over there?
21.06.2022 06:58:34 - Karen: Hi Helen! It's a bit chilly, but clear skies. How about where you are?
21.06.2022 06:59:53 - Helen: It's actually quite warm here, sunny with a few clouds.
21.06.2022 07:00:31 - Karen: Oh, that sounds lovely. I miss the sunshine.
21.06.2022 07:02:31 - Helen: I can imagine. How's the forecast looking for the rest of the week?
21.06.2022 07:03:48 - Karen: It's supposed to be a bit warmer, but still mostly cloudy. No rain though, which is good.
21.06.2022 07:05:00 - Helen: That's definitely a silver lining. It's supposed to be sunny all week here.
21.06.2022 07:06:18 - Karen: Lucky you! I'll have to visit sometime.
21.06.2022 07:08:10 - Helen: You're always welcome! Let's hope for good weather when you do.
21.06.2022 07:09:11 - Karen: That would be great. Fingers crossed.
21.06.2022 08:17:57 - Helen: Hey Karen, how are you?
21.06.2022 08:19:13 - Karen: I'm good, Helen. How about you?
21.06.2022 08:20:47 - Helen: I'm doing well. Did you watch the football match last night?
21.06.2022 08:22:02 - Karen: Yes, I did. It was such an intense game!
21.06.2022 08:23:57 - Helen: I agree. The last-minute goal was a total surprise.
21.06.2022 08:24:47 - Karen: Definitely! I thought we were going into overtime.
21.06.2022 08:26:40 - Helen: Me too. I'm glad our team won though.
21.06.2022 08:28:16 - Karen: Same here. Looking forward to the next match!
21.06.2022 08:29:18 - Helen: Yes, hopefully, they keep up the good work.
21.06.2022 08:30:30 - Karen: Fingers crossed!
21.06.2022 12:10:57 - Helen: Hey Karen, have you read any good books lately?
21.06.2022 12:12:36 - Karen: Yes, Helen. I just finished reading "The Silent Patient". It was an amazing psychological thriller!
21.06.2022 12:13:45 - Helen: Oh, I've heard about that one. It's by Alex Michaelides, right?
21.06.2022 12:15:03 - Karen: Yes, that's the one. I couldn't put it down, the plot twists were so unexpected!
21.06.2022 12:16:12 - Helen: That sounds like a book I would enjoy. I love thrillers with unexpected plot twists.
21.06.2022 12:17:27 - Karen: Then you should definitely give it a try. What are you currently reading?
21.06.2022 12:18:04 - Helen: I'm reading "Educated" by Tara Westover. It's a memoir and it's really gripping!
21.06.2022 12:19:46 - Karen: Oh, I read that last year. It's an incredibly inspiring story.
21.06.2022 12:20:44 - Helen: It really is. Tara's journey is so powerful and moving.
21.06.2022 12:22:42 - Karen: Let's make a book club! We can share and discuss books we've read.
21.06.2022 12:24:34 - Helen: That's a great idea Karen! I'm in. Let's do it.
21.06.2022 16:34:22 - Helen: Hey Karen, we need to discuss our next steps.
21.06.2022 16:35:02 - Karen: I agree, Helen. The previous operation didn’t go as planned.
21.06.2022 16:36:20 - Helen: Yes, we need a new location for manufacturing. Any ideas?
21.06.2022 16:37:26 - Karen: I've found a potential place. It's an old barn, secluded and not in use.
21.06.2022 16:38:44 - Helen: Sounds good. We need to ensure it has the necessary power supply.
21.06.2022 16:39:36 - Karen: Already checked, it's perfect for our needs.
21.06.2022 16:41:03 - Helen: Great. Let's plan a visit to check it out in person.
21.06.2022 16:41:56 - Karen: Agreed. We should also think about security measures.
21.06.2022 16:43:53 - Helen: Absolutely. We can't afford any unexpected surprises.
21.06.2022 16:45:11 - Karen: I'll contact our guy about the security then.
21.06.2022 16:46:31 - Helen: Perfect. Let's keep this operation as discrete as possible.
21.06.2022 16:48:14 - Karen: Absolutely, Helen. We can't afford any slip-ups.
21.06.2022 19:34:28 - Helen: Hey Karen, how's the college search going?
21.06.2022 19:35:33 - Karen: Hi Helen, it's a bit overwhelming, to be honest. There are so many options!
21.06.2022 19:37:18 - Helen: I know right! It's hard to decide which one is the best fit.
21.06.2022 19:38:28 - Karen: Exactly. I'm looking at the course offerings, faculty, location, everything.
21.06.2022 19:39:39 - Helen: Have you visited any campuses yet?
21.06.2022 19:40:34 - Karen: Not yet. I'm planning to visit a few next month.
21.06.2022 19:42:26 - Helen: That's a good idea. It will give you a feel of the environment.
21.06.2022 19:43:19 - Karen: Yeah, I hope so. I'm also trying to understand the financial aspects.
21.06.2022 19:44:20 - Helen: That's important too. You might want to look at scholarship options.
21.06.2022 19:45:52 - Karen: Definitely. I'm also looking at student loan options just in case.
21.06.2022 19:46:51 - Helen: Do you need any help? I can share some resources.
21.06.2022 19:48:36 - Karen: That would be great, Helen. I appreciate it.
21.06.2022 19:50:07 - Helen: No problem, Karen. We're in this together.
21.06.2022 19:50:47 - Karen: Thanks, Helen. I really appreciate your support.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

23.08.2021 21:46:00 - Parker: Hey guys, have you seen the latest video on PewDiePie's channel?
23.08.2021 21:46:36 - April: Not yet, Parker. Is it worth watching?
23.08.2021 21:47:31 - Parker: Definitely, April! It's hilarious, he played a new game and his reactions are priceless.
23.08.2021 21:48:59 - Alexander: I saw it too, Parker. Made my day.
23.08.2021 21:50:09 - Teegan: I'm not really into gaming videos. I prefer educational ones.
23.08.2021 21:51:30 - Kim: Teegan, have you checked out Khan Academy's channel? They have some really good educational videos.
23.08.2021 21:52:09 - Teegan: Thanks, Kim. I'll check it out.
23.08.2021 21:53:06 - April: I prefer watching cooking videos. I love Tasty's channel.
23.08.2021 21:54:59 - Alexander: Oh, April. I love Tasty too. Their recipes are simple and delicious.
23.08.2021 21:56:31 - Kim: I'm more into music videos. Vevo's channel is my favorite.
23.08.2021 21:58:08 - Parker: It's interesting to see how we all have different preferences in online videos.
24.08.2021 00:19:09 - Parker: Hey guys, have you seen the latest episode of The Mandalorian?
24.08.2021 00:19:51 - April: Not yet, Parker. Planning to watch it tonight.
24.08.2021 00:20:55 - Alexander: I've seen it! The graphics and storyline are just amazing!
24.08.2021 00:22:16 - Teegan: No spoilers, Alexander! I haven't watched it yet either.
24.08.2021 00:23:19 - Kim: Guys, let's plan a watch party for the next episode. What do you say?
24.08.2021 00:25:02 - Parker: Sounds like a plan, Kim. Let's do it!
24.08.2021 00:26:26 - April: I'm in! It'll be fun to watch together.
24.08.2021 00:28:09 - Alexander: Count me in too. Can't wait for the next episode!
24.08.2021 00:29:35 - Teegan: I'm in. Let's decide the time and platform.
24.08.2021 00:30:52 - Kim: Great! Let's finalize the details in our next chat.
24.08.2021 03:23:02 - Parker: Hey guys, do you ever feel like being the eldest sibling is tough?
24.08.2021 03:24:31 - April: Definitely! Always having to set an example and being responsible for the younger ones.
24.08.2021 03:26:23 - Alexander: Funny, as the middle child, I feel like I'm always overlooked!
24.08.2021 03:27:52 - Teegan: I can't relate at all, being an only child.
24.08.2021 03:29:47 - Kim: As the youngest, I feel like I'm always treated like a baby.
24.08.2021 03:30:32 - Parker: I guess it's tough no matter where you fall in the sibling order.
24.08.2021 03:31:10 - April: Yeah, but at the end of the day, I wouldn't trade my siblings for anything.
24.08.2021 03:31:42 - Alexander: Same here. They can be annoying, but I love them.
24.08.2021 03:33:32 - Teegan: I always wished I had a sibling growing up.
24.08.2021 03:34:40 - Kim: Well, we are kind of like a family here, aren't we?
24.08.2021 04:46:30 - Parker: Hey guys, how's the weather where you all are?
24.08.2021 04:47:06 - April: It's pretty cold over here in New York. Snowed a little this morning.
24.08.2021 04:48:22 - Alexander: Nice and sunny in California. Couldn't ask for better weather.
24.08.2021 04:50:02 - Teegan: It's raining cats and dogs here in London. Wish I was in California right now!
24.08.2021 04:51:52 - Kim: It's windy here in Chicago. The Windy City living up to its name.
24.08.2021 04:53:02 - Parker: Sounds like we're all experiencing different weather conditions.
24.08.2021 04:54:17 - April: I wish I was experiencing Alexander's weather right now. I miss the sun.
24.08.2021 04:55:37 - Alexander: Well, I wouldn't mind a bit of snow. We rarely get that here.
24.08.2021 04:57:03 - Teegan: I would trade the rain for snow any day. It's been so gloomy here.
24.08.2021 04:58:44 - Kim: And I wouldn't mind a bit of rain. It would be a nice change from the wind.
24.08.2021 04:59:15 - Parker: Maybe we should all swap places for a bit.
24.08.2021 04:59:50 - April: That sounds like a great idea, Parker.
24.08.2021 05:01:44 - Alexander: I'm in. Who wants to come to sunny California?
24.08.2021 05:02:47 - Teegan: I'll swap with you, Alexander. You can have the London rain.
24.08.2021 05:04:09 - Kim: And I'll swap with you, April. I could use a bit of snow in my life.
24.08.2021 06:19:01 - Parker: Hey guys, have you started looking into your college applications yet?
24.08.2021 06:20:39 - April: Yeah, I'm so overwhelmed. There are so many options.
24.08.2021 06:22:24 - Alexander: I've narrowed down my choices to a few universities. Now, it's all about writing the perfect application.
24.08.2021 06:23:09 - Teegan: I'm stuck on the essay part. How do you even begin to write about 'a significant experience in your life?'
24.08.2021 06:24:04 - Kim: Maybe start by brainstorming some key moments that had a big impact on you, Teegan.
24.08.2021 06:25:10 - Parker: That's a good idea, Kim. And remember, it doesn't have to be something huge. It could be something small that changed your perspective.
24.08.2021 06:25:46 - April: I'm also struggling with financial aid. The forms are so confusing.
24.08.2021 06:26:32 - Alexander: I can help with that, April. I've been through it with my older sister.
24.08.2021 06:27:25 - Teegan: That would be great, Alexander. Maybe we can all meet up this weekend to work on our applications together.
24.08.2021 06:29:09 - Kim: That sounds like a plan. Let's do it.
24.08.2021 11:33:38 - Parker: Hey guys, have you tried that new Italian place downtown?
24.08.2021 11:34:58 - April: No, but I've heard good things! What's it called again?
24.08.2021 11:36:16 - Parker: It's called 'La Trattoria'. Really authentic Italian food.
24.08.2021 11:36:57 - Alexander: I'm in! Always up for trying new food spots.
24.08.2021 11:38:19 - Teegan: Sounds great! We should plan a night to go together.
24.08.2021 11:39:14 - Kim: I've been there, the pasta is amazing!
24.08.2021 11:40:50 - April: Okay, I'm sold. Let's do this.
24.08.2021 11:41:24 - Alexander: How about next Friday?
24.08.2021 11:42:27 - Teegan: Works for me.
24.08.2021 11:43:06 - Kim: I'm in too.
24.08.2021 11:44:28 - Parker: Perfect, I'll make a reservation for 5 next Friday.
24.08.2021 11:45:50 - April: Great! Looking forward to it.
24.08.2021 11:46:34 - Alexander: Same here. Can't wait!
24.08.2021 11:47:21 - Teegan: See you guys then!
24.08.2021 11:49:13 - Kim: Excited for some delicious pasta!
24.08.2021 14:30:00 - Parker: Guys, I think we need to discuss the new formula for the product
24.08.2021 14:32:00 - April: Absolutely. We've been getting feedback that the quality isn't as high as it used to be
24.08.2021 14:33:02 - Alexander: That's a big issue. Any problem with the ingredients?
24.08.2021 14:33:48 - Teegan: As far as I can tell, the ingredients are fine. The issue might be in the process
24.08.2021 14:34:25 - Kim: I agree with Teegan. It's not the what, it's the how. We should revisit our process
24.08.2021 14:35:11 - Parker: That's a good point, Kim. We need to ensure we're not cutting corners
24.08.2021 14:36:09 - April: We also need to think about security. The last thing we want is for this operation to get busted
24.08.2021 14:38:04 - Alexander: I've got contacts that can help with securing the operation
24.08.2021 14:38:40 - Teegan: Let's focus on the process first, then we'll sort out security
24.08.2021 14:40:11 - Kim: Agreed. One thing at a time.

No introduction is required, just directly provide the short summaries.

Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

23.08.2021 21:46:00 - Parker: Hey guys, have you seen the latest video on PewDiePie's channel?
23.08.2021 21:46:36 - April: Not yet, Parker. Is it worth watching?
23.08.2021 21:47:31 - Parker: Definitely, April! It's hilarious, he played a new game and his reactions are priceless.
23.08.2021 21:48:59 - Alexander: I saw it too, Parker. Made my day.
23.08.2021 21:50:09 - Teegan: I'm not really into gaming videos. I prefer educational ones.
23.08.2021 21:51:30 - Kim: Teegan, have you checked out Khan Academy's channel? They have some really good educational videos.
23.08.2021 21:52:09 - Teegan: Thanks, Kim. I'll check it out.
23.08.2021 21:53:06 - April: I prefer watching cooking videos. I love Tasty's channel.
23.08.2021 21:54:59 - Alexander: Oh, April. I love Tasty too. Their recipes are simple and delicious.
23.08.2021 21:56:31 - Kim: I'm more into music videos. Vevo's channel is my favorite.
23.08.2021 21:58:08 - Parker: It's interesting to see how we all have different preferences in online videos.
24.08.2021 00:19:09 - Parker: Hey guys, have you seen the latest episode of The Mandalorian?
24.08.2021 00:19:51 - April: Not yet, Parker. Planning to watch it tonight.
24.08.2021 00:20:55 - Alexander: I've seen it! The graphics and storyline are just amazing!
24.08.2021 00:22:16 - Teegan: No spoilers, Alexander! I haven't watched it yet either.
24.08.2021 00:23:19 - Kim: Guys, let's plan a watch party for the next episode. What do you say?
24.08.2021 00:25:02 - Parker: Sounds like a plan, Kim. Let's do it!
24.08.2021 00:26:26 - April: I'm in! It'll be fun to watch together.
24.08.2021 00:28:09 - Alexander: Count me in too. Can't wait for the next episode!
24.08.2021 00:29:35 - Teegan: I'm in. Let's decide the time and platform.
24.08.2021 00:30:52 - Kim: Great! Let's finalize the details in our next chat.
24.08.2021 03:23:02 - Parker: Hey guys, do you ever feel like being the eldest sibling is tough?
24.08.2021 03:24:31 - April: Definitely! Always having to set an example and being responsible for the younger ones.
24.08.2021 03:26:23 - Alexander: Funny, as the middle child, I feel like I'm always overlooked!
24.08.2021 03:27:52 - Teegan: I can't relate at all, being an only child.
24.08.2021 03:29:47 - Kim: As the youngest, I feel like I'm always treated like a baby.
24.08.2021 03:30:32 - Parker: I guess it's tough no matter where you fall in the sibling order.
24.08.2021 03:31:10 - April: Yeah, but at the end of the day, I wouldn't trade my siblings for anything.
24.08.2021 03:31:42 - Alexander: Same here. They can be annoying, but I love them.
24.08.2021 03:33:32 - Teegan: I always wished I had a sibling growing up.
24.08.2021 03:34:40 - Kim: Well, we are kind of like a family here, aren't we?
24.08.2021 04:46:30 - Parker: Hey guys, how's the weather where you all are?
24.08.2021 04:47:06 - April: It's pretty cold over here in New York. Snowed a little this morning.
24.08.2021 04:48:22 - Alexander: Nice and sunny in California. Couldn't ask for better weather.
24.08.2021 04:50:02 - Teegan: It's raining cats and dogs here in London. Wish I was in California right now!
24.08.2021 04:51:52 - Kim: It's windy here in Chicago. The Windy City living up to its name.
24.08.2021 04:53:02 - Parker: Sounds like we're all experiencing different weather conditions.
24.08.2021 04:54:17 - April: I wish I was experiencing Alexander's weather right now. I miss the sun.
24.08.2021 04:55:37 - Alexander: Well, I wouldn't mind a bit of snow. We rarely get that here.
24.08.2021 04:57:03 - Teegan: I would trade the rain for snow any day. It's been so gloomy here.
24.08.2021 04:58:44 - Kim: And I wouldn't mind a bit of rain. It would be a nice change from the wind.
24.08.2021 04:59:15 - Parker: Maybe we should all swap places for a bit.
24.08.2021 04:59:50 - April: That sounds like a great idea, Parker.
24.08.2021 05:01:44 - Alexander: I'm in. Who wants to come to sunny California?
24.08.2021 05:02:47 - Teegan: I'll swap with you, Alexander. You can have the London rain.
24.08.2021 05:04:09 - Kim: And I'll swap with you, April. I could use a bit of snow in my life.
24.08.2021 06:19:01 - Parker: Hey guys, have you started looking into your college applications yet?
24.08.2021 06:20:39 - April: Yeah, I'm so overwhelmed. There are so many options.
24.08.2021 06:22:24 - Alexander: I've narrowed down my choices to a few universities. Now, it's all about writing the perfect application.
24.08.2021 06:23:09 - Teegan: I'm stuck on the essay part. How do you even begin to write about 'a significant experience in your life?'
24.08.2021 06:24:04 - Kim: Maybe start by brainstorming some key moments that had a big impact on you, Teegan.
24.08.2021 06:25:10 - Parker: That's a good idea, Kim. And remember, it doesn't have to be something huge. It could be something small that changed your perspective.
24.08.2021 06:25:46 - April: I'm also struggling with financial aid. The forms are so confusing.
24.08.2021 06:26:32 - Alexander: I can help with that, April. I've been through it with my older sister.
24.08.2021 06:27:25 - Teegan: That would be great, Alexander. Maybe we can all meet up this weekend to work on our applications together.
24.08.2021 06:29:09 - Kim: That sounds like a plan. Let's do it.
24.08.2021 11:33:38 - Parker: Hey guys, have you tried that new Italian place downtown?
24.08.2021 11:34:58 - April: No, but I've heard good things! What's it called again?
24.08.2021 11:36:16 - Parker: It's called 'La Trattoria'. Really authentic Italian food.
24.08.2021 11:36:57 - Alexander: I'm in! Always up for trying new food spots.
24.08.2021 11:38:19 - Teegan: Sounds great! We should plan a night to go together.
24.08.2021 11:39:14 - Kim: I've been there, the pasta is amazing!
24.08.2021 11:40:50 - April: Okay, I'm sold. Let's do this.
24.08.2021 11:41:24 - Alexander: How about next Friday?
24.08.2021 11:42:27 - Teegan: Works for me.
24.08.2021 11:43:06 - Kim: I'm in too.
24.08.2021 11:44:28 - Parker: Perfect, I'll make a reservation for 5 next Friday.
24.08.2021 11:45:50 - April: Great! Looking forward to it.
24.08.2021 11:46:34 - Alexander: Same here. Can't wait!
24.08.2021 11:47:21 - Teegan: See you guys then!
24.08.2021 11:49:13 - Kim: Excited for some delicious pasta!
24.08.2021 14:30:00 - Parker: Guys, I think we need to discuss the new formula for the product
24.08.2021 14:32:00 - April: Absolutely. We've been getting feedback that the quality isn't as high as it used to be
24.08.2021 14:33:02 - Alexander: That's a big issue. Any problem with the ingredients?
24.08.2021 14:33:48 - Teegan: As far as I can tell, the ingredients are fine. The issue might be in the process
24.08.2021 14:34:25 - Kim: I agree with Teegan. It's not the what, it's the how. We should revisit our process
24.08.2021 14:35:11 - Parker: That's a good point, Kim. We need to ensure we're not cutting corners
24.08.2021 14:36:09 - April: We also need to think about security. The last thing we want is for this operation to get busted
24.08.2021 14:38:04 - Alexander: I've got contacts that can help with securing the operation
24.08.2021 14:38:40 - Teegan: Let's focus on the process first, then we'll sort out security
24.08.2021 14:40:11 - Kim: Agreed. One thing at a time.

31.07.2022 21:10:10 - Falon: Hey Manuel! How's your weekend going so far?
31.07.2022 21:11:27 - Manuel: Hi Falon! It's been pretty good. I went for a hike in the morning. How about you?
31.07.2022 21:11:57 - Falon: That sounds fun! I've been chilling at home, watching some series. Any plans for Sunday?
31.07.2022 21:12:34 - Manuel: Yes, I plan to visit a museum. Do you have any recommendations?
31.07.2022 21:13:41 - Falon: You should check out the art museum downtown. They have a new exhibition.
31.07.2022 21:15:07 - Manuel: That sounds interesting. Will definitely check it out. Thanks, Falon!
31.07.2022 21:17:03 - Falon: No problem! Enjoy your visit. Let's catch up next week.
31.07.2022 21:18:15 - Manuel: Sure, sounds like a plan. Have a great weekend, Falon!
31.07.2022 21:20:11 - Falon: You too, Manuel!
31.07.2022 23:19:12 - Falon: Hey Manuel, have you heard the new album of Coldplay?
31.07.2022 23:19:50 - Manuel: Hey Falon, yes I did. I think it's really good, especially the song "Coloratura".
31.07.2022 23:20:56 - Falon: I agree, "Coloratura" is my favorite too. I also loved their collaboration with BTS.
31.07.2022 23:21:56 - Manuel: Yes, that was quite unexpected. But the song "My Universe" turned out to be a great blend of two different styles.
31.07.2022 23:23:39 - Falon: Exactly. It's like a perfect fusion of pop and rock. What other genres do you listen to?
31.07.2022 23:24:23 - Manuel: I'm a big fan of jazz and blues. Recently, I've been listening to a lot of Miles Davis.
31.07.2022 23:26:09 - Falon: Oh, Miles Davis is a legend. I personally love "So What". It's such a classic.
31.07.2022 23:26:52 - Manuel: Yes, "So What" is a masterpiece. Do you play any instruments?
31.07.2022 23:28:06 - Falon: I'm learning to play the guitar. I hope to play like Eric Clapton one day.
31.07.2022 23:28:51 - Manuel: That's cool. Keep practicing and you'll get there. Speaking of Clapton, have you heard his song "Tears in Heaven"?
31.07.2022 23:30:40 - Falon: Yes, it's a beautiful song. It always makes me emotional.
31.07.2022 23:31:42 - Manuel: Same here. It's one of those songs that touches your soul.
31.07.2022 23:32:17 - Falon: I totally agree. Music has such a powerful impact on our emotions.
01.08.2022 02:54:34 - Falon: Hey Manuel, have you seen the latest episode of 'The Witcher' yet?
01.08.2022 02:55:35 - Manuel: Hi Falon! Yes, I just finished watching it. It was thrilling!
01.08.2022 02:57:25 - Falon: I know, right? The plot twists were unexpected!
01.08.2022 02:58:24 - Manuel: Absolutely, especially the character development of Geralt. I am really impressed.
01.08.2022 02:59:37 - Falon: Me too! I can't wait for the next episode. Do you have any other series to recommend?
01.08.2022 03:01:00 - Manuel: Yes, I just started watching 'Stranger Things'. It's really good so far.
01.08.2022 03:02:04 - Falon: I've heard a lot about it. What's it about?
01.08.2022 03:03:14 - Manuel: It's a sci-fi horror series. It's about a group of kids in a small town who encounter supernatural phenomena.
01.08.2022 03:04:02 - Falon: Sounds intriguing! I'll definitely check it out. Thanks for the suggestion!
01.08.2022 03:05:29 - Manuel: No problem! Let me know what you think about it.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

25.06.2021 10:45:51 - Brandon: Hey guys, I just finished reading 'To Kill a Mockingbird'. What a fantastic book!
25.06.2021 10:47:15 - Marvin: I agree, Brandon. I read it a few years back and it's still one of my favorites.
25.06.2021 10:48:55 - Kea: I haven't read that one yet. Would you recommend it?
25.06.2021 10:50:17 - Brandon: Absolutely, Kea. It's a classic. The themes of racial inequality and loss of innocence are as relevant today as they were when the book was written.
25.06.2021 10:51:38 - Joshua: I'm more into sci-fi. Has anyone read 'Dune' by Frank Herbert?
25.06.2021 10:53:23 - Marvin: I have, Joshua. It's a stunning piece of work. The world-building is incredible.
25.06.2021 10:54:16 - Kea: I think I'll add both 'To Kill a Mockingbird' and 'Dune' to my reading list.
25.06.2021 10:55:27 - Brandon: Good choices, Kea. Let's all share a book we recommend next time.
25.06.2021 10:56:47 - Joshua: Sounds like a plan. I'll come prepared.
25.06.2021 10:57:28 - Marvin: Me too. Looking forward to it.
25.06.2021 14:31:39 - Brandon: Hey guys, have you seen the latest episode of 'Stranger Things'?
25.06.2021 14:32:56 - Marvin: I haven't watched it yet, Brandon. No spoilers, please!
25.06.2021 14:33:41 - Kea: I'm with Marvin on this one. I plan to binge-watch it over the weekend.
25.06.2021 14:34:44 - Joshua: Well, I've seen it and it's fantastic. You guys are in for a treat!
25.06.2021 14:35:43 - Brandon: Okay, no spoilers. But let's discuss it once everyone's seen it. It's too good!
25.06.2021 14:36:13 - Marvin: Sounds like a plan. We can have a virtual watch party over the weekend.
25.06.2021 14:36:52 - Kea: Great idea, Marvin! I'll get the popcorn.
25.06.2021 14:37:58 - Joshua: And I'll bring the theories! Looking forward to it.
25.06.2021 14:39:00 - Brandon: Haha, Joshua, always the conspiracy theorist!
25.06.2021 14:40:37 - Marvin: That's what makes our discussions interesting. Can't wait for the weekend!
25.06.2021 14:42:23 - Kea: Same here, guys. Let's do this!
25.06.2021 14:43:21 - Joshua: It's a date then. See you all on the other side of 'Stranger Things'!
25.06.2021 18:45:00 - Brandon: Hey guys, have you picked up any new hobbies lately?
25.06.2021 18:46:10 - Marvin: I've actually started painting miniatures, it's been a pretty relaxing way to spend my evenings.
25.06.2021 18:47:44 - Kea: That's cool, Marvin! I've been trying to improve my photography skills.
25.06.2021 18:48:38 - Joshua: Oh, nice! I've been learning how to play the guitar.
25.06.2021 18:49:15 - Brandon: That's awesome! We should all share our progress sometime.
25.06.2021 18:50:57 - Marvin: Sounds good to me. I can share some pictures of the miniatures I've painted.
25.06.2021 18:51:33 - Kea: I'd be happy to share some of my photographs.
25.06.2021 18:52:55 - Joshua: And I can play a song for you guys when I get a bit better.
26.06.2021 00:39:09 - Brandon: Hey guys, how are you managing your study time?
26.06.2021 00:40:05 - Marvin: I'm trying to stick to a schedule, but it's tough with all the assignments and projects.
26.06.2021 00:41:52 - Kea: I find it helpful to break things down into smaller tasks. Makes it less overwhelming.
26.06.2021 00:43:13 - Joshua: I use a planner to keep track of everything. It helps to see everything laid out in front of me.
26.06.2021 00:43:55 - Brandon: Great suggestions guys! I'll try to incorporate those into my routine.
26.06.2021 00:44:57 - Marvin: Just remember to take breaks too. It's easy to burn out if you're not careful.
26.06.2021 00:46:40 - Kea: Absolutely, Marvin. I usually take a 10-minute break for every hour of study.
26.06.2021 00:48:19 - Joshua: That's a good tip, Kea. I'll try that out.
26.06.2021 00:49:39 - Brandon: Thanks for the tips everyone. Let's keep pushing and finish strong!
26.06.2021 05:26:00 - Brandon: Hey guys, have you tried the new yoga class in our gym?
26.06.2021 05:27:20 - Marvin: No, I haven't. Is it good?
26.06.2021 05:29:05 - Brandon: Yeah! It's really amazing for mental and physical health.
26.06.2021 05:31:04 - Kea: Sounds interesting. How often do you go?
26.06.2021 05:32:48 - Brandon: I try to go at least three times a week.
26.06.2021 05:33:43 - Joshua: I've been thinking about starting yoga. Does it help with stress?
26.06.2021 05:34:27 - Brandon: Absolutely, Joshua. It helps me a lot with stress management.
26.06.2021 05:36:05 - Marvin: I think I'll give it a try. Thanks for the suggestion, Brandon.
26.06.2021 05:37:35 - Kea: I'm in too. Let's all go together next time.
26.06.2021 05:38:08 - Joshua: Sounds like a plan.

Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

22.03.2022 20:27:07 - Robert: Hey Tiana, how have you been feeling lately?
22.03.2022 20:28:10 - Tiana: Hi Robert, I have been feeling a bit under the weather lately.
22.03.2022 20:29:19 - Robert: Oh no, what seems to be the problem?
22.03.2022 20:30:21 - Tiana: I have been having headaches and feeling really tired.
22.03.2022 20:31:00 - Robert: That doesn't sound good. Have you seen a doctor yet?
22.03.2022 20:32:38 - Tiana: Not yet, I thought it was just stress from work.
22.03.2022 20:34:28 - Robert: It could be, but I think you should get a check-up just to be sure.
22.03.2022 20:35:52 - Tiana: You're right, better safe than sorry. I will book an appointment tomorrow.
22.03.2022 20:36:38 - Robert: That's a good decision Tiana. Let me know how it goes.
22.03.2022 20:38:10 - Tiana: I definitely will. Thanks for your concern, Robert.
22.03.2022 23:43:16 - Robert: Hello Tiana, are you free to chat about our upcoming trip?
22.03.2022 23:44:20 - Tiana: Hi Robert, sure I am. Do you have any specific plans?
22.03.2022 23:45:33 - Robert: I was thinking about visiting France. Have you been there before?
22.03.2022 23:46:31 - Tiana: Yes, I have. France is beautiful. Do you have any specific cities in mind?
22.03.2022 23:47:42 - Robert: I've always wanted to visit Paris and Nice. What do you think?
22.03.2022 23:48:30 - Tiana: Paris is a must-visit. Nice is also great, especially during the summer.
22.03.2022 23:49:00 - Robert: That's great. Do we need any specific documents for traveling there?
22.03.2022 23:50:09 - Tiana: We need our passports, and France requires a tourist visa for stays longer than 90 days.
22.03.2022 23:51:43 - Robert: Perfect! I'll start preparing the necessary documents.
22.03.2022 23:53:34 - Tiana: Great! Let's discuss more details soon.
23.03.2022 03:59:31 - Robert: Hey Tiana, have you seen the latest news about the Mars Rover?
23.03.2022 04:00:20 - Tiana: No, I haven't yet. What's up?
23.03.2022 04:01:55 - Robert: Apparently, it has discovered some intriguing rock formations that could potentially indicate past life on Mars.
23.03.2022 04:02:55 - Tiana: Wow, that's fascinating! I'll have to look into it more. Thanks for sharing, Robert!
23.03.2022 04:03:56 - Robert: No problem, Tiana. I thought you'd find it interesting given your interest in space exploration.
23.03.2022 04:04:53 - Tiana: Absolutely! I'm always amazed by the new things we're discovering about our universe.
23.03.2022 04:06:28 - Robert: Same here. It's a great time to be alive and witness these incredible advancements.
23.03.2022 04:07:06 - Tiana: Definitely! I can't wait to see what they'll discover next on Mars.
23.03.2022 04:08:47 - Robert: Me too, I hope they'll keep us updated.
23.03.2022 08:30:00 - Robert: Good morning, Tiana. How are you today?
23.03.2022 08:31:53 - Tiana: Morning Robert, I'm good, just getting ready for work. How about you?
23.03.2022 08:32:58 - Robert: I'm doing well, thank you. Just had my morning coffee and about to start working.
23.03.2022 08:34:49 - Tiana: That's good. What's on the agenda today?
23.03.2022 08:36:30 - Robert: I have a few meetings and need to finish a report. How about you?
23.03.2022 08:37:47 - Tiana: I need to complete a project and then get to some email backlog. It's going to be a busy day.
23.03.2022 08:38:42 - Robert: Sounds like it. Remember to take breaks when you need them.
23.03.2022 08:39:22 - Tiana: I will. You do the same, Robert. We often forget to take care of ourselves in the hustle.
23.03.2022 08:40:00 - Robert: You're absolutely right, Tiana. Let's promise to look after ourselves better.
23.03.2022 08:40:58 - Tiana: Deal. Have a productive day, Robert.
23.03.2022 08:41:52 - Robert: You too, Tiana. Catch you later.
23.03.2022 10:25:36 - Robert: Have you watched the latest Marvel movie?
23.03.2022 10:26:11 - Tiana: Not yet, have you?
23.03.2022 10:26:55 - Robert: Yes, I watched it last night.
23.03.2022 10:27:32 - Tiana: How was it?
23.03.2022 10:28:31 - Robert: I liked it but I think the previous one was better.
23.03.2022 10:29:36 - Tiana: Oh really? I loved the previous one so maybe I won't like this as much.
23.03.2022 10:30:45 - Robert: Maybe. But you should still watch it, it’s worth it.
23.03.2022 10:32:34 - Tiana: Yeah, I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
23.03.2022 10:34:10 - Robert: Anytime! Let me know what you think once you’ve seen it.
23.03.2022 10:35:39 - Tiana: Will do. Thanks Robert.
23.03.2022 10:37:32 - Robert: You're welcome. Enjoy!
23.03.2022 10:38:13 - Tiana: I'm sure I will. Chat later, Robert.
23.03.2022 10:39:37 - Robert: Bye Tiana, talk to you soon.
23.03.2022 11:36:18 - Robert: Hey Tiana, how's the college application process going?
23.03.2022 11:37:39 - Tiana: Hey Robert! It's going alright. Just sorting through various colleges.
23.03.2022 11:39:19 - Robert: That's cool. Any favorites yet?
23.03.2022 11:40:04 - Tiana: Well, I've been looking at Stanford and Harvard so far.
23.03.2022 11:40:55 - Robert: Wow, those are great choices! What major are you considering?
23.03.2022 11:42:52 - Tiana: I'm thinking about computer science. But I also love biochemistry.
23.03.2022 11:44:36 - Robert: That's interesting. You know, you can always do a double major or choose one as a minor.
23.03.2022 11:46:01 - Tiana: Yeah, that's true. Just trying to figure out what would be the best fit for me.
23.03.2022 11:47:15 - Robert: You'll figure it out. What about the deadlines? Are they coming up soon?
23.03.2022 11:49:13 - Tiana: Yes, they are. I'm working on my essays now.
23.03.2022 11:50:28 - Robert: If you need any help or someone to proofread, let me know!
23.03.2022 11:51:52 - Tiana: Thanks, Robert! I might take you up on that.
23.03.2022 11:53:29 - Robert: No problem, Tiana. Good luck with everything!
23.03.2022 11:55:03 - Tiana: Thanks, Robert! I'll keep you updated.
23.03.2022 11:56:45 - Robert: Sure, looking forward to it!
23.03.2022 16:34:05 - Robert: Hey Tiana, have you listened to the new album by The Weeknd?
23.03.2022 16:36:02 - Tiana: Hi Robert, yes I have. It's totally different from his previous works.
23.03.2022 16:37:00 - Robert: I agree. It seems like he's experimenting with a new sound. Did you have a favorite track?
23.03.2022 16:38:25 - Tiana: I think "Save Your Tears" was pretty good. What about you?
23.03.2022 16:39:35 - Robert: I quite liked "Blinding Lights". It has a catchy tune.
23.03.2022 16:41:10 - Tiana: That's true. It's one of those songs that you can't get out of your head.
23.03.2022 16:42:00 - Robert: Do you think this album will win any awards?
23.03.2022 16:42:34 - Tiana: It's hard to say. The competition is tough this year. But I think he might win a few.

06.04.2022 07:31:58 - Evelyn: I haven't gotten around to it yet. No spoilers, please!

06.04.2022 11:59:15 - Kenneth: Hello Rebecca and Evelyn, I've been thinking about the concept of free will lately. Do you think our choices are truly ours, or are they predetermined by factors beyond our control?

06.04.2022 12:02:11 - Evelyn: Interesting perspective, Rebecca. I often lean more towards determinism though. I believe that every event, including human cognition and behavior, is causally determined by an unbroken chain of prior occurrences.
06.04.2022 12:04:05 - Kenneth: That's a valid point, Evelyn. But doesn't that undermine the notion of moral responsibility? If our actions are predetermined, can we be held accountable for them?
06.04.2022 12:04:44 - Rebecca: I think that's where compatibilism comes in. It's the idea that free will and determinism can coexist. We can make choices, but those choices are influenced by a variety of factors.
06.04.2022 12:06:31 - Evelyn: Yes, Rebecca. Compatibilism is a compelling perspective. It allows for complexity in our understanding of free will and determinism.
