old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

01.04.2022 16:30:00 - Sarah: Hi Geraldine, do you have any plans for the weekend?
01.04.2022 16:30:55 - Geraldine: Hey Sarah, not really. I'm thinking of catching up on some reading. You?
01.04.2022 16:32:35 - Sarah: I was thinking about going for a hike. Would you like to join?
01.04.2022 16:33:39 - Geraldine: That sounds fun. Where are you planning to go?
01.04.2022 16:35:33 - Sarah: I'm planning to go to the local park. They have some good trails there.
01.04.2022 16:36:32 - Geraldine: Oh, I've heard about those. I'm in!
01.04.2022 16:37:06 - Sarah: Great! Let's meet at 9 am on Saturday then?
01.04.2022 16:38:25 - Geraldine: Perfect! See you then, Sarah.
01.04.2022 16:39:33 - Sarah: Looking forward to it, Geraldine. Have a good week until then!
01.04.2022 20:47:50 - Sarah: Hey Geraldine, have you been keeping up with the Olympics?
01.04.2022 20:48:25 - Geraldine: Yes, I have Sarah! I'm really enjoying the swimming events. How about you?
01.04.2022 20:49:15 - Sarah: I've been glued to the athletics! The 100m sprint was incredible!
01.04.2022 20:50:13 - Geraldine: It was, wasn't it? I also loved the gymnastics. Simone Biles is amazing.
01.04.2022 20:51:56 - Sarah: She really is. Have you seen any of the football games?
01.04.2022 20:53:10 - Geraldine: I watched a couple. The skill level is unbelievable!
01.04.2022 20:54:14 - Sarah: It certainly is. I can't wait for the next Olympics.
01.04.2022 20:55:13 - Geraldine: Me neither! It's going to be a long wait but worth it.
02.04.2022 02:37:49 - Sarah: Hey Geraldine, have you ever had a dream that felt so real, you were not sure if you were awake or asleep?
02.04.2022 02:38:49 - Geraldine: Yes, Sarah, I've had such dreams. I think they're called lucid dreams. They can be quite disconcerting.
02.04.2022 02:40:20 - Sarah: Interesting. I had one last night, and it was about a place I've never been to. It was so vivid.
02.04.2022 02:40:53 - Geraldine: That's fascinating, Sarah. Dreams can sometimes be a reflection of our subconscious mind. Any idea what the place signified?
02.04.2022 02:42:17 - Sarah: Not really, Geraldine. But it was peaceful and serene. I felt very calm there.
02.04.2022 02:43:02 - Geraldine: That sounds like a beautiful dream, Sarah. Maybe your mind is telling you that you need some tranquility in your life.
02.04.2022 02:44:12 - Sarah: Maybe you're right, Geraldine. It's been quite hectic lately.
02.04.2022 02:45:49 - Geraldine: Take it as a sign, Sarah. Perhaps it's time for a little break. Dreams can be quite insightful.
02.04.2022 02:46:34 - Sarah: I will, Geraldine. Thanks for the chat. Dreams are indeed fascinating!
02.04.2022 02:47:28 - Geraldine: Absolutely, Sarah. Always here if you want to discuss more!
02.04.2022 06:36:43 - Sarah: Hey Geraldine, what are your plans for the weekend?
02.04.2022 06:38:18 - Geraldine: Hey Sarah, I'm planning to go for a hike. What about you?
02.04.2022 06:39:06 - Sarah: That sounds fun! I'm thinking of going to the beach.
02.04.2022 06:39:44 - Geraldine: Oh! I wish I could join you. But I've been planning this hike for a while now.
02.04.2022 06:40:53 - Sarah: Maybe next time then. Enjoy your hike!
02.04.2022 06:42:32 - Geraldine: Thanks, Sarah. I hope you have a great time at the beach.
02.04.2022 06:44:11 - Sarah: Thank you Geraldine. Let's catch up next week and share our experiences.
02.04.2022 06:44:51 - Geraldine: That's a great idea, Sarah. Looking forward to it!
02.04.2022 06:45:54 - Sarah: Me too, Geraldine. Have a great weekend!
02.04.2022 06:47:28 - Geraldine: You too, Sarah. Take care.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

22.09.2022 11:13:36 - Meredith: Hey guys, I just saw that the Arctic Monkeys are doing a concert next month!
22.09.2022 11:14:42 - Roy: Wow, really? That's awesome. I've always wanted to see them live.
22.09.2022 11:15:51 - Steven: Same here. Their last album was amazing.
22.09.2022 11:17:50 - Meredith: Should we plan to go together?
22.09.2022 11:18:45 - Roy: I'm in. Let's do it.
22.09.2022 11:19:17 - Steven: Me too. Let's start planning.
22.09.2022 11:21:05 - Meredith: Great, I'll start looking at tickets.
22.09.2022 11:22:42 - Roy: And I can check out accommodation and travel.
22.09.2022 11:24:26 - Steven: Sounds like a plan. This is going to be fun.
22.09.2022 12:47:08 - Meredith: Hey guys, have you heard the new album from The Weeknd?
22.09.2022 12:48:42 - Roy: Not yet, is it any good?
22.09.2022 12:50:18 - Meredith: I think it's fantastic. Very different from his previous work though.
22.09.2022 12:52:09 - Steven: I'm more of a classic rock guy. The Weeknd isn't really my cup of tea.
22.09.2022 12:53:29 - Roy: You should give it a try, Steven. It's always good to explore new genres.
22.09.2022 12:54:44 - Steven: Maybe I will. Any specific song you guys recommend?
22.09.2022 12:55:15 - Meredith: I really love 'Save Your Tears'. It has a catchy tune.
22.09.2022 12:55:52 - Roy: I second that. Also, 'Blinding Lights' is a great track as well.
22.09.2022 12:57:41 - Steven: Okay, I'll check out those songs and let you guys know what I think.
22.09.2022 12:59:23 - Meredith: Great! Looking forward to your thoughts, Steven.
22.09.2022 13:00:30 - Roy: Same here. It's always interesting to hear different perspectives on music.
22.09.2022 13:01:03 - Steven: Sure thing. Let's chat about this again next week.
22.09.2022 14:30:00 - Meredith: Hey guys, what are you up to this weekend?
22.09.2022 14:30:57 - Roy: Not sure yet, got any plans Mer?
22.09.2022 14:32:54 - Steven: I was thinking about going to the park and maybe do some outdoor activities
22.09.2022 14:34:43 - Meredith: That sounds great! We could make a picnic out of it
22.09.2022 14:36:01 - Roy: I'm in! I can bring some snacks and drinks
22.09.2022 14:37:53 - Steven: Perfect! I'll bring a frisbee and some games
22.09.2022 14:38:31 - Meredith: Great! Let's meet at the park at 10:00 AM on Saturday
22.09.2022 14:39:17 - Roy: Sounds like a plan. See you guys then!
22.09.2022 14:40:50 - Steven: Looking forward to it! See you on Saturday
22.09.2022 16:55:41 - Meredith: Hey guys, have you seen the latest video on the 'Tech Guru' channel?
22.09.2022 16:56:44 - Roy: Not yet, Meredith. Is it worth watching?
22.09.2022 16:57:52 - Steven: I saw it this morning. It's about the impact of AI on video editing. Quite fascinating.
22.09.2022 16:59:00 - Meredith: Exactly, Steven! The way AI can enhance video quality and do complex edits is mind-blowing.
22.09.2022 17:00:17 - Roy: Sounds interesting. I'll definitely give it a watch.
22.09.2022 17:00:55 - Steven: Meredith, do you have any other recommendations?
22.09.2022 17:01:36 - Meredith: Sure, there's another channel 'Science Today' that posted a video about virtual reality. You guys might find it interesting.
22.09.2022 17:03:05 - Roy: Great! Thanks for the recommendations, Meredith.
22.09.2022 17:04:28 - Steven: Yes, thanks Meredith. I'll check that out too.
22.09.2022 22:19:54 - Meredith: Good morning everyone, just a reminder that our project deadline is coming up next week.
22.09.2022 22:20:47 - Roy: Thanks for the reminder Meredith, I'm almost done with my part.
22.09.2022 22:21:30 - Steven: I'm also on track. Should be able to finish by this week.
22.09.2022 22:22:18 - Meredith: Great! Let's aim to have everything ready for review by Friday.
22.09.2022 22:24:07 - Steven: Sounds good. I'll send my part for review as soon as I'm done.
22.09.2022 22:25:32 - Roy: I'll do the same. Let's aim for a smooth submission.
22.09.2022 22:26:58 - Meredith: Perfect. Also, we need to prepare the presentation. Who wants to take the lead on that?
22.09.2022 22:28:32 - Steven: I can do that. I'll start working on it after finishing my part.
22.09.2022 22:29:28 - Roy: I can provide the data and figures for the presentation.
22.09.2022 22:31:05 - Meredith: Excellent! Let's reconvene on Friday to review everything.
23.09.2022 04:18:19 - Meredith: Hey guys! Did you catch the latest episode of 'The Crown'?
23.09.2022 04:19:47 - Roy: Hi Meredith! Yes, I did. I think it's one of the best so far. The acting was superb.
23.09.2022 04:20:33 - Steven: I agree with Roy. The detailing was also remarkable. They've really tried to keep things historically accurate.
23.09.2022 04:21:57 - Meredith: Yeah, I was reading about that. It's interesting how they've managed to capture the essence of the era.
23.09.2022 04:22:40 - Steven: True. But have you guys seen 'Breaking Bad'? It's a different genre but the storytelling is brilliant.
23.09.2022 04:23:25 - Roy: I've heard about it but never got around to watching it. Would you recommend it, Steven?
23.09.2022 04:24:32 - Steven: Absolutely! It's a must-watch. The character development is unlike any other show.
23.09.2022 04:26:24 - Meredith: I'll add it to my list then. I've been looking for a new series to start.
23.09.2022 04:28:05 - Roy: Same here. Thanks for the recommendation, Steven!
23.09.2022 04:28:48 - Steven: You're welcome, guys! Let me know what you think once you've seen a few episodes.
23.09.2022 07:01:11 - Meredith: Hi everyone, I was thinking about getting a pet. Any suggestions?
23.09.2022 07:01:49 - Roy: Hey Meredith, that's great! What are you considering? A dog, cat or something else?
23.09.2022 07:02:47 - Steven: A pet can be a great companion, Meredith. Do you have any preferences in terms of size, lifespan, etc.?
23.09.2022 07:04:18 - Meredith: I am thinking of a smaller pet due to my apartment size. Any ideas?
23.09.2022 07:05:12 - Roy: How about a cat? They are relatively low maintenance and perfect for apartments.
23.09.2022 07:06:46 - Steven: A hamster could also be a good option. They are small and easy to take care of.
23.09.2022 07:08:07 - Meredith: Thanks for the suggestions, guys. I'll look into both cats and hamsters.
23.09.2022 07:09:37 - Roy: You're welcome, Meredith. Feel free to ask if you have any more questions.
23.09.2022 07:10:16 - Steven: Good luck with your decision, Meredith.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

08.09.2021 18:30:00 - Rylan: Hi Phyllis, have you ever tried painting?
08.09.2021 18:30:35 - Phyllis: Hey Rylan, yes, I have tried it a few times. Do you paint?
08.09.2021 18:31:56 - Rylan: I've started recently. It's really therapeutic.
08.09.2021 18:33:20 - Phyllis: That's great! What type of painting do you prefer?
08.09.2021 18:34:46 - Rylan: I'm really enjoying watercolor. There's something about the fluidity that I love.
08.09.2021 18:35:23 - Phyllis: Yes, watercolor is beautiful. Have you taken any classes, or are you self-taught?
08.09.2021 18:37:06 - Rylan: I'm mostly self-taught, but I've watched a lot of YouTube tutorials. Do you have any tips?
08.09.2021 18:38:32 - Phyllis: Just keep practicing, and don't be afraid to make mistakes. That's how we learn.
08.09.2021 18:40:20 - Rylan: Thanks, Phyllis. I really appreciate your advice.
08.09.2021 18:42:17 - Phyllis: You're welcome, Rylan. Happy painting!
09.09.2021 00:03:44 - Rylan: Hi Phyllis, have you read 'The Alchemist' by Paulo Coelho?
09.09.2021 00:05:42 - Phyllis: Hello Rylan, yes, I have. It's such an inspiring book. Did you enjoy it too?
09.09.2021 00:06:44 - Rylan: Absolutely, I loved it. It gave me a new perspective on life. Have you read any other books by Coelho?
09.09.2021 00:08:13 - Phyllis: Yes, I have also read 'Brida' and 'Eleven Minutes'. Both are great books.
09.09.2021 00:09:14 - Rylan: I haven't read 'Brida' yet. Would you recommend it?
09.09.2021 00:10:37 - Phyllis: Yes, I would definitely recommend it. It's a beautifully written novel about self-discovery.
09.09.2021 00:11:11 - Rylan: That sounds interesting. I'll add it to my reading list. By the way, have you read any books by Haruki Murakami?
09.09.2021 00:12:26 - Phyllis: Yes, I've read 'Kafka on the Shore'. It's quite thought-provoking.
09.09.2021 00:13:55 - Rylan: I agree. Murakami has a unique storytelling style. I recently finished 'Norwegian Wood'.
09.09.2021 00:14:26 - Phyllis: Oh, that's on my reading list. Did you enjoy it?
09.09.2021 00:14:59 - Rylan: Yes, it was a great read. I think you'll enjoy it too.
09.09.2021 00:16:12 - Phyllis: Great, I'll move it up on my reading list. Thanks for the recommendation, Rylan.
09.09.2021 00:18:04 - Rylan: You're welcome, Phyllis. Always happy to talk about books.
09.09.2021 06:00:46 - Rylan: Hey Phyllis, how's it going?
09.09.2021 06:02:40 - Phyllis: Hi Rylan! I'm doing well, thanks. How about you?
09.09.2021 06:03:45 - Rylan: I'm good, thanks. I was just watching the basketball game. It's a close one.
09.09.2021 06:05:20 - Phyllis: Oh, which teams are playing?
09.09.2021 06:06:27 - Rylan: The Lakers and the Celtics. It's a classic rivalry.
09.09.2021 06:07:27 - Phyllis: That sounds exciting! Who's leading?
09.09.2021 06:08:44 - Rylan: The Lakers are up by 3 points right now, but there's still plenty of time left.
09.09.2021 06:09:42 - Phyllis: I'm rooting for the Celtics. They have a great team this season.
09.09.2021 06:10:35 - Rylan: They do indeed. But I'm a Lakers fan, so we're on opposite sides for this one!
09.09.2021 06:11:57 - Phyllis: May the best team win then!
09.09.2021 11:08:37 - Rylan: Hey Phyllis, did you catch the latest episode of The Crown?
09.09.2021 11:10:29 - Phyllis: Hi Rylan, yes I did! The storyline is getting more and more interesting.
09.09.2021 11:12:18 - Rylan: I know right! The character development is absolutely remarkable.
09.09.2021 11:13:01 - Phyllis: Definitely. Olivia Colman is doing a great job portraying Queen Elizabeth II.
09.09.2021 11:13:32 - Rylan: Agreed. And what about Tobias Menzies as Prince Philip? He's phenomenal!
09.09.2021 11:15:31 - Phyllis: Yes, his performance is quite captivating. I'm also really enjoying Helena Bonham Carter as Princess Margaret.
09.09.2021 11:17:17 - Rylan: She's always been one of my favorite actresses. Her versatility is just amazing.
09.09.2021 11:18:05 - Phyllis: Indeed. Can't wait for the next episode!
09.09.2021 11:19:30 - Rylan: Me too. Let's plan a watch party for it.
09.09.2021 11:20:59 - Phyllis: That sounds like a great idea, Rylan! Let's do it.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

12.03.2022 10:39:22 - Jaiden: Hey guys, do you have any idea about the math homework?
12.03.2022 10:41:17 - Cindy: Yes, Jaiden. It's about the quadratic equations we studied in class today.
12.03.2022 10:43:06 - Tre: I'm still confused about those equations. Can someone explain the formula to me again?
12.03.2022 10:43:36 - John: Sure Tre, the quadratic formula is: x = [-b ± sqrt(b^2 - 4ac)] / (2a).
12.03.2022 10:44:07 - Cindy: That's right, John. And 'a' is the coefficient of x^2, 'b' is the coefficient of x, and 'c' is the constant.
12.03.2022 10:45:36 - Tre: Oh, I see now. Thanks, Cindy and John.
12.03.2022 10:46:23 - Jaiden: No problem, Tre. Do you guys want to study together for the test next week?
12.03.2022 10:47:21 - John: That sounds like a good idea, Jaiden. Let's meet up in the library after school tomorrow.
12.03.2022 10:49:19 - Cindy: I'm in too. I think it would be really helpful.
12.03.2022 10:50:32 - Tre: Count me in as well. Let's ace this test together!
12.03.2022 13:00:00 - Jaiden: Hey guys, anyone else listen to the new episode of "The Daily" this morning?
12.03.2022 13:00:53 - Cindy: Not yet Jaiden. Was it interesting?
12.03.2022 13:01:58 - Jaiden: Definitely! They had a really good discussion on the impact of technology on society.
12.03.2022 13:02:41 - Tre: Oh, that sounds intriguing. I'll have to check it out.
12.03.2022 13:04:03 - John: Is it available on all podcast platforms?
12.03.2022 13:04:40 - Jaiden: Yes John, it's on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and even their website.
12.03.2022 13:05:15 - Cindy: I'll definitely give it a listen then.
12.03.2022 13:06:17 - Tre: Maybe we should start our own podcast, guys.
12.03.2022 13:07:52 - John: That's not a bad idea Tre. What would we talk about though?
12.03.2022 13:09:46 - Jaiden: We could discuss our favorite podcasts and what we learned from them.
12.03.2022 13:11:40 - Cindy: Or we could talk about different topics each week, like a book club but for podcasts.
12.03.2022 13:13:20 - Tre: I love that idea Cindy.
12.03.2022 13:14:49 - John: Let's do it. I'm in.
12.03.2022 18:30:00 - Jaiden: Hey guys! Have you tried out the new painting techniques I sent last week?
12.03.2022 18:31:35 - Cindy: Yes, I have! The wet-on-wet technique was quite tricky but fun to learn.
12.03.2022 18:32:21 - Tre: I'm still struggling with the dry brush technique. Any tips?
12.03.2022 18:33:17 - John: I found watching some tutorial videos really helpful, Tre. Try that.
12.03.2022 18:34:46 - Cindy: Also, always remember to use a stiff brush and very little paint for dry brushing.
12.03.2022 18:35:21 - Jaiden: Great tips, guys! Let's keep practicing and share our artworks next week.
12.03.2022 18:35:55 - John: Sounds like a plan. Looking forward to it.
12.03.2022 18:37:06 - Tre: Me too. Happy painting, everyone!
13.03.2022 00:10:18 - Jaiden: Hey guys, what are your plans for this weekend?
13.03.2022 00:11:45 - Cindy: I'm thinking of going to the beach. Anyone wants to join?
13.03.2022 00:13:43 - Tre: Sounds great, Cindy! I'll bring the snacks.
13.03.2022 00:14:22 - John: I'm in too. I'll drive.
13.03.2022 00:15:26 - Jaiden: Awesome! I'll bring the beach games.
13.03.2022 00:16:51 - Cindy: Great. Let's meet at my place at 9 am.
13.03.2022 00:17:54 - Tre: Perfect. See you all there.
13.03.2022 00:18:34 - John: Looking forward to it.
13.03.2022 00:19:23 - Jaiden: It's a date then. See you all on Saturday.
13.03.2022 02:29:45 - Jaiden: Hey guys, I've started a new diet recently, any tips?
13.03.2022 02:30:27 - Cindy: That's great Jaiden! Make sure you're eating a balanced diet, not just restricting certain food groups.
13.03.2022 02:31:45 - Tre: Agreed with Cindy. Also, remember to drink lots of water.
13.03.2022 02:33:08 - John: Absolutely! Exercise is just as important as diet too.
13.03.2022 02:34:54 - Jaiden: Thanks for the tips! I've been trying to incorporate more fruits and veggies.
13.03.2022 02:35:56 - Cindy: That's a good start, Jaiden. Also, try to cut down on processed foods.
13.03.2022 02:36:50 - Tre: Yes, and don't forget about your protein intake. It's essential for muscle health.
13.03.2022 02:38:10 - John: Good point, Tre. Protein is also important for repairing body tissues.
13.03.2022 02:39:10 - Jaiden: I'll keep that in mind! I've also been considering taking supplements.
13.03.2022 02:40:35 - Cindy: It's better to get your nutrients from food, but supplements can help fill the gaps.
13.03.2022 02:41:36 - Tre: Just make sure to consult with a healthcare professional before starting any supplements.
13.03.2022 02:42:19 - John: Agreed. Not all supplements are created equal, and some can even be harmful.
13.03.2022 04:26:03 - Jaiden: Anyone else notice how hot it's been this week?
13.03.2022 04:27:02 - Cindy: Yes! It's been unbearable. My AC has been running nonstop.
13.03.2022 04:28:11 - Tre: I actually love the heat. It's perfect for my morning runs.
13.03.2022 04:29:28 - John: I'm more of a cool weather guy myself. The heat just drains me.
13.03.2022 04:31:06 - Jaiden: I heard it's supposed to cool down by the weekend.
13.03.2022 04:32:45 - Cindy: That would be a relief. I can't handle another scorcher.
13.03.2022 04:33:54 - Tre: Well, I'm hoping for at least one more hot day. Perfect beach weather.
13.03.2022 04:35:15 - John: Just remember to stay hydrated, everyone. It's easy to forget in this heat.
13.03.2022 09:10:28 - Jaiden: Hey guys, just wondering, what's everyone's major?
13.03.2022 09:12:22 - Cindy: I'm studying Computer Science. How about you Jaiden?
13.03.2022 09:13:04 - Jaiden: I'm in Business Administration. Tre, John, what about you guys?
13.03.2022 09:14:46 - Tre: I'm majoring in Psychology.
13.03.2022 09:16:38 - John: I'm in the same boat as Cindy, Computer Science.
13.03.2022 09:18:32 - Cindy: That's cool John! We should study together sometime.
13.03.2022 09:19:58 - John: Definitely, Cindy. It would be great to have a study partner.
13.03.2022 09:21:49 - Tre: Jaiden, what made you choose Business Administration?
13.03.2022 09:23:36 - Jaiden: I've always been interested in running my own business someday. So I thought this would be the best path.
13.03.2022 09:24:13 - Cindy: That sounds like a great plan, Jaiden.
13.03.2022 09:25:45 - John: I agree. It's important to follow our passions.
13.03.2022 09:26:21 - Tre: Absolutely. We're all on our individual paths, but it's nice we can share the journey.
13.03.2022 09:27:57 - Jaiden: Couldn't agree more, guys. Let's all do our best!

prompt_1.content:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

12.03.2022 10:39:22 - Jaiden: Hey guys, do you have any idea about the math homework?
12.03.2022 10:41:17 - Cindy: Yes, Jaiden. It's about the quadratic equations we studied in class today.
12.03.2022 10:43:06 - Tre: I'm still confused about those equations. Can someone explain the formula to me again?
12.03.2022 10:43:36 - John: Sure Tre, the quadratic formula is: x = [-b ± sqrt(b^2 - 4ac)] / (2a).
12.03.2022 10:44:07 - Cindy: That's right, John. And 'a' is the coefficient of x^2, 'b' is the coefficient of x, and 'c' is the constant.
12.03.2022 10:45:36 - Tre: Oh, I see now. Thanks, Cindy and John.
12.03.2022 10:46:23 - Jaiden: No problem, Tre. Do you guys want to study together for the test next week?
12.03.2022 10:47:21 - John: That sounds like a good idea, Jaiden. Let's meet up in the library after school tomorrow.
12.03.2022 10:49:19 - Cindy: I'm in too. I think it would be really helpful.
12.03.2022 10:50:32 - Tre: Count me in as well. Let's ace this test together!
12.03.2022 13:00:00 - Jaiden: Hey guys, anyone else listen to the new episode of "The Daily" this morning?
12.03.2022 13:00:53 - Cindy: Not yet Jaiden. Was it interesting?
12.03.2022 13:01:58 - Jaiden: Definitely! They had a really good discussion on the impact of technology on society.
12.03.2022 13:02:41 - Tre: Oh, that sounds intriguing. I'll have to check it out.
12.03.2022 13:04:03 - John: Is it available on all podcast platforms?
12.03.2022 13:04:40 - Jaiden: Yes John, it's on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and even their website.
12.03.2022 13:05:15 - Cindy: I'll definitely give it a listen then.
12.03.2022 13:06:17 - Tre: Maybe we should start our own podcast, guys.
12.03.2022 13:07:52 - John: That's not a bad idea Tre. What would we talk about though?
12.03.2022 13:09:46 - Jaiden: We could discuss our favorite podcasts and what we learned from them.
12.03.2022 13:11:40 - Cindy: Or we could talk about different topics each week, like a book club but for podcasts.
12.03.2022 13:13:20 - Tre: I love that idea Cindy.
12.03.2022 13:14:49 - John: Let's do it. I'm in.
12.03.2022 18:30:00 - Jaiden: Hey guys! Have you tried out the new painting techniques I sent last week?
12.03.2022 18:31:35 - Cindy: Yes, I have! The wet-on-wet technique was quite tricky but fun to learn.
12.03.2022 18:32:21 - Tre: I'm still struggling with the dry brush technique. Any tips?
12.03.2022 18:33:17 - John: I found watching some tutorial videos really helpful, Tre. Try that.
12.03.2022 18:34:46 - Cindy: Also, always remember to use a stiff brush and very little paint for dry brushing.
12.03.2022 18:35:21 - Jaiden: Great tips, guys! Let's keep practicing and share our artworks next week.
12.03.2022 18:35:55 - John: Sounds like a plan. Looking forward to it.
12.03.2022 18:37:06 - Tre: Me too. Happy painting, everyone!
13.03.2022 00:10:18 - Jaiden: Hey guys, what are your plans for this weekend?
13.03.2022 00:11:45 - Cindy: I'm thinking of going to the beach. Anyone wants to join?
13.03.2022 00:13:43 - Tre: Sounds great, Cindy! I'll bring the snacks.
13.03.2022 00:14:22 - John: I'm in too. I'll drive.
13.03.2022 00:15:26 - Jaiden: Awesome! I'll bring the beach games.
13.03.2022 00:16:51 - Cindy: Great. Let's meet at my place at 9 am.
13.03.2022 00:17:54 - Tre: Perfect. See you all there.
13.03.2022 00:18:34 - John: Looking forward to it.
13.03.2022 00:19:23 - Jaiden: It's a date then. See you all on Saturday.
13.03.2022 02:29:45 - Jaiden: Hey guys, I've started a new diet recently, any tips?
13.03.2022 02:30:27 - Cindy: That's great Jaiden! Make sure you're eating a balanced diet, not just restricting certain food groups.
13.03.2022 02:31:45 - Tre: Agreed with Cindy. Also, remember to drink lots of water.
13.03.2022 02:33:08 - John: Absolutely! Exercise is just as important as diet too.
13.03.2022 02:34:54 - Jaiden: Thanks for the tips! I've been trying to incorporate more fruits and veggies.
13.03.2022 02:35:56 - Cindy: That's a good start, Jaiden. Also, try to cut down on processed foods.
13.03.2022 02:36:50 - Tre: Yes, and don't forget about your protein intake. It's essential for muscle health.
13.03.2022 02:38:10 - John: Good point, Tre. Protein is also important for repairing body tissues.
13.03.2022 02:39:10 - Jaiden: I'll keep that in mind! I've also been considering taking supplements.
13.03.2022 02:40:35 - Cindy: It's better to get your nutrients from food, but supplements can help fill the gaps.
13.03.2022 02:41:36 - Tre: Just make sure to consult with a healthcare professional before starting any supplements.
13.03.2022 02:42:19 - John: Agreed. Not all supplements are created equal, and some can even be harmful.
13.03.2022 04:26:03 - Jaiden: Anyone else notice how hot it's been this week?
13.03.2022 04:27:02 - Cindy: Yes! It's been unbearable. My AC has been running nonstop.
13.03.2022 04:28:11 - Tre: I actually love the heat. It's perfect for my morning runs.
13.03.2022 04:29:28 - John: I'm more of a cool weather guy myself. The heat just drains me.
13.03.2022 04:31:06 - Jaiden: I heard it's supposed to cool down by the weekend.
13.03.2022 04:32:45 - Cindy: That would be a relief. I can't handle another scorcher.
13.03.2022 04:33:54 - Tre: Well, I'm hoping for at least one more hot day. Perfect beach weather.
13.03.2022 04:35:15 - John: Just remember to stay hydrated, everyone. It's easy to forget in this heat.
13.03.2022 09:10:28 - Jaiden: Hey guys, just wondering, what's everyone's major?
13.03.2022 09:12:22 - Cindy: I'm studying Computer Science. How about you Jaiden?
13.03.2022 09:13:04 - Jaiden: I'm in Business Administration. Tre, John, what about you guys?
13.03.2022 09:14:46 - Tre: I'm majoring in Psychology.
13.03.2022 09:16:38 - John: I'm in the same boat as Cindy, Computer Science.
13.03.2022 09:18:32 - Cindy: That's cool John! We should study together sometime.
13.03.2022 09:19:58 - John: Definitely, Cindy. It would be great to have a study partner.
13.03.2022 09:21:49 - Tre: Jaiden, what made you choose Business Administration?
13.03.2022 09:23:36 - Jaiden: I've always been interested in running my own business someday. So I thought this would be the best path.
13.03.2022 09:24:13 - Cindy: That sounds like a great plan, Jaiden.
13.03.2022 09:25:45 - John: I agree. It's important to follow our passions.
13.03.2022 09:26:21 - Tre: Absolutely. We're all on our individual paths, but it's nice we can share the journey.
13.03.2022 09:27:57 - Jaiden: Couldn't agree more, guys. Let's all do our best!

01.03.2022 07:30:00 - Jon: Good morning, Tracy! How are you today?
01.03.2022 07:31:53 - Tracy: Good morning, Jon! I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?
01.03.2022 07:32:47 - Jon: I'm good too. Heading to work in a bit. What are your plans for the day?
01.03.2022 07:33:26 - Tracy: Just the usual. I have a few meetings and then I'm planning on going to the gym after work.
01.03.2022 07:34:32 - Jon: That sounds like a productive day. What time is your first meeting?
01.03.2022 07:35:36 - Tracy: It's at 10:00 AM. Need to prepare for that now. 
01.03.2022 07:37:34 - Jon: Good luck with your meeting! Catch you later.
01.03.2022 07:39:24 - Tracy: Thanks, Jon! Have a great day at work. We'll talk later.
01.03.2022 07:39:57 - Jon: You too, Tracy! Take care.
01.03.2022 11:59:18 - Jon: Hey Tracy, how's your new pet rabbit doing?
01.03.2022 12:00:39 - Tracy: Hello Jon! He's doing great, thanks for asking.
01.03.2022 12:02:09 - Jon: That's awesome! What's his name?
01.03.2022 12:02:47 - Tracy: His name is Fluffy. He's so adorable!
01.03.2022 12:03:58 - Jon: Fluffy is a cute name. How is he adjusting to his new home?
01.03.2022 12:04:35 - Tracy: He seems to be enjoying it. He's already found his favorite corner to play in.
01.03.2022 12:06:32 - Jon: That's wonderful. It's important for pets to feel comfortable in their environment.
01.03.2022 12:07:32 - Tracy: Exactly, Jon. And I make sure he gets plenty of exercise and a balanced diet.
01.03.2022 12:09:29 - Jon: That's great to hear, Tracy. Are you planning on getting more pets?
01.03.2022 12:10:27 - Tracy: Not at the moment, Jon. Fluffy is quite a handful already!
01.03.2022 12:11:54 - Jon: I can imagine! Pets are a big responsibility but they're worth it.
01.03.2022 12:13:20 - Tracy: Absolutely, Jon. They bring so much joy and happiness.

01.03.2022 13:57:35 - Jon: Yes, I did. It was an incredible game!
01.03.2022 13:59:01 - Tracy: I know right! The team's performance was amazing.
01.03.2022 14:00:30 - Jon: Absolutely. Their strategy and execution were spot on.
01.03.2022 14:02:26 - Tracy: And the goal in the last minute! That was epic.
01.03.2022 14:04:18 - Jon: I almost couldn't believe it. The timing was perfect.
01.03.2022 14:05:04 - Tracy: Absolutely. Looking forward to the next match.
01.03.2022 14:06:03 - Jon: Me too. It's going to be thrilling.
01.03.2022 18:53:00 - Tracy: Hey Jon, have you tried the new Call of Duty game yet?
01.03.2022 18:54:52 - Jon: No, not yet Tracy. Is it any good?
01.03.2022 18:55:31 - Tracy: It's amazing. The graphics and gameplay are top-notch!
01.03.2022 18:57:17 - Jon: That sounds great. I've been playing the latest Assassin's Creed. The storyline is intriguing.
01.03.2022 18:58:03 - Tracy: Oh, I've heard about that. The historical settings always draw me in.
01.03.2022 18:59:01 - Jon: Yeah, it's one of the best aspects of the game. Want to have a game night this weekend?
01.03.2022 19:00:11 - Tracy: Sounds like a plan! I'll bring Call of Duty and you set up Assassin's Creed?
01.03.2022 19:01:09 - Jon: Deal! Looking forward to it Tracy.
01.03.2022 21:27:35 - Tracy: Hey Jon, any plans for the weekend?
01.03.2022 21:29:26 - Jon: No major plans Tracy. Maybe a movie. What about you?
01.03.2022 21:30:34 - Tracy: I'm thinking of going hiking this weekend.
01.03.2022 21:31:58 - Jon: Wow, that sounds fun. Where to?
01.03.2022 21:33:55 - Tracy: I'm thinking about the new trail that opened up at Green Park.
01.03.2022 21:34:59 - Jon: That sounds exciting. Do take pictures and share them. Have fun!

Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

23.09.2021 01:25:29 - William: Hey guys, have you seen the latest news on the Mars Rover?
23.09.2021 01:27:10 - Sheila: Yes, I just read about it. They found evidence of ancient water, right?
23.09.2021 01:28:25 - Herman: That's correct, Sheila. NASA's perseverance rover has found signs of ancient water on Mars. It's fascinating!
23.09.2021 01:30:24 - William: Indeed, it's a huge step forward in our search for extraterrestrial life.
23.09.2021 01:31:14 - Sheila: It's amazing to think about what other secrets the universe holds.
23.09.2021 01:32:06 - Herman: I agree. And with advancements in technology, we're able to explore more of it than ever before.
23.09.2021 01:32:43 - William: Can't wait to see what the future holds for space exploration. 
23.09.2021 02:54:19 - William: Hey guys, have you seen the new concert lineup?
23.09.2021 02:55:57 - Sheila: No, I haven't, who's playing?
23.09.2021 02:56:32 - Herman: I heard that The Rolling Stones are headlining!
23.09.2021 02:58:19 - William: Yes, that's right, Herman! They also have some great supporting bands.
23.09.2021 02:59:03 - Sheila: Sounds like a concert we shouldn't miss.
23.09.2021 02:59:37 - Herman: Definitely! Let's get the tickets as soon as they're available.
23.09.2021 03:01:21 - William: I agree, we should act fast. They're likely to sell out quickly.
23.09.2021 03:02:06 - Sheila: I'll set a reminder to check for tickets tomorrow morning.
23.09.2021 03:03:39 - Herman: Great idea, Sheila. I'll do the same.
23.09.2021 03:05:35 - William: Awesome, let's hope we get good seats!
23.09.2021 03:06:17 - Sheila: Fingers crossed. It's going to be a fun night!
23.09.2021 03:07:41 - Herman: Absolutely, can't wait to see The Rolling Stones live!
23.09.2021 03:08:53 - William: Same here, it's going to be epic.
23.09.2021 07:30:00 - William: Good morning everyone, how are you all doing today?
23.09.2021 07:31:10 - Sheila: Hey William! I'm doing great, just starting my day with a cup of coffee. How about you?
23.09.2021 07:31:53 - Herman: Morning everyone! Just got back from my morning run.
23.09.2021 07:32:38 - William: That's great to hear! I'm just getting ready for work. Herman, you're always so energetic in the morning.
23.09.2021 07:33:27 - Sheila: I wish I could be as energetic as Herman in the morning! I'm still struggling to keep my eyes open.
23.09.2021 07:34:43 - Herman: Well, it's not easy, but it feels great once you get into the habit. And coffee helps too.
23.09.2021 07:35:49 - William: I agree with Herman. A good run and a cup of coffee can do wonders.
23.09.2021 07:36:40 - Sheila: Maybe I should give it a try tomorrow. You guys are inspiring.
23.09.2021 07:38:36 - Herman: That's the spirit, Sheila! We'll check on you tomorrow morning to make sure you're up and running.
23.09.2021 07:39:28 - William: That sounds like a plan. Let's all try to wake up early and start the day with some exercise.
23.09.2021 12:46:14 - William: Hello everyone, how are we doing with the family reunion plans?
23.09.2021 12:47:13 - Sheila: Hi William, I've started gathering addresses for the invitations.
23.09.2021 12:49:02 - Herman: I'm working on the event location. I have a few places in mind.
23.09.2021 12:50:38 - William: Great, Sheila can you send the addresses to Herman once you're done? He'll include them in the venue selection process.
23.09.2021 12:52:07 - Sheila: Sure, I can do that. Herman, when do you need them by?
23.09.2021 12:52:42 - Herman: If you can get them to me by the end of the week, that would be perfect.
23.09.2021 12:54:14 - Sheila: Alright, I'll get on it.
23.09.2021 12:55:35 - William: Thanks Sheila and Herman. Let's keep each other posted on the progress.
23.09.2021 12:56:38 - Herman: Will do, William.
23.09.2021 12:57:40 - Sheila: Same here, Will keep everyone updated.
23.09.2021 18:02:41 - William: Hi Sheila and Herman, I've started a new health regimen. Do you guys have any tips?
23.09.2021 18:03:22 - Sheila: Sure William, I recommend adding more fruits and vegetables to your diet. They contain essential vitamins and minerals.
23.09.2021 18:05:14 - Herman: I agree with Sheila. Also, regular exercise is crucial. Even a 30-minute walk can make a difference.
23.09.2021 18:06:15 - William: That's a good point, Herman. I've been neglecting exercise lately. What kind of exercises do you guys recommend?
23.09.2021 18:07:48 - Sheila: I enjoy yoga. It's a great way to improve flexibility and reduce stress.
23.09.2021 18:09:02 - Herman: I prefer weight training. It helps to build strength and muscle mass.
23.09.2021 18:10:42 - William: Thanks, guys. I'll definitely try incorporating these into my regimen.
23.09.2021 18:12:04 - Sheila: You're welcome, William. Remember, consistency is key!
23.09.2021 18:13:05 - Herman: Exactly. And don't forget to drink plenty of water too, William.

14.10.2021 14:47:40 - Willie: Hey Mary, have you seen the latest video on PewDiePie's channel?
14.10.2021 14:48:35 - Mary: Hi Willie! No, I haven't had the chance yet. Is it worth watching?
14.10.2021 14:49:49 - Willie: Absolutely! He did a hilarious review of some old video games.
14.10.2021 14:50:24 - Mary: Sounds like fun! I'll definitely check it out tonight.
14.10.2021 14:51:36 - Willie: Cool! Let me know what you think.
14.10.2021 14:52:15 - Mary: Sure, Willie. Have you seen the new video from TED Talks?
14.10.2021 14:53:30 - Willie: No, not yet. What's it about?
14.10.2021 14:54:25 - Mary: It's about the impact of online videos on education. Very insightful.
14.10.2021 14:55:15 - Willie: Sounds interesting. I'll watch it later tonight.
14.10.2021 14:56:57 - Mary: Great! We can discuss it tomorrow.
14.10.2021 14:58:31 - Willie: Sure thing, Mary. Looking forward to it.
14.10.2021 15:00:12 - Mary: Me too, Willie. Have a good night!
14.10.2021 15:01:07 - Willie: You too, Mary. Goodnight!
14.10.2021 16:19:04 - Willie: Hi Mary, hope you're doing well.
14.10.2021 16:20:09 - Mary: Hey Willie, I'm good. How about you?
14.10.2021 16:21:28 - Willie: I'm well, thanks. I was wondering if you've picked up any new hobbies lately.
14.10.2021 16:22:50 - Mary: Actually, yes. I've started painting recently. How about you?
14.10.2021 16:23:32 - Willie: That's cool. I've always admired people who can paint. I've started gardening.
14.10.2021 16:24:21 - Mary: That's interesting. What kind of plants are you growing?
14.10.2021 16:25:55 - Willie: Mainly vegetables like tomatoes and cucumbers. It's been really rewarding.
14.10.2021 16:27:09 - Mary: Sounds fun. I've been thinking of starting a small herb garden myself.
14.10.2021 16:27:49 - Willie: I'd highly recommend it. I can help you get started if you want.
14.10.2021 16:28:44 - Mary: That would be great, Willie. Thanks.
14.10.2021 16:29:59 - Willie: You're welcome, Mary. Looking forward to it.
14.10.2021 19:59:03 - Willie: Hey Mary, have you heard the latest album by The Weeknd?
14.10.2021 20:00:50 - Mary: Hey Willie, yes I did. I think it's pretty cool. What about you?
14.10.2021 20:01:36 - Willie: I totally agree, it's different but I like it. Any particular track you like?
14.10.2021 20:02:57 - Mary: Hmm, I really like 'Save Your Tears'. It's catchy.
14.10.2021 20:04:48 - Willie: Yeah, that's a good one! I also like 'Blinding Lights'.
14.10.2021 20:05:44 - Mary: Oh, definitely! That's a classic. It's been on the radio nonstop.
14.10.2021 20:06:19 - Willie: True, it's been quite popular. Do you play any instruments, by the way?
14.10.2021 20:08:12 - Mary: Yes, I play the piano. I'm trying to learn 'Blinding Lights' on it.
14.10.2021 20:10:02 - Willie: That's awesome! Would love to hear it once you've mastered it.
14.10.2021 20:11:35 - Mary: Sure thing, Willie. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
14.10.2021 21:53:11 - Willie: Hi Mary, have you ever pondered over the concept of existentialism?
14.10.2021 21:54:14 - Mary: Hi Willie, indeed. It's quite an intriguing concept. It's the idea that individuals are free and responsible for their own choices and actions, right?
14.10.2021 21:54:50 - Willie: Exactly, Mary. It emphasizes individual freedom, choice, and subjectivity.
14.10.2021 21:55:34 - Mary: But don't you think it can lead to a sense of isolation or despair, considering the emphasis on individual freedom and the lack of external forces?
14.10.2021 21:56:22 - Willie: That's a valid point, Mary. However, it also gives the individual the freedom to define their own purpose in life.
14.10.2021 21:57:28 - Mary: True, Willie. It's a matter of perspective, I suppose. A balance between individual freedom and understanding the consequences of our choices.
14.10.2021 21:59:05 - Willie: Well said, Mary. I think that's the crux of existentialism - understanding that freedom comes with responsibility.
14.10.2021 22:00:48 - Mary: Indeed, Willie. It's a fascinating topic to ponder on.
15.10.2021 02:04:41 - Willie: Hey Mary, just checking in about the Johnson project.
15.10.2021 02:06:08 - Mary: Hi Willie, yes I've been working on it. There's a bit of a snag with the data analysis.
15.10.2021 02:07:18 - Willie: Oh, what's the issue?
15.10.2021 02:09:02 - Mary: The data isn't correlating as expected. I might need some assistance.
15.10.2021 02:11:01 - Willie: Alright, I can get Tom from data science to help out. He's great with these kind of problems.
15.10.2021 02:12:53 - Mary: That would be awesome. I've been stuck for a while.
15.10.2021 02:14:19 - Willie: No problem, I'll set up a meeting for tomorrow.
15.10.2021 02:15:06 - Mary: Thanks Willie, really appreciate it.
15.10.2021 02:16:50 - Willie: Not a problem, Mary. We're a team.
15.10.2021 02:17:22 - Mary: Indeed we are. Catch you tomorrow, then.
15.10.2021 02:18:19 - Willie: Yep, catch you tomorrow.
15.10.2021 06:35:17 - Willie: Hey Mary, do you remember the homework for Mr. Johnson's class?
15.10.2021 06:36:08 - Mary: Hi Willie, yes I do. We need to read chapter 5 and answer the questions at the end.
15.10.2021 06:37:13 - Willie: Oh right, thanks! Do you understand the last question?
15.10.2021 06:38:38 - Mary: Yes, it's a bit tricky but it's about the main ideas of the chapter. Do you want me to explain?
15.10.2021 06:40:24 - Willie: Yes please, I'm a bit confused.
15.10.2021 06:42:24 - Mary: No problem! So the main idea is...
15.10.2021 06:43:33 - Willie: Got it, thanks so much Mary!
15.10.2021 06:44:51 - Mary: You're welcome Willie, happy to help! Let's ace this assignment!
15.10.2021 10:30:00 - Willie: Hey Mary, are you at the park for the picnic?
15.10.2021 10:30:48 - Mary: Hi Willie, yes I just got here. The place is packed!
15.10.2021 10:31:47 - Willie: Great! I'm on my way. What can I bring?
15.10.2021 10:32:44 - Mary: We could use some more drinks. Can you grab some on your way?
15.10.2021 10:34:12 - Willie: Sure thing. Anything specific you want?
15.10.2021 10:35:10 - Mary: Some soda and water would be great. Thanks Willie!
15.10.2021 10:36:37 - Willie: No problem. See you in a bit.
15.10.2021 10:37:09 - Mary: See you soon, Willie. Safe drive.

20.04.2022 06:16:35 - Amelia: Definitely. Maybe we can plan something for the weekend?

20.04.2022 06:20:29 - Paul: Great! I'll start planning. Talk to you later, sis.

20.04.2022 11:10:31 - Paul: That's my nephew! Always knew he had it in him.

20.04.2022 11:14:29 - Amelia: It's going well. A bit busy these days but manageable.
20.04.2022 11:15:27 - Paul: That's good to hear. Let's catch up soon.
20.04.2022 11:16:14 - Amelia: Sounds like a plan. Let's do it.
20.04.2022 13:54:41 - Paul: Hey Amelia, I just discovered this new band, have you heard of 'The Midnight' ?
20.04.2022 13:55:22 - Amelia: No, I haven't. What kind of music do they play?
20.04.2022 13:55:54 - Paul: They're a synthwave band. Their music is kind of a mix between 80's electronic and modern pop.
20.04.2022 13:57:51 - Amelia: Sounds interesting! Any song recommendations?
20.04.2022 13:59:48 - Paul: Definitely! Try 'Los Angeles', 'Sunset' and 'Vampires'. The first one is my favorite.
20.04.2022 14:01:15 - Amelia: I'll give them a listen. I've been looking for some new music to add to my playlist.

20.04.2022 15:36:15 - Paul: It's amazing! The plot twist was totally unexpected.
20.04.2022 15:37:01 - Amelia: Wow! Now I'm intrigued. No spoilers, please!
20.04.2022 15:38:09 - Paul: Trust me, you'll love it. Have you been keeping up with other shows?
20.04.2022 15:38:45 - Amelia: I've been watching The Crown lately. It's quite interesting.

20.04.2022 15:41:42 - Amelia: Definitely! The performances are top notch.

20.04.2022 18:31:35 - Amelia: Hey Paul, I was actually planning to watch the basketball game. Who's playing in the soccer game?
20.04.2022 18:33:03 - Paul: It's Manchester United vs Barcelona. It's going to be a thrilling match!
20.04.2022 18:34:15 - Amelia: Sounds exciting, but I'm a huge Lakers fan and they're playing tonight as well.
20.04.2022 18:36:05 - Paul: Oh that's cool! Maybe we can keep each other updated on the scores?
20.04.2022 18:37:19 - Amelia: Sure, that sounds like a fun idea. Let's do it!
20.04.2022 18:38:12 - Paul: Great! I'll message you once the soccer game starts.

20.04.2022 18:42:14 - Amelia: Agreed, it's a date then. Talk to you later, Paul!
20.04.2022 18:43:34 - Paul: Talk to you later, Amelia. Enjoy the game!

20.04.2022 21:54:33 - Amelia: Hi Paul, she's doing great. We named her Bella.
20.04.2022 21:55:50 - Paul: That's a cute name. How are you finding the experience of training her?
20.04.2022 21:56:24 - Amelia: It's not easy, but it's rewarding. She's slowly learning commands.
20.04.2022 21:56:57 - Paul: That's good to hear. I'm thinking of getting a cat, any advice?
20.04.2022 21:57:41 - Amelia: Oh, that's exciting! Cats are more independent, but make sure to give them plenty of attention too.
20.04.2022 21:58:46 - Paul: I'll keep that in mind. How about feeding, is it different from dogs?
20.04.2022 22:00:33 - Amelia: Yes, they have different dietary needs. I would recommend doing some research or asking a vet.
20.04.2022 22:02:06 - Paul: Will do. Thanks for the advice, Amelia.
20.04.2022 22:02:52 - Amelia: No problem, Paul. I'm sure you'll be a great cat owner.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

15.05.2022 07:11:36 - Mason: Hey guys, have you ever noticed the sibling rivalry between us?
15.05.2022 07:13:14 - Glen: Haha, definitely. Remember when we used to compete on who gets to eat the last slice of pizza?
15.05.2022 07:14:30 - Evelyn: Oh, I always won that one. Mason, you were always the peacemaker though.
15.05.2022 07:15:27 - Mason: Yeah, I guess I just hated seeing us fight. Plus, more pizza for you, Evelyn.
15.05.2022 07:17:12 - Glen: Mason, you were always the mature one. Remember when Evelyn locked herself in her room because I broke her doll by accident?
15.05.2022 07:19:06 - Evelyn: Oh, don't remind me! I was so mad at you, Glen.
15.05.2022 07:20:53 - Mason: And remember how I managed to pick the lock and get you two to make up?
15.05.2022 07:22:18 - Glen: Yeah, that was legendary. You always knew how to handle situations.
15.05.2022 07:23:23 - Evelyn: Even though we fought, I wouldn't change our childhood for anything. I love you guys.
15.05.2022 07:24:18 - Mason: We love you too, Evelyn. Sibling rivalry or not, we'll always be there for each other.
15.05.2022 13:05:07 - Mason: Hey guys, have you checked the weather forecast for tomorrow?
15.05.2022 13:06:57 - Glen: I just did, Mason. It says it's going to be rainy all day.
15.05.2022 13:08:54 - Evelyn: Really? I thought it was supposed to be sunny.
15.05.2022 13:10:09 - Mason: Well, different weather sites are showing different forecasts.
15.05.2022 13:10:51 - Glen: That's true. But I checked on the National Weather Service's website.
15.05.2022 13:12:23 - Evelyn: I see, I checked on Weather.com. Maybe we should look at a few more sources to be sure.
15.05.2022 13:14:04 - Mason: Good idea, Evelyn. I'll check on AccuWeather.
15.05.2022 13:15:43 - Glen: And I'll check on the Weather Channel's site.
15.05.2022 13:17:17 - Evelyn: Let's regroup in an hour with our findings.
15.05.2022 13:19:05 - Mason: Sounds like a plan. Talk to you guys in a bit.
15.05.2022 15:20:37 - Mason: Hey guys, have you seen the new Spider-Man movie yet?
15.05.2022 15:22:31 - Glen: Not yet, Mason. I heard it's really good though!
15.05.2022 15:24:06 - Evelyn: I saw it last weekend. It's definitely worth watching!
15.05.2022 15:24:56 - Mason: Great! Maybe we could all go this weekend?
15.05.2022 15:26:53 - Glen: I'm free on Sunday. How about you, Evelyn?
15.05.2022 15:28:19 - Evelyn: Sunday works for me. Let's do it!
15.05.2022 15:29:56 - Mason: Awesome! I'll look up showtimes and get back to you both.
15.05.2022 15:30:42 - Glen: Sounds like a plan. Looking forward to it!
15.05.2022 15:31:32 - Evelyn: Same here. Movie nights are the best!
15.05.2022 18:30:00 - Mason: Hey guys, did you watch the soccer game last night?
15.05.2022 18:30:40 - Glen: Yeah, I did. That was quite a match.
15.05.2022 18:31:34 - Evelyn: I missed it. What happened?
15.05.2022 18:33:02 - Mason: Our team scored 3 goals in the second half. It was amazing.
15.05.2022 18:34:46 - Glen: Yeah, it was. The other team couldn't even touch the ball.
15.05.2022 18:35:44 - Evelyn: Wow! Sounds like it was an exciting game. I'll watch the highlights.
15.05.2022 18:37:32 - Mason: You should, Evelyn. It was one of the best games this season.
15.05.2022 18:38:25 - Glen: Agreed. Can't wait for the next match.
15.05.2022 18:40:13 - Evelyn: I'll make sure to watch the next game live.
15.05.2022 23:48:29 - Mason: Hey guys, had the strangest dream last night.
15.05.2022 23:49:30 - Glen: Really? What was it about, Mason?
15.05.2022 23:51:23 - Mason: I was floating in space, surrounded by stars. It was incredibly peaceful.
15.05.2022 23:52:51 - Evelyn: That's so interesting, Mason! Dreams about space often represent a desire for freedom and escape.
15.05.2022 23:54:36 - Glen: I usually dream about ordinary stuff, like work or home. Not nearly as exciting.
15.05.2022 23:56:12 - Mason: Glen, even ordinary dreams can have interesting interpretations.
15.05.2022 23:58:03 - Evelyn: Mason's right, Glen. For example, dreaming about work often means you're dedicated and ambitious.
15.05.2022 23:59:06 - Glen: That's a comforting interpretation, Evelyn! I'll think about it next time.
15.05.2022 23:59:54 - Mason: Let's all share our dreams more often. It's fascinating to hear different experiences and interpretations.
16.05.2022 00:00:33 - Evelyn: Agreed, Mason. It's a plan.

15.05.2022 07:13:14 - Glen: Haha, definitely. Remember when we used to compete on who gets to eat the last slice of pizza?
15.05.2022 07:14:30 - Evelyn: Oh, I always won that one. Mason, you were always the peacemaker though.
15.05.2022 07:15:27 - Mason: Yeah, I guess I just hated seeing us fight. Plus, more pizza for you, Evelyn.
15.05.2022 07:17:12 - Glen: Mason, you were always the mature one. Remember when Evelyn locked herself in her room because I broke her doll by accident?
15.05.2022 07:19:06 - Evelyn: Oh, don't remind me! I was so mad at you, Glen.
15.05.2022 07:20:53 - Mason: And remember how I managed to pick the lock and get you two to make up?
15.05.2022 07:22:18 - Glen: Yeah, that was legendary. You always knew how to handle situations.
15.05.2022 07:23:23 - Evelyn: Even though we fought, I wouldn't change our childhood for anything. I love you guys.
15.05.2022 07:24:18 - Mason: We love you too, Evelyn. Sibling rivalry or not, we'll always be there for each other.
15.05.2022 13:05:07 - Mason: Hey guys, have you checked the weather forecast for tomorrow?
15.05.2022 13:06:57 - Glen: I just did, Mason. It says it's going to be rainy all day.
15.05.2022 13:08:54 - Evelyn: Really? I thought it was supposed to be sunny.
15.05.2022 13:10:09 - Mason: Well, different weather sites are showing different forecasts.
15.05.2022 13:10:51 - Glen: That's true. But I checked on the National Weather Service's website.
15.05.2022 13:12:23 - Evelyn: I see, I checked on Weather.com. Maybe we should look at a few more sources to be sure.
15.05.2022 13:14:04 - Mason: Good idea, Evelyn. I'll check on AccuWeather.
15.05.2022 13:15:43 - Glen: And I'll check on the Weather Channel's site.
15.05.2022 13:17:17 - Evelyn: Let's regroup in an hour with our findings.
15.05.2022 13:19:05 - Mason: Sounds like a plan. Talk to you guys in a bit.
15.05.2022 15:20:37 - Mason: Hey guys, have you seen the new Spider-Man movie yet?
15.05.2022 15:22:31 - Glen: Not yet, Mason. I heard it's really good though!
15.05.2022 15:24:06 - Evelyn: I saw it last weekend. It's definitely worth watching!
15.05.2022 15:24:56 - Mason: Great! Maybe we could all go this weekend?
15.05.2022 15:26:53 - Glen: I'm free on Sunday. How about you, Evelyn?
15.05.2022 15:28:19 - Evelyn: Sunday works for me. Let's do it!
15.05.2022 15:29:56 - Mason: Awesome! I'll look up showtimes and get back to you both.
15.05.2022 15:30:42 - Glen: Sounds like a plan. Looking forward to it!
15.05.2022 15:31:32 - Evelyn: Same here. Movie nights are the best!
15.05.2022 18:30:00 - Mason: Hey guys, did you watch the soccer game last night?
15.05.2022 18:30:40 - Glen: Yeah, I did. That was quite a match.
15.05.2022 18:31:34 - Evelyn: I missed it. What happened?
15.05.2022 18:33:02 - Mason: Our team scored 3 goals in the second half. It was amazing.
15.05.2022 18:34:46 - Glen: Yeah, it was. The other team couldn't even touch the ball.
15.05.2022 18:35:44 - Evelyn: Wow! Sounds like it was an exciting game. I'll watch the highlights.
15.05.2022 18:37:32 - Mason: You should, Evelyn. It was one of the best games this season.
15.05.2022 18:38:25 - Glen: Agreed. Can't wait for the next match.
15.05.2022 18:40:13 - Evelyn: I'll make sure to watch the next game live.
15.05.2022 23:48:29 - Mason: Hey guys, had the strangest dream last night.
15.05.2022 23:49:30 - Glen: Really? What was it about, Mason?
15.05.2022 23:51:23 - Mason: I was floating in space, surrounded by stars. It was incredibly peaceful.
15.05.2022 23:52:51 - Evelyn: That's so interesting, Mason! Dreams about space often represent a desire for freedom and escape.
15.05.2022 23:54:36 - Glen: I usually dream about ordinary stuff, like work or home. Not nearly as exciting.
15.05.2022 23:56:12 - Mason: Glen, even ordinary dreams can have interesting interpretations.
15.05.2022 23:58:03 - Evelyn: Mason's right, Glen. For example, dreaming about work often means you're dedicated and ambitious.
15.05.2022 23:59:06 - Glen: That's a comforting interpretation, Evelyn! I'll think about it next time.
15.05.2022 23:59:54 - Mason: Let's all share our dreams more often. It's fascinating to hear different experiences and interpretations.
16.05.2022 00:00:33 - Evelyn: Agreed, Mason. It's a plan.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

15.09.2022 05:43:08 - Robert: Hey Joe! How's college life treating you?
15.09.2022 05:44:49 - Joe: Hi Robert! It's quite an experience. The workload is definitely more than I expected.
15.09.2022 05:45:36 - Robert: I can imagine! How are you managing your study schedule?
15.09.2022 05:47:03 - Joe: It's a bit challenging but I try to stick to a timetable. I study in short bursts rather than long hours.
15.09.2022 05:47:52 - Robert: That sounds like a smart plan. Have you joined any clubs or societies?
15.09.2022 05:48:47 - Joe: Yes, I joined the photography club. It's a great way to unwind and meet new people.
15.09.2022 05:49:25 - Robert: That's awesome! I remember how much I enjoyed being part of the music club in my college days. It really adds to the overall experience.
15.09.2022 05:50:53 - Joe: Definitely! It's not all about academics. The extracurricular activities make college life more enjoyable.
15.09.2022 05:52:15 - Robert: Exactly! Just make sure to balance everything. How are the professors?
15.09.2022 05:53:11 - Joe: Some are really good, and some are tough. But I guess that's part of the learning process.
15.09.2022 05:54:34 - Robert: True. College is as much about learning to deal with different people and situations as it is about academic growth.
15.09.2022 05:55:22 - Joe: You're right, Robert. It's a whole new world out here.
15.09.2022 05:56:03 - Robert: Enjoy it, Joe! It's a once-in-a-lifetime experience. Remember to make the most of it.
15.09.2022 09:30:00 - Robert: Hey Joe, have you seen the latest video on FunnyVids.com?
15.09.2022 09:31:41 - Joe: No, not yet. What's it about?
15.09.2022 09:33:39 - Robert: It's a compilation of the funniest pet fails. It's hilarious!
15.09.2022 09:35:13 - Joe: Oh, I'm gonna have to check that out. I love a good pet fail.
15.09.2022 09:36:42 - Robert: You should. There's one with a cat trying to jump on a shelf, but it totally misses. I almost choked on my coffee.
15.09.2022 09:38:13 - Joe: Haha, sounds like my cat. I'll definitely watch it during my break.
15.09.2022 09:39:16 - Robert: Let me know what you think. I can't stop laughing.
15.09.2022 09:39:46 - Joe: Sure, looking forward to a good laugh.
15.09.2022 09:40:51 - Robert: I'm sure you'll have more than one. Enjoy!
15.09.2022 15:24:49 - Robert: Hey Joe, have you seen the latest news about the climate change report?
15.09.2022 15:25:50 - Joe: No, I haven't. What does it say?
15.09.2022 15:27:14 - Robert: Well, it seems things are worse than we thought. The report states that human activities are unequivocally causing global warming.
15.09.2022 15:28:12 - Joe: That's concerning. What can we do about it?
15.09.2022 15:28:48 - Robert: The report suggests that significant changes need to be made in how we produce and consume energy. Also, we need to do a better job of managing our natural resources.
15.09.2022 15:30:32 - Joe: I guess we all have a part to play then.
15.09.2022 15:31:06 - Robert: Exactly, it's not just about government policies, but individual actions matter too.
15.09.2022 15:31:46 - Joe: I'll definitely look into it more. Thanks for sharing, Robert.
15.09.2022 15:32:53 - Robert: No problem, Joe. It's important that we all stay informed.
15.09.2022 17:22:32 - Robert: Hi Joe, how are you doing?
15.09.2022 17:24:20 - Joe: Hey Robert, I'm doing good. How about you?
15.09.2022 17:25:01 - Robert: I'm fine. I was just thinking about our family reunion coming up.
15.09.2022 17:26:15 - Joe: Yes, it's going to be great seeing everyone again. It's been too long.
15.09.2022 17:27:49 - Robert: Exactly. Do you remember the last one we had?
15.09.2022 17:28:54 - Joe: Yeah, I remember. It was a lot of fun. The kids had a blast.
15.09.2022 17:30:03 - Robert: That's true. How is your family doing?
15.09.2022 17:31:10 - Joe: They are all doing fine. The kids are growing up so fast.
15.09.2022 17:31:52 - Robert: That's great to hear. How's your wife doing?
15.09.2022 17:32:52 - Joe: She's doing well. She's busy with work but she's looking forward to the reunion.
15.09.2022 17:34:13 - Robert: That's good to hear. My wife is also excited about the reunion.
15.09.2022 17:35:33 - Joe: It's going to be a great time. I can't wait.
15.09.2022 22:00:20 - Robert: Hey Joe, have you watched the new video I shared on our group?
15.09.2022 22:01:50 - Joe: No, Robert, I haven't yet. What's it about?
15.09.2022 22:02:50 - Robert: It's a tutorial video about video editing. I thought it might be useful for our project.
15.09.2022 22:03:32 - Joe: Oh, that sounds interesting. I'll check it out soon.
15.09.2022 22:05:23 - Robert: Great! Let me know what you think.
15.09.2022 22:06:43 - Joe: Definitely, I'll share my thoughts once I've watched it.
15.09.2022 22:08:06 - Robert: Also, if you find any other useful video resources, don't hesitate to share.
15.09.2022 22:09:12 - Joe: Sure, Robert. I've been looking into some other online video tutorials as well.
15.09.2022 22:10:52 - Robert: That's great! Looking forward to seeing what you find.
15.09.2022 22:12:10 - Joe: Alright, Robert. I'll share them in the group once I've watched and vetted them.
15.09.2022 22:14:05 - Robert: Perfect, Joe! Let's keep each other updated.

generated_messages.content:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

15.09.2022 05:43:08 - Robert: Hey Joe! How's college life treating you?
15.09.2022 05:44:49 - Joe: Hi Robert! It's quite an experience. The workload is definitely more than I expected.
15.09.2022 05:45:36 - Robert: I can imagine! How are you managing your study schedule?
15.09.2022 05:47:03 - Joe: It's a bit challenging but I try to stick to a timetable. I study in short bursts rather than long hours.
15.09.2022 05:47:52 - Robert: That sounds like a smart plan. Have you joined any clubs or societies?
15.09.2022 05:48:47 - Joe: Yes, I joined the photography club. It's a great way to unwind and meet new people.
15.09.2022 05:49:25 - Robert: That's awesome! I remember how much I enjoyed being part of the music club in my college days. It really adds to the overall experience.
15.09.2022 05:50:53 - Joe: Definitely! It's not all about academics. The extracurricular activities make college life more enjoyable.
15.09.2022 05:52:15 - Robert: Exactly! Just make sure to balance everything. How are the professors?
15.09.2022 05:53:11 - Joe: Some are really good, and some are tough. But I guess that's part of the learning process.
15.09.2022 05:54:34 - Robert: True. College is as much about learning to deal with different people and situations as it is about academic growth.
15.09.2022 05:55:22 - Joe: You're right, Robert. It's a whole new world out here.
15.09.2022 05:56:03 - Robert: Enjoy it, Joe! It's a once-in-a-lifetime experience. Remember to make the most of it.
15.09.2022 09:30:00 - Robert: Hey Joe, have you seen the latest video on FunnyVids.com?
15.09.2022 09:31:41 - Joe: No, not yet. What's it about?
15.09.2022 09:33:39 - Robert: It's a compilation of the funniest pet fails. It's hilarious!
15.09.2022 09:35:13 - Joe: Oh, I'm gonna have to check that out. I love a good pet fail.
15.09.2022 09:36:42 - Robert: You should. There's one with a cat trying to jump on a shelf, but it totally misses. I almost choked on my coffee.
15.09.2022 09:38:13 - Joe: Haha, sounds like my cat. I'll definitely watch it during my break.
15.09.2022 09:39:16 - Robert: Let me know what you think. I can't stop laughing.
15.09.2022 09:39:46 - Joe: Sure, looking forward to a good laugh.
15.09.2022 09:40:51 - Robert: I'm sure you'll have more than one. Enjoy!
15.09.2022 15:24:49 - Robert: Hey Joe, have you seen the latest news about the climate change report?
15.09.2022 15:25:50 - Joe: No, I haven't. What does it say?
15.09.2022 15:27:14 - Robert: Well, it seems things are worse than we thought. The report states that human activities are unequivocally causing global warming.
15.09.2022 15:28:12 - Joe: That's concerning. What can we do about it?
15.09.2022 15:28:48 - Robert: The report suggests that significant changes need to be made in how we produce and consume energy. Also, we need to do a better job of managing our natural resources.
15.09.2022 15:30:32 - Joe: I guess we all have a part to play then.
15.09.2022 15:31:06 - Robert: Exactly, it's not just about government policies, but individual actions matter too.
15.09.2022 15:31:46 - Joe: I'll definitely look into it more. Thanks for sharing, Robert.
15.09.2022 15:32:53 - Robert: No problem, Joe. It's important that we all stay informed.
15.09.2022 17:22:32 - Robert: Hi Joe, how are you doing?
15.09.2022 17:24:20 - Joe: Hey Robert, I'm doing good. How about you?
15.09.2022 17:25:01 - Robert: I'm fine. I was just thinking about our family reunion coming up.
15.09.2022 17:26:15 - Joe: Yes, it's going to be great seeing everyone again. It's been too long.
15.09.2022 17:27:49 - Robert: Exactly. Do you remember the last one we had?
15.09.2022 17:28:54 - Joe: Yeah, I remember. It was a lot of fun. The kids had a blast.
15.09.2022 17:30:03 - Robert: That's true. How is your family doing?
15.09.2022 17:31:10 - Joe: They are all doing fine. The kids are growing up so fast.
15.09.2022 17:31:52 - Robert: That's great to hear. How's your wife doing?
15.09.2022 17:32:52 - Joe: She's doing well. She's busy with work but she's looking forward to the reunion.
15.09.2022 17:34:13 - Robert: That's good to hear. My wife is also excited about the reunion.
15.09.2022 17:35:33 - Joe: It's going to be a great time. I can't wait.
15.09.2022 22:00:20 - Robert: Hey Joe, have you watched the new video I shared on our group?
15.09.2022 22:01:50 - Joe: No, Robert, I haven't yet. What's it about?
15.09.2022 22:02:50 - Robert: It's a tutorial video about video editing. I thought it might be useful for our project.
15.09.2022 22:03:32 - Joe: Oh, that sounds interesting. I'll check it out soon.
15.09.2022 22:05:23 - Robert: Great! Let me know what you think.
15.09.2022 22:06:43 - Joe: Definitely, I'll share my thoughts once I've watched it.
15.09.2022 22:08:06 - Robert: Also, if you find any other useful video resources, don't hesitate to share.
15.09.2022 22:09:12 - Joe: Sure, Robert. I've been looking into some other online video tutorials as well.
15.09.2022 22:10:52 - Robert: That's great! Looking forward to seeing what you find.
15.09.2022 22:12:10 - Joe: Alright, Robert. I'll share them in the group once I've watched and vetted them.
15.09.2022 22:14:05 - Robert: Perfect, Joe! Let's keep each other updated.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

20.03.2022 08:37:41 - Adam: Hey guys, any thoughts on going to the Green Day concert next month?
20.03.2022 08:38:36 - Shelby: That sounds like a great idea! I haven't been to a concert in ages.
20.03.2022 08:40:05 - Kyle: I'm in! I've been wanting to see them live.
20.03.2022 08:41:44 - Leon: I’m not a big fan of Green Day. What about a different band?
20.03.2022 08:43:16 - Jessica: Leon, you're always the odd one out! But let's vote on it to be fair.
20.03.2022 08:45:05 - Adam: Okay, everyone list a band and we'll go with the majority.
20.03.2022 08:45:57 - Shelby: I'll stick with Green Day.
20.03.2022 08:47:32 - Kyle: Green Day for me too.
20.03.2022 08:48:46 - Leon: I'd prefer Metallica.
20.03.2022 08:49:20 - Jessica: Green Day. Looks like we have a winner, Leon.
20.03.2022 08:50:30 - Leon: Alright, I'm outnumbered. Green Day it is.
20.03.2022 08:51:09 - Adam: Great, I'll look for tickets for us.
20.03.2022 08:51:39 - Shelby: Thanks, Adam. Let's hope they are not sold out!
20.03.2022 08:52:25 - Kyle: Can't wait for this, it's going to be epic.
20.03.2022 08:53:11 - Jessica: Agreed, thanks Adam for organizing!
20.03.2022 13:45:00 - Adam: Hey guys, have you seen the latest video of the 'Falling Panda' on YouTube?
20.03.2022 13:45:59 - Shelby: Haha, yeah! That panda has better gymnastic skills than me.
20.03.2022 13:47:30 - Kyle: I laughed so hard when it tried to do a somersault but ended up rolling down.
20.03.2022 13:48:27 - Leon: I didn't see it yet. Can someone share the link?
20.03.2022 13:50:02 - Jessica: Sure Leon, here it is: www.youtube.com/FallingPandaLatest
20.03.2022 13:50:41 - Adam: I bet you will be laughing out loud, Leon. It's hilarious!
20.03.2022 13:52:32 - Shelby: I have seen it three times already. It's my stress buster.
20.03.2022 13:54:24 - Kyle: I'm waiting for the next video. Hope it will be out soon.
20.03.2022 13:55:21 - Leon: I just watched it. OMG! That's the cutest and funniest thing I've seen in a while.
20.03.2022 13:56:22 - Jessica: Told ya! It's a mood lifter.
20.03.2022 16:44:15 - Adam: Hey guys, I'm thinking of getting a pet.
20.03.2022 16:44:54 - Shelby: That's great, Adam! Any ideas on what pet you'd like to get?
20.03.2022 16:46:15 - Adam: I'm not sure. I was considering a dog.
20.03.2022 16:47:56 - Kyle: Dogs are great companions, Adam. What breed are you thinking of?
20.03.2022 16:49:31 - Adam: A Golden Retriever, maybe. They seem friendly.
20.03.2022 16:50:09 - Leon: Golden Retrievers are definitely friendly. But they need a lot of exercise.
20.03.2022 16:51:00 - Jessica: That's true, Leon. And they also need a lot of space.
20.03.2022 16:52:47 - Shelby: Maybe a cat would be more suitable, Adam? They're easier to take care of.
20.03.2022 16:53:32 - Kyle: But cats can be quite aloof, Shelby. They're not as affectionate as dogs.
20.03.2022 16:54:46 - Jessica: That's a stereotype, Kyle. My cat is very affectionate.
20.03.2022 16:56:38 - Leon: Maybe we should let Adam decide. It's his pet, after all.
20.03.2022 16:57:26 - Adam: You guys have given me a lot to think about. Thanks!
20.03.2022 20:42:47 - Adam: Hey guys, have you been following the NFL season?
20.03.2022 20:43:54 - Shelby: Yeah, been rooting for the Chiefs all the way!
20.03.2022 20:45:24 - Kyle: Haha, good luck with that, Shelby. I'm all for the Buccaneers this year.
20.03.2022 20:47:20 - Leon: You guys are all about football, huh? I've been following the NBA more closely.
20.03.2022 20:47:53 - Jessica: That's cool, Leon. Who's your favorite team?
20.03.2022 20:49:42 - Leon: Definitely the Lakers. They've been doing great this season.
20.03.2022 20:50:37 - Jessica: Nice. I've been trying to keep up with both NFL and NBA, but it's a lot.
20.03.2022 20:51:17 - Adam: Agreed, Jessica. It's hard to keep track of everything.
20.03.2022 20:52:38 - Shelby: Well, it's all part of the fun. Keeps us engaged, right?
20.03.2022 20:54:38 - Kyle: Absolutely. Can't wait for the next games.

20.03.2022 08:40:05 - Kyle: I'm in! I've been wanting to see them live.
20.03.2022 08:41:44 - Leon: I’m not a big fan of Green Day. What about a different band?
20.03.2022 08:43:16 - Jessica: Leon, you're always the odd one out! But let's vote on it to be fair.
20.03.2022 08:45:05 - Adam: Okay, everyone list a band and we'll go with the majority.
20.03.2022 08:45:57 - Shelby: I'll stick with Green Day.
20.03.2022 08:47:32 - Kyle: Green Day for me too.
20.03.2022 08:48:46 - Leon: I'd prefer Metallica.
20.03.2022 08:49:20 - Jessica: Green Day. Looks like we have a winner, Leon.
20.03.2022 08:50:30 - Leon: Alright, I'm outnumbered. Green Day it is.
20.03.2022 08:51:09 - Adam: Great, I'll look for tickets for us.
20.03.2022 08:51:39 - Shelby: Thanks, Adam. Let's hope they are not sold out!
20.03.2022 08:52:25 - Kyle: Can't wait for this, it's going to be epic.
20.03.2022 08:53:11 - Jessica: Agreed, thanks Adam for organizing!
20.03.2022 13:45:00 - Adam: Hey guys, have you seen the latest video of the 'Falling Panda' on YouTube?
20.03.2022 13:45:59 - Shelby: Haha, yeah! That panda has better gymnastic skills than me.
20.03.2022 13:47:30 - Kyle: I laughed so hard when it tried to do a somersault but ended up rolling down.
20.03.2022 13:48:27 - Leon: I didn't see it yet. Can someone share the link?
20.03.2022 13:50:02 - Jessica: Sure Leon, here it is: www.youtube.com/FallingPandaLatest
20.03.2022 13:50:41 - Adam: I bet you will be laughing out loud, Leon. It's hilarious!
20.03.2022 13:52:32 - Shelby: I have seen it three times already. It's my stress buster.
20.03.2022 13:54:24 - Kyle: I'm waiting for the next video. Hope it will be out soon.
20.03.2022 13:55:21 - Leon: I just watched it. OMG! That's the cutest and funniest thing I've seen in a while.
20.03.2022 13:56:22 - Jessica: Told ya! It's a mood lifter.
20.03.2022 16:44:15 - Adam: Hey guys, I'm thinking of getting a pet.
20.03.2022 16:44:54 - Shelby: That's great, Adam! Any ideas on what pet you'd like to get?
20.03.2022 16:46:15 - Adam: I'm not sure. I was considering a dog.
20.03.2022 16:47:56 - Kyle: Dogs are great companions, Adam. What breed are you thinking of?
20.03.2022 16:49:31 - Adam: A Golden Retriever, maybe. They seem friendly.
20.03.2022 16:50:09 - Leon: Golden Retrievers are definitely friendly. But they need a lot of exercise.
20.03.2022 16:51:00 - Jessica: That's true, Leon. And they also need a lot of space.
20.03.2022 16:52:47 - Shelby: Maybe a cat would be more suitable, Adam? They're easier to take care of.
20.03.2022 16:53:32 - Kyle: But cats can be quite aloof, Shelby. They're not as affectionate as dogs.
20.03.2022 16:54:46 - Jessica: That's a stereotype, Kyle. My cat is very affectionate.
20.03.2022 16:56:38 - Leon: Maybe we should let Adam decide. It's his pet, after all.
20.03.2022 16:57:26 - Adam: You guys have given me a lot to think about. Thanks!
20.03.2022 20:42:47 - Adam: Hey guys, have you been following the NFL season?
20.03.2022 20:43:54 - Shelby: Yeah, been rooting for the Chiefs all the way!
20.03.2022 20:45:24 - Kyle: Haha, good luck with that, Shelby. I'm all for the Buccaneers this year.
20.03.2022 20:47:20 - Leon: You guys are all about football, huh? I've been following the NBA more closely.
20.03.2022 20:47:53 - Jessica: That's cool, Leon. Who's your favorite team?
20.03.2022 20:49:42 - Leon: Definitely the Lakers. They've been doing great this season.
20.03.2022 20:50:37 - Jessica: Nice. I've been trying to keep up with both NFL and NBA, but it's a lot.
20.03.2022 20:51:17 - Adam: Agreed, Jessica. It's hard to keep track of everything.
20.03.2022 20:52:38 - Shelby: Well, it's all part of the fun. Keeps us engaged, right?
20.03.2022 20:54:38 - Kyle: Absolutely. Can't wait for the next games.
