old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

13.05.2022 21:58:09 - Thomas: Hey Kris, have you seen the new season of 'Stranger Things' yet?
13.05.2022 21:58:40 - Kristopher: Hey Tom, not yet. Is it good?
13.05.2022 21:59:43 - Thomas: It's amazing! They've really outdone themselves this time.
13.05.2022 22:01:03 - Kristopher: I'll have to check it out then. Have you seen 'The Witcher'?
13.05.2022 22:03:03 - Thomas: No, I haven't. Is it worth a watch?
13.05.2022 22:04:14 - Kristopher: Absolutely, if you're into fantasy and action, it's a must-watch.
13.05.2022 22:04:53 - Thomas: I'll definitely put it on my list then. Thanks for the recommendation.
13.05.2022 22:06:26 - Kristopher: No problem! Let me know what you think when you see it.
13.05.2022 22:07:50 - Thomas: Sure, will do! By the way, have you seen 'The Crown'?
13.05.2022 22:09:32 - Kristopher: Not yet, but I've heard good things about it. Is it good?
13.05.2022 22:10:21 - Thomas: I personally enjoyed it. It's a great historical drama.
13.05.2022 22:12:06 - Kristopher: I'll add it to my list. Thanks for the suggestion, Tom.
13.05.2022 23:48:53 - Thomas: Hey Kristopher, have you seen the latest Marvel movie?
13.05.2022 23:49:45 - Kristopher: No, I haven't Thomas. Is it good?
13.05.2022 23:51:28 - Thomas: It's fantastic! I think it's one of their best yet.
13.05.2022 23:52:32 - Kristopher: Really? Wow, I'll have to check it out then.
13.05.2022 23:53:27 - Thomas: Definitely! Do you like action movies in general?
13.05.2022 23:55:27 - Kristopher: Yes, I do. Especially the ones with a good story.
13.05.2022 23:57:14 - Thomas: Well, you're in for a treat then. This one has a great story!
13.05.2022 23:58:15 - Kristopher: That's awesome. I'll definitely watch it this weekend.
13.05.2022 23:59:45 - Thomas: Great! Let me know what you think after you've seen it.
14.05.2022 00:01:40 - Kristopher: Sure thing. Thanks for the recommendation, Thomas.
14.05.2022 00:02:26 - Thomas: No problem, always happy to share a good movie.
14.05.2022 00:04:01 - Kristopher: I appreciate it, Thomas. Looking forward to our next movie chat.
14.05.2022 00:05:34 - Thomas: Me too, Kristopher. Talk to you soon.
14.05.2022 00:06:55 - Kristopher: Alright, take care Thomas. See you soon.
14.05.2022 04:13:06 - Thomas: Hey Kristopher, have you tried out the new Call of Duty?
14.05.2022 04:14:36 - Kristopher: Not yet, Thomas. Is it any good?
14.05.2022 04:15:31 - Thomas: I think it's amazing! The graphics and gameplay are much better.
14.05.2022 04:16:39 - Kristopher: Sounds good. I've been playing a lot of Fortnite recently.
14.05.2022 04:18:21 - Thomas: I've never really got into Fortnite. I prefer the realism in Call of Duty.
14.05.2022 04:19:25 - Kristopher: Fair enough. Each to their own I guess.
14.05.2022 04:20:18 - Thomas: Exactly. So, are you planning on trying the new Call of Duty?
14.05.2022 04:21:05 - Kristopher: I think I will, especially after hearing your thoughts about it.
14.05.2022 04:22:08 - Thomas: Awesome! Let me know when you do. We could play online together.
14.05.2022 04:23:16 - Kristopher: Sounds like a plan, Thomas. I'll give it a go this weekend.
14.05.2022 09:30:00 - Thomas: Hey Kristopher, hope you're doing well. I was hoping we could set up an appointment to discuss our project.
14.05.2022 09:30:32 - Kristopher: Sure Thomas. What day are you thinking?
14.05.2022 09:32:13 - Thomas: I was thinking sometime next week. How about Wednesday?
14.05.2022 09:33:14 - Kristopher: Wednesday works for me. What time were you thinking?
14.05.2022 09:34:38 - Thomas: How does 2PM sound to you?
14.05.2022 09:36:21 - Kristopher: 2PM sounds perfect. Where will we be meeting?
14.05.2022 09:37:45 - Thomas: I was thinking we could meet at our usual coffee shop. Does that work for you?
14.05.2022 09:38:20 - Kristopher: Yes, the coffee shop works great. I'll see you there.
14.05.2022 09:39:12 - Thomas: Great! I'll see you next Wednesday at 2PM at the coffee shop.
14.05.2022 09:39:53 - Kristopher: Looking forward to it, Thomas. See you then.
14.05.2022 11:03:23 - Thomas: Hey Kristopher, have you heard the new album by The Weeknd?
14.05.2022 11:04:14 - Kristopher: Hey Thomas, yes I have. It's really different from his previous stuff, isn't it?
14.05.2022 11:06:13 - Thomas: Definitely, he seems to be experimenting with a new sound. What did you think of it?
14.05.2022 11:06:44 - Kristopher: I quite liked it, but I need to listen to it a few more times to fully appreciate it. The lyrics are quite deep.
14.05.2022 11:08:17 - Thomas: I agree. I think 'Save Your Tears' is my favourite track. What's yours?
14.05.2022 11:09:06 - Kristopher: Hmm, I think 'Blinding Lights' is my favourite. I love the synth in it.
14.05.2022 11:10:27 - Thomas: Yeah, that's a great track too. Have you been to any good concerts lately?
14.05.2022 11:11:10 - Kristopher: Not recently, due to the pandemic. But I'm looking forward to seeing some live music again soon.
14.05.2022 11:12:04 - Thomas: Same here. Let's plan to go to a concert together once things are back to normal.
14.05.2022 11:12:38 - Kristopher: Sounds like a plan, Thomas. Looking forward to it.

old_sample.prompt:
Here is a series of messages sent over a messaging application. You'll find the following information for each message: the sending datetime, the name of the sender and the content of the message. Note that the information is presented in the following format: 'datetime - sender: message'

14.02.2022 05:10:25 - Victoria: Hey everyone, has anyone read 'The Great Gatsby'?
14.02.2022 05:12:24 - Kamrin: Hi Victoria, I have. I found it to be a very intriguing exploration of the American Dream.
14.02.2022 05:14:15 - Juandiego: I haven't read it. Would you guys recommend it for someone who's more into sci-fi?
14.02.2022 05:15:02 - Jacqueline: Well, it's not a sci-fi book, Juandiego. But it's a classic worth reading.
14.02.2022 05:16:45 - Victoria: I agree with Jacqueline. It's not sci-fi but it's still a fascinating read.
14.02.2022 05:18:37 - Kamrin: Juandiego, maybe you can give it a try and tell us what you think.
14.02.2022 05:19:14 - Jacqueline: That's a good idea. It's always interesting to hear diverse opinions.
14.02.2022 05:20:53 - Juandiego: Alright, I'll add it to my reading list and let you know my thoughts when I'm done.
14.02.2022 05:22:51 - Victoria: Sounds like a plan, looking forward to hearing your thoughts, Juandiego!
14.02.2022 10:46:25 - Victoria: Hey everyone, just got a new puppy. Any advice for a first-time pet owner?
14.02.2022 10:47:32 - Kamrin: That's great, Victoria! One piece of advice is to make sure you're patient. Puppies can be a handful
14.02.2022 10:48:57 - Juandiego: Definitely invest in some chew toys. Your furniture will thank you later.
14.02.2022 10:50:05 - Jacqueline: Don't forget about puppy training classes. They can be really helpful for both you and your new pet.
14.02.2022 10:51:44 - Kamrin: Also, make sure to get your puppy vaccinated and regularly checked by a vet.
14.02.2022 10:52:53 - Victoria: Thanks everyone. This is really helpful. I'll make sure to keep all of this in mind.
14.02.2022 10:53:35 - Juandiego: You're welcome, Victoria. Enjoy your new puppy!
14.02.2022 10:54:07 - Jacqueline: Yes, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any other questions. We're here to help.
14.02.2022 10:55:18 - Kamrin: Absolutely. We're all pet owners here, so we can share our experiences.
14.02.2022 13:52:03 - Victoria: Hey guys, have you tried the new Call of Duty game?
14.02.2022 13:53:21 - Kamrin: Yeah, I got it last week. The graphics are insane!
14.02.2022 13:54:53 - Juandiego: I haven't tried it yet, is it worth the hype?
14.02.2022 13:56:21 - Jacqueline: I'm more into RPGs, but I've heard good things about it from my friends who are fans of the series.
14.02.2022 13:57:38 - Victoria: Definitely worth it, Juandiego. And Jacqueline, they've improved the story mode a lot in this one
14.02.2022 13:58:45 - Kamrin: The multiplayer mode is great too, we should all team up sometime!
14.02.2022 13:59:32 - Juandiego: Sounds like a plan. I'll get the game this weekend.
14.02.2022 14:01:02 - Jacqueline: I'll give it a shot too. Let's see if it can convert me into a COD fan.
14.02.2022 14:02:23 - Victoria: Awesome! Let's plan for next weekend then.
14.02.2022 14:03:56 - Kamrin: Perfect, looking forward to it.
14.02.2022 18:12:07 - Victoria: Hey guys, have you seen the new Marvel movie yet?
14.02.2022 18:12:58 - Kamrin: Not yet Victoria, planning to watch it this weekend.
14.02.2022 18:13:52 - Juandiego: I watched it last night. It's really good!
14.02.2022 18:14:52 - Jacqueline: No spoilers, Juandiego!
14.02.2022 18:15:59 - Juandiego: Don't worry Jacqueline, my lips are sealed.
14.02.2022 18:17:51 - Victoria: I'm thinking of seeing it tomorrow. Anyone wants to join?
14.02.2022 18:18:25 - Jacqueline: I'm in, Victoria. Let's go!
14.02.2022 18:19:06 - Kamrin: Sorry guys, I have plans tomorrow. Maybe next time.
14.02.2022 18:20:02 - Juandiego: I wouldn't mind watching it again. Count me in.
14.02.2022 18:20:54 - Victoria: Great! So Jacqueline and Juandiego, see you tomorrow!
14.02.2022 18:22:10 - Jacqueline: Looking forward to it!
14.02.2022 18:23:31 - Juandiego: Same here!
14.02.2022 23:14:02 - Victoria: Hey guys, any plans for the weekend?
14.02.2022 23:14:48 - Kamrin: I was thinking about going hiking. Anyone wants to join?
14.02.2022 23:15:22 - Juandiego: I'm up for it! Haven't been hiking for a while now.
14.02.2022 23:17:01 - Jacqueline: That sounds fun, count me in!
14.02.2022 23:17:58 - Victoria: Great! Let's meet at the park at 10 am on Saturday.
14.02.2022 23:19:30 - Kamrin: Sounds like a plan. See you all on Saturday!
14.02.2022 23:20:55 - Juandiego: Looking forward to it. See you guys!
14.02.2022 23:22:37 - Jacqueline: Can't wait. It's going to be fun!
14.02.2022 23:23:58 - Victoria: Perfect. Let's bring some snacks and drinks as well. See you all on Saturday.
15.02.2022 04:17:06 - Victoria: Hey guys, what do you think about the last basketball match?
15.02.2022 04:17:58 - Kamrin: I think it was quite intense, the last quarter especially!
15.02.2022 04:19:16 - Juandiego: Agreed Kamrin, the fourth quarter was a nail-biter!
15.02.2022 04:21:07 - Jacqueline: I was on the edge of my seat the whole time. The final shot was just wow!
15.02.2022 04:22:13 - Victoria: Absolutely, I couldn't believe how close it was. The team really pulled together for that win.
15.02.2022 04:23:02 - Kamrin: Definitely, the team dynamics this season are really impressive!
15.02.2022 04:24:36 - Juandiego: Yes, and the new coach seems to have a great strategy. The improvement is noticeable.
15.02.2022 04:25:14 - Jacqueline: I'm excited to see how they perform in the next game. The opponents are tough, but I believe in our team!
15.02.2022 04:26:04 - Victoria: I agree Jacqueline, it's going to be a tough game but I'm confident we can win.
15.02.2022 08:00:00 - Victoria: Hey guys, we need to set up an appointment for our group project.
15.02.2022 08:00:56 - Kamrin: Sounds good to me. What day were you thinking, Victoria?
15.02.2022 08:01:49 - Victoria: How about next Wednesday at 3PM?
15.02.2022 08:02:55 - Juandiego: I can't make it that day, I have a dentist appointment. Can we do Thursday instead?
15.02.2022 08:03:44 - Victoria: That works for me. Kamrin, Jacqueline, does Thursday work for you?
15.02.2022 08:05:21 - Kamrin: I'm free all day Thursday, so that works for me.
15.02.2022 08:05:55 - Jacqueline: I have a meeting until 4PM on Thursday, but I can join you after that.
15.02.2022 08:06:52 - Victoria: That's settled then. Let's meet on Thursday at 4:30 PM. Is everyone okay with that?
15.02.2022 08:08:44 - Kamrin: Sounds good to me.
15.02.2022 08:10:05 - Juandiego: Works for me too.
15.02.2022 08:11:07 - Jacqueline: I'm in. See you guys on Thursday.
15.02.2022 08:11:39 - Victoria: Great. Looking forward to it. Let's make sure we come prepared.
